Element.Translation: 塗上黑色警示條紋的黃色標準裝甲。
Element.Original: Yellow Standard Armor that has been emblazoned with black caution stripes.

Element.Translation: 掠奪堆積的倍數（數值小於１＝更少，０＝無）。
Element.Original: multiply amount of items in a loot stack. use values smaller 1 for less and 0 for none

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 七面體黃色警示裝甲（Yellow Hazard Armor Hepta）
可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的門磚組成大門。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: 「$RESOURCES」按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉工廠的物品欄，放置配方需要的材料。
Element.Original: $RESOURCES Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close the Factory's Internal Inventory. (Used for placing the necessary materials for recipes)
Moves fleet to a specific location.

Element.Translation: 灰色進階裝甲1/4（Grey Advanced Armor 1/4）
閒置的艦隊不會攻擊敵人。
Element.Original: Fleet will idle. It will not attack enemies.
Decreases the time needed to produce a block.
An wedged ingot of refined Jisper.

Element.Translation:
移動艦隊到目標區域並攻擊敵船。
目前只能攻擊指定的區域。未能攻
擊則在目標外圍等候直到可以發起
攻擊。
Element.Original: Tries to move to target sector and attack enemy ships. For the time being, only loaded sectors can be attacked. The Fleet will wait outside the target sector otherwise.
Increases the strength of your Scanner.

Element.Translation: 不能取得方塊！\n不能開採的物體。
Element.Original: Cannot take block\nStructure is not minable

Element.Translation: 不能打撈「有陣營的太空站」！\n先摧毀「陣營磚」。
Element.Original: Faction owned station not salvagable\nDestroy faction block first

Element.Translation: 四面體紫色水晶裝甲（Purple Crystal Armor Tetra）
藍色水晶裝甲3/4（Blue Crystal Armor 3/4）
玩家建立商店，囤積材料，設定交易的對像、貨品價格、貿易量。
Element.Original: Used by players to create their own shops that they can stock with blocks and/or items and open to the public or keep restricted to specific faction ranks. The prices of each block may be set here, as well as the quantities desired.

Element.Translation: 四面體粉紅色標準裝甲（Pink Standard Armor Tetra）
由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 物體滾動運動減速多少（在１到０之間取值，０＝無減慢）。
Element.Original: how much object slow down naturally (must be between 0 and 1): 0 is no slowdown

Element.Translation: 已卸貨的艦隊要多久才駛離１個區域（毫秒）。
Element.Original: How long for an unloaded fleet to cross a sector in ms
Unable to dock ship to shipyard!
A ship with this name already exists!

Element.Translation: 輸入船隻設計圖的名稱！
Element.Original: Enter a name for this design!

Element.Translation: 不能建造！\n已有相同的船隻名稱！
Element.Original: Construction interrupted!\nOriginal Ship name already exists!

Element.Translation: 不能建造！設計與其他物體重疊。
Element.Original: Cannot construct! Design is overlapping with another structure!

Element.Translation: 礦物變成材料的轉換率
黃色進階裝甲（Yellow Advanced Armor）
錯誤！\n數量有限！\n只能賣出「%s」……
Element.Original: ERROR\nYou don't have that many!\nYou can only sell %s...

Element.Translation: 該物品在商店存貨已滿！
Element.Original: Shop cannot stock any\nmore of that item!

Element.Translation: 錯誤！\n商店需求限制！只能賣出「%s」……
Element.Original: ERROR\nLimited shop demand!\nYou can only sell %s...

Element.Translation: 船隻「%s」，\n船上有不容許的太空站方塊。\n「%s」會被移除！
Element.Original:
Ship %s
used a block type that is not allowed on space stations:
%s
It will be removed!

Element.Translation: 船隻「%s」，\n船上有不容許的太空站方塊。\n「%s」會被移除！
Element.Original:
Ship %s
used a block type that is not allowed on space stations:
%s
It will be removed!

Element.Translation: 無效的太空站。不能停泊並且會被移除。
Element.Original: Invalid station. A station can't be docked and will be removed.

Element.Translation: 無效的太空站。不能停泊並且會被移除。
Element.Original: Invalid station. A station can't be docked and will be removed.

Element.Translation: 腐朽的太空站！\n只能打撈廢料！\n（在太空站按「%s」維修太空站）
Element.Original:
The blocks on this station are
worn and decayed!
You can only salvage scrap!
(press %s on the station to repair)
Target doesn't seem to take any damage!

Element.Translation: 減少傳送門傳送扣掉的護罩值。
Element.Original: Reduces the drain on your shields when using a transporter.

Element.Translation: 這是「船隻設計圖」。船廠載入設計後，投影出虛擬船隻，\n提供創造模式。完成設計後，湊足材料建造出船隻。
Element.Original: This is a ship design. Designs are used in shipyards to load a virtual projection on a ship. The projection can be edited in creative mode.\nDesigns can then be made into a real ship by providing the resources.

Element.Translation: 試一試個人武裝，\n之後找「ＮＰＣ—05」上最後一堂課。
Element.Original: Try out the personal guns\nas long as you like, and then\ntalk to NPC-05 for you last lesson

Element.Translation: 紅色基礎裝甲1/4（Red Basic Armor 1/4）
由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 遇上停泊問題，先停泊船隻核心，然後建造船隻，從中明白停泊的運作。\n建造時駛離再停泊，看出船隻停泊位置的改變。
Element.Original:
If you have problems with docking,
dock a single core, and then build on
it from its docked position to fully
understand how the docking area system works.
If you build on a docked ship, un-docking
and re-docking might change its position.

Element.Translation: 「停泊光線」射向停泊磚停泊、開門或觸發方塊。\n右按直接停泊，忽略門的開關。
Element.Original:
To dock, select the docking beam (which also
activates doors and other activatable blocks)
and shoot it on the docking block.
Right click will ignore doors so you can dock
without closing them instead.

Element.Translation: 「船隻核心」在停泊磚的上方，按船隻大小在停泊區的中央點停泊。\n砲塔的「船隻核心」必需在底部，所以不能在核心水平以下建造。
Element.Original:
A ship is docked at the centre relative to
its size. The ship core will appear right above the docking port
and all parts sticking out must fit in the green area.
A turret needs to have its core on the bottom.
That means you cannot build below
the core if you want to use it as a turret.

Element.Translation: 利用「停泊磚擴張器」改變停泊區域的大小。\n按「$SELECT_MODULE」選擇停泊磚後放置擴張器，連結兩者。
Element.Original:
You can increase the size of the area
by linking docking enhancer blocks to it.
Just press $SELECT_MODULE on the docking
module and place down some enhancers.
The size is determined by the shape of
its enhancers. They must be placed in connecting groups.

Element.Translation: 放置後有綠色的停泊區域提示，無提示代表有障礙物。
Element.Original:
When it is placed down, you should see the docking
area. If it is not green, then something is
blocking it. A docking area must be completely
free from any block.

Element.Translation: 需要「路軌停泊磚」或「砲塔停泊磚」去停泊。\n在進階建造模式，改變停泊磚的方向後放置。
Element.Original:
To dock, you need a "fixed docking module",
or a "turret docking module". When placing it
down, you can change its orientation in the
advanced build mode.
Increases the strength of your Thrust Blast.

Element.Translation: 歡迎來到「ＡＩ船員教學」！\n這裡你學習怎樣招募及管理船員。
Element.Original: Welcome to the AI Crew Tutorial.\nThis tutorial explains how to get\nand control your AI crew

Element.Translation: 可以讓多艘船隻停泊在停泊鏈，\n但是不能停泊在砲塔。
Element.Original: You can also chain-dock multiple ships\ntogether, but you cannot dock anything\non a turret yet.

Element.Translation: 需要把「陣營磚」及「BOBBY ＡＩ裝置」放置在砲塔。\n按「$ACTIVATE」設成「砲塔」，再觸發ＡＩ磚或在「結構面板」讓ＡＩ控制砲塔。
Element.Original:
For turrets to be AI controlled,
you have to have the turret factioned with
the faction block and also equip it with an AI Module.
Press $ACTIVATE on it to make sure it is set to 'turret',
then you can either activate it there, or do the same
from the structure panel.

Element.Translation: Enter mine arm timer in seconds. Use -1 for manual arming
Element.Original: Enter mine arm timer in seconds. Use -1 for manual arming

Element.Translation: 小行星變０後的重生時間（秒，－１＝永不）。
Element.Original: seconds until a sector that is mined down to 0 asteroids is replenished (-1 = never)

Element.Translation:
你好，星際旅行者！

我是「%s」，任職「%s」，
聽命於「%s」，效忠陣營「%s」。
Element.Original:
Greetings space traveller!

My name is %s, I'm currently part of %s,
and under the command of %s in the faction: %s.

Element.Translation: 由Hattel晶體合成的楔形進階電路。
Element.Original: An advanced circuit that's manufactured from Hattel crystals.

Element.Translation: 不能貼上！\n對於伺服器，模板體積太大。
Element.Original: Cannot paste!\nTemplate size is too big\nfor this server.

Element.Translation: 我想你離開我的團隊，並停留在這裡！
Element.Original: I want you off my team. Stay where you are!

Element.Translation: 楔形深灰色標準裝甲（Dark Grey Standard Armor Wedge）
錯誤！\n只容許每件物體有１塊ＡＩ磚。
Element.Original: ERROR\nOnly one AI block is permitted\nper structure.

Element.Translation: 錯誤！\n只容許每件物體有１塊陣營磚。
Element.Original: ERROR\nOnly one Faction block is permitted\nper structure.

Element.Translation: 錯誤！\n只容許每件物體有１塊核心磚。
Element.Original: ERROR\nOnly one Core block is permitted\nper structure.

Element.Translation: 非常荣幸與你共事，長官！
Element.Original: I'm honoured to work with you, commander!

Element.Translation: 錯誤！\n只容許每件物體有１塊商店磚。
Element.Original: ERROR\nOnly one Shop block is permitted\nper structure.

Element.Translation: 警告！忽略「%s」方塊的連結，\n因為方塊重疊。
Element.Original: Warning: %s module connections\nignored due to overlapping blocks.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 塗上白色警示條紋的綠色標準裝甲。
Element.Original: Green Standard Armor that has been emblazoned with white caution stripes.

Element.Translation: 電離效果裝置（Ion Effect Module）

Element.Original: Do you really want to do this?

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 棕色標準裝甲（Brown Standard Armor）
推開效果電腦（Push Effect Computer）
由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 失去連線（無管道連接反應爐）
此結構的儲藏點未\n設定物品欄名稱。
粉紅色水晶裝甲（Pink Crystal Armor）
檔案（./data/sphereExplosionData.zip）已損壞。\n可能下載錯誤。\n建議利用遊戲啟動重新安裝遊戲（確定先把伺服器資料、藍圖備份。）
Element.Original: The file (./data/sphereExplosionData.zip) seems to be corrupted.\nMaybe something downloaded wrongly.\nBest to force a reinstall from the launcher (make sure to save your 'server-database' and 'blueprints' folder if you fully uninstall to keep your worlds)

Element.Translation: 方塊出現新礦脈的機率（１﹒０＝１００%）。
Element.Original: Chance per block to place a new resource vein (1.0 = 100%)

Element.Translation: 強化偵察性能的反應室。\n\r需要「反應爐管道」連接「反應室」及「反應爐電力」。
Element.Original: Reactor Chamber to enhance recon capabilities.\n\rNeeds to be physically connected with a Power Reactor by using Reactor Conduit blocks.

Element.Translation: 上述是「ＡＩ船員教學」。\n感謝你閱讀、遊玩《StarMade》！
Element.Original: This concludes the AI Crew Tutorial.\nThanks for reading, and thanks for playing\nStarMade!

Element.Translation: 滑鼠離開，重按回到遊戲。
Element.Original: Detached Mouse From Game. Click to reattach.

Element.Translation: 楔形粉紅色基礎裝甲（Pink Basic Armor Wedge）
不能修改管理員的權限！
Element.Original: Cannot modify rights\nof an admin role!

Element.Translation: 不能修改管理員的權限！
Element.Original: Cannot modify rights\nof an admin role!

Element.Translation: 不能修改管理員的權限！
Element.Original: Cannot modify rights\nof an admin role!

Element.Translation: 不能修改管理員的權限！
Element.Original: Cannot modify rights\nof an admin role!

Element.Translation: 由Nocx晶體合成的進階電路。
Element.Original: An advanced circuit that's manufactured from Nocx crystals.
Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 「%s」\n提議交易請求—\n按「%s」接受；按「%s」拒絕。
Element.Original: Incoming trade request from:\n%s\nPress %s to accept, %s to cancel

Element.Translation: 警告！低推進去進行爆發！
Element.Original: WARNING: Low thrust to do blast!

Element.Translation: 四角錐體青綠色水晶裝甲（Teal Crystal Armor Corner）
提供基礎ＡＩ功能，船隻、艦隊、砲塔ＡＩ。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉ＡＩ設定面板。
Element.Original: The BOBBY AI Module is a capable of providing basic and rudimentary automation and functions. Useful for building automated turrets, amongst a few other applications. It can be configured by opening up your Menu (Inventory, Weapons, Shop,Navigation), and looking for the AI Config button on the bottom right. Press $ACTIVATE to Activate/Deactivate.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 所有物體不再被敵人使用！
Element.Original: All entries are no longer enemy usable!
When put right next to a Mine Core, it turns the mine into a long range lock-on missile launcher.\n\rFires constantly and dies when hit by a weapon or a ship.

Element.Translation: 黑色標準裝甲1/2（Black Standard Armor 1/2）
橙色進階裝甲（Orange Advanced Armor）
紅星岩土（Rock Red Planet Terrain）
由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 之後把ＡＩ設成「船隻」或「砲塔」。\n砲塔不會使用推進器。
Element.Original: Depending on what you want to use it for,\nset your AI to 'ship' or 'turret'. Turrets will\nnot use their thrusters.

Element.Translation: 最佳的ＡＩ操作方法——建立陣營讓ＡＩ分辨出敵人。\n當然，無陣營的情況，ＡＩ如常運作。
Element.Original:
The best way to operate AI is
to be in a faction, as then the
AI knows exactly who your enemies are.
They function without a faction too.

Element.Translation: 記住要「勾選」觸發ＡＩ。\n重入那裡的船隻核心會關閉自動ＡＩ功能！
Element.Original: To activate the AI, you have to tick off 'Activate'.\nRe-entering that ship core will disable the AI!

Element.Translation: 塗上白色警示條紋的綠色標準裝甲。
Element.Original: Green Standard Armor that has been emblazoned with white caution stripes.

Element.Translation: 然後設定ＡＩ的行為。\n「任何」指自動攻擊一定范圍內的敵人；\n「選擇目標」指攻擊指定目標，按「$SELECT_LOOK_ENTITY」鎖定。
Element.Original:
Next, you can set their behaviour.
Aim at 'Any' means it will attack any enemy in range.
Aim at 'Selected Target' is only relevant for turrets
and means that those will attack the targeted entity, the
pilot of the mother ship selects an entity with '$SELECT_LOOK_ENTITY'

Element.Translation: 現在《StarMade》提供２種ＡＩ模式——船隻、砲塔。將來有更多的功能模式。
Element.Original: StarMade offers two modes for AI\nat this moment: Ship and Turret. More\nfunctions will be added.

You can change the settings of
the AI module by pressing
'$ACTIVATE' on it.
A panel with all the options will appear.

Element.Translation: 建造ＡＩ控制的船隻，需要１塊「BOBBY AI 裝置」（BOBBY AI Module）。\n船上只能放置１塊ＡＩ方塊，需要重點保護。
Element.Original:
To build an AI controlled ship,
you have to place down an AI module
on it.
A structure can only have ONE AI Module,
so make sure it's protected well.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 亦可以在操控船隻時，按「$STRUCTURE_PANEL」開啟「結構面板」，選擇開關指定的或所有停泊物。
Element.Original:
You can also do it from the comfort of your
ship by opening the structure panel.
Press $STRUCTURE_PANEL and select the
docked entity you want to turn on or off.
You can also turn on/off all docked entities at
once in the structure panel.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由Nocx晶體合成的楔形基礎電路。
Element.Original: A basic circuit wedge that's manufactured from Nocx crystals.
drop credits lost on death into space instead

Element.Translation: Your bomb was a dud, since it wasn't activated yet.\nIt takes %s sec to become active after fire.
Element.Original: Your bomb was a dud, since it wasn't activated yet.\nIt takes %s sec to become active after fire.

Element.Translation: 按住「$BUILD_MODE_FIX_CAM」，\n同時再按左右鍵「建造／移除」方塊。\n現在講解各工具……
Element.Original:
While holding $BUILD_MODE_FIX_CAM ,
you can place/remove blocks by directly clicking on blocks
with your mouse cursor.
Each tool will now be explained...

Element.Translation: 從廢棄的太空站打撈回來。
在建造模式，按住「$BUILD_MODE_FIX_CAM」開啟「進階建造模式」。\n畫面右方出現數項選項。
Element.Original:
While in build mode, hold down $BUILD_MODE_FIX_CAM
to activate the advanced build mode.
You will see several options
on the right side of your screen.

Element.Translation: 「照亮模式」時，照亮區域無陰影方便建造。\n當你打算欣賞作品，記住先關閉照亮模式。
Element.Original:
Lighten mode removes any shadows and
shading from the blocks, lighting
up dark areas to make it easier
to see when building. Keep in mind
to disable it once in a while to see
how good your ship looks with lighting enabled.

Element.Translation: 「移除模式」時，建造的黃格變成移除的紅格，\n讓你知道正在移除那一塊磚。\n在大面積移除時非常有用。
Element.Original:
Remove mode turns the yellow build box
into a red one that shows you what blocks
are going to be removed.
This is especially helpful for removing
larger areas.

Element.Translation: 「總部」（Home Base）不再無敵，「陣營點數」（Faction Points）變負數不再擁有領土。
Element.Original: Home bases become attackable if a faction's Faction Points are in the minus and the faction doesn't own any territory

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 區域無反應！\n不能使用物體！
第一項有用的功能是「左Shift」鍵，\n讓你高速移動，不再漫遊太空。
Element.Original:
The first useful feature is the left shift button,
It will let you move a lot faster
(as opposed to
slower in astronaut mode).
Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 只能在「船隻核心」（Ship Cores）、\n「建造磚」（Build Block） 進入「進階建造模式」。
Element.Original: You can only access the advanced building\nmode in a ship core or build block.

Element.Translation: 「移除篩選」方便快速改裝船隻。在下拉式選單或篩選打字選擇方塊。\n之後右按只會移除指定的方塊。在對稱平面同樣適用。
Element.Original:
The remove filter is a great tool to quickly refit your ship!
You can select a block from the drop down menu
(or use the filter above to search for specific names) and only
the selected block will be removed when right clicking.
This works with larger build areas and symmetry.

Element.Translation: 建造錯誤時，選擇「復原」或「重做」。\n回到上／下一個動作。
Element.Original:
Whenever you accidentally misplaced
or deleted a block, you can undo your
last actions by clicking on 'undo'.
You can also redo by clicking on 'redo'.

Element.Translation: 那３條滑動條是建造工具，改變建造範圍，\n讓你一次過建造／移除多塊方塊。\n在「server.cfg」設定你的《StarMade》最大的建造範圍。
Element.Original:
The three sliders are one of the best tools
for building. They will increase the build area
so multiple blocks can be build/removed at once.
Servers have different max settings, and you
can set them for your single player game
in the server.cfg file.

Element.Translation: 「鏡像模式」幾乎與「對稱平面」一樣，只是鏡像倒轉方塊，\n方便建造武器系統……
Element.Original:
Mirror mode basically just tells
symmetry mode to also mirror
blocks that can be orientated
like weapons, etc...

Element.Translation: 非常有用的工具「對稱平面」，加快建造速度。在平面兩側鏡像\n對稱放置方塊。「不成對平面」指設定平面在２塊方塊之間。
Element.Original:
Symmetry planes are probably the best tools in the game.
You place down 'walls' that divide your structure in parts.
Placing a block on one side will also place the
block on the other side. 'odd' symmetry just lets you
move the wall to the middle of a block.
You can use multiple symmetry planes to
maximize your building speed.

Element.Translation: 晶瑩剔透的Sintyr碎片熠熠閃亮。數項技術需要這些碎片。
Element.Original: Glittering Sintyr Shards reflect so much light they almost seem to glow. Several technologies are based upon the use of these shards once processed.

Element.Translation: 放置「反應爐管道」在「反應爐電力」及「反應室」之間，或相同種類的「反應室」之間。
Element.Original: Conduit must connect 'one reactor <-> one chamber' or 'one chamber <-> one chamber'

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 船隻核心是非常重要的，明白！
Element.Original: The Ship Core is important, got it!

Element.Translation: 確定要移除所有物體的「敵人可以使用」的設定？
Element.Original: Do you really want to remove the 'enemy usable' for all entries?

Element.Translation: 四面體黃色進階裝甲（Yellow Advanced Armor Tetra）
由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 不可用的物品（測試合成系統）。
Element.Original: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)

Element.Translation: 橙色基礎裝甲1/2（Orange Basic Armor 1/2）
粉碎效果電腦（Piercing Effect Computer）
橙色進階裝甲1/4（Orange Advanced Armor 1/4）
混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 大量儲存船隻出現錯誤！\n查閱伺服器記錄！

Element.Original: A strange, alien type of surface.

Element.Translation: 綠色基礎裝甲1/2（Green Basic Armor 1/2）
移除所有「敵人可以使用」的權限
混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 第二處重生點的隨機數值——Ｙ座標。
Element.Original: Second Rotating Spawn: Local Pos Y Coordinate

Element.Translation: 第三處重生點的隨機數值——Ｙ座標。
Element.Original: Third Rotating Spawn: Local Pos Y Coordinate

Element.Translation: 第一處重生點的隨機數值——Ｙ座標。
Element.Original: First Rotating Spawn: Local Pos Y Coordinate

Element.Translation: 設計好重要。\n舉個例，好的電力系統設計，會有供電加成。
Element.Original: The system design in this world really matters.\nFor example, if you set up power in the right way, you can get a huge recharge bonus.

Element.Translation: 七面體白色基礎裝甲（White Basic Armor Hepta）
第四處重生點的隨機數值——Ｙ座標。
Element.Original: Forth Rotating Spawn: Local Pos Y Coordinate
The surface of an Ice Planet.

Element.Translation: 容易合成，提供高亮度的照明。
Element.Original: Simple to create, Beacon Rods provide an easily seen flare of brightness.

Element.Translation: 七面體紅色水晶裝甲（Red Crystal Armor Hepta）
散發著柔和綠光的Bastyn水晶。
Element.Original: A block of Bastyn crystal. It's green in colour and emits a soft glow.

Element.Translation:
遊戲星圖提供失敗！
「%s」。
請「立即」附上記錄回報錯誤。
（隨著時間會失去記錄）
Element.Original:
Game Map Provider failed
%s
PLEASE send in server logs immediately
(else it might get washed out).

Element.Translation: 雷達掃描顯示陣營「%s」從區域「%s」到「%s」建立貿易路線。
Element.Original: Scanners are showing that the faction %s is establishing a trade route from sector %s to %s

Element.Translation: 在進階建造模式，玩家「建造／移除」的最大面積。
Element.Original: max area a player may add/remove in adv. build mode
Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 紅色標準裝甲1/4（Red Standard Armor 1/4）
Weapon must be charged for %s sec!
Element.Original: Weapon must be charged for %s sec!

Element.Translation: 七面體白色水晶裝甲（White Crystal Armor Hepta）
混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: 黃色標準裝甲1/2（Yellow Standard Armor 1/2）
與「太空技術維修電腦」連結，組成「維修光線系統」（Repair Beam System）。射出直線的維修光線，效率與互相連接的磚數成正比。按「$ACTIVATE」決定那一格維修磚作為砲口。
Element.Original: The Repair Beam Module, when used in conjunction with a Repair Beam Computer, can create a basic but effective repair system. The Astrotech Module fires a repair beam in a straight line. Astrotech Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their repair speed. You can also choose which block outputs the beam by finding the Astrotech Module you want to output the beam, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it. AstroTech Modules can used to repair damage to blocks.

Element.Translation: 反應爐的機動反應室（Reactor Mobility Chamber）
不能混合新與舊的停泊。
Element.Original: Can't mix old and new docking

Element.Translation: 七面體綠色水晶裝甲（Green Crystal Armor Hepta）
星際之門無效。\n要建造成２Ｄ迴路！
Element.Original: Invalid Warpgate Build\nMust be one 2D loop!
A finely carved block of Tekt.
Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 楔形棕色水晶裝甲（Brown Crystal Armor Wedge）
由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 停泊鏈的最大數值（視乎操作系统的路徑及檔名長度，大數值可能故障）。
Element.Original: maximal deepness of docking chains (may cause glitches depending on OS (path and filename length) at high numbers)

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 七面體紫色標準裝甲（Purple Standard Armor Hepta）
楔形橙色水晶裝甲（Orange Crystal Armor Wedge）
從各種材料合成出基礎的磚。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉工廠的物品欄，放置配方需要的材料。
Element.Original: Manufactures basic blocks from a variety of resources. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close the Factory's Internal Inventory. (Used for placing the necessary materials for recipes.)

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 如門磚一樣可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的力場磚組成大門。力場比鎖子門或玻璃門有更高的耐久值。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Error! You don't own this fleet!
Error! You don't own this fleet!
Formation not allowed on this server

Element.Translation: 不可用的物品（測試合成系統）。
Element.Original: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)
Formation not allowed on this server

Element.Translation:
你看我身後那台「顯示器」！

可以設定文字大小、顏色，顯示系統的狀態，
例如太空站現在的電力供應。
Element.Original:
Check out this cool display behind me!

You can put in any text you like and even use different colours, sizes and variables from your ship
like the current power supply.

Element.Translation: 黑色基礎裝甲3/4（Black Basic Armor 3/4）
四角錐體藍色基礎裝甲（Blue Basic Armor Corner）
信標帶電電路（Beacon Charged Circuit）
錯誤！\n商店有限制或你的金錢不足！\n你只能購買「%s」……
Element.Original: ERROR\nThe shop has limited availability or you can't afford that many!\nYou can only buy %s...
This item is out of stock!

Element.Translation: 警告！\n武器或工具無任何效果！\n伺服器不容許每電腦有多於「%s」分組。
Element.Original:
WARNING!
Weapon/Tool will not have any effect!
Server doesn't allow more than %s groups
per computer.
Error! You don't own this fleet!

Element.Translation:
某塊方塊有多條連接！
因為連接有限制，
此物體有可能濫用多條連接到多個控制裝置。
「%s」在「%s」。
Element.Original:
One or more connections has been added twice to the same block,
but this type of link is restricted to unique connections
-> possible abuse by linking one block to multiple controllers for entity:
%s in %s

Element.Translation: 警告！\n伺服器不容許此裝置有這個數量的方塊！
Element.Original: WARNING!\nServer doesn't allow the amount of blocks in this module!

Element.Translation: 警告！\n \n無武器與條目連結。
由Varat晶體合成的楔形基礎電路。
Element.Original: A basic circuit wedge that's manufactured from Varat crystals.

Element.Translation: 推開脈衝裝置（Push Pulse Module）
不可用的物品（測試合成系統）。
Element.Original: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)

Element.Translation: 玩家有多少船隻藍圖的存檔（－１＝無限）。
Element.Original: How many slots per player for saved ships (-1 for unlimited)

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。

工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 黃色警示裝甲（Yellow Hazard Armor）
由Varat晶體合成的楔形進階電路。
Element.Original: An advanced circuit wedge that's manufactured from Varat crystals.

Element.Translation: 紫色進階裝甲1/4（Purple Advanced Armor 1/4）

Element.Original: Increases the capacity of all shields.

Element.Original: $RESOURCES Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close the Factory's Internal Inventory. (Used for placing the necessary materials for recipes)
RC: %s%%; Total branch up to this: %s%%

Element.Translation: 不容許此種類物體有此反應室。\n「%s」。
Element.Original: Chamber not permitted on this structure type\n%s

Element.Translation: 不能安裝此反應室在相同的反應爐鏈，因為「%s」\n「%s」。
Element.Original: This chamber cannot exist in same tree as %s\n%s

Element.Translation: 讓船隻隱形一段時間。電力消耗與體積成正比，安裝方法與其他系統相若。
Element.Original: The Cloaker is capable of rendering anobject completely invisible for a period of time. Larger objects will need a larger amount of power to remain cloaked. It will appear in the weapon panel to put in the hotbar for use.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 在仇人清單輸入玩家名稱。\n\n（不區分字母大小階）
Element.Original: Enter the name of the player you want to add to the personal enemy list\n\n(case of the name doesn't matter)

粉紅色進階裝甲1/4（Pink Advanced Armor 1/4）

Element.Original: Do you really want to do this?

Element.Original: Can't undock ships from a design
Increases the usage duration of your Scanner.
When put right next to a Mine Core, it turns the mine into a short range moving proximity mine.\n\rFires once when activated.

Element.Translation: 紫色標準裝甲1/4（Purple Standard Armor 1/4）
提煉後Macet礦石可以用於合成。數項技術需要這些礦石。
Element.Original: Macet Ore has useful manufacturing properties if refined into a more readily usable state. Several technologies are based upon the use of these ores once refined.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 在建築模式才能看見。與「區域觸發控制裝置」連結後，物體進入區域有觸發效果但是只輸出１次訊號，不會再次被觸發直到物體離開區域。多件物體進入區域時，會為每件物體觸發１次。
Element.Original: This block can only be seen in the structure's build mode. It connects to the Trigger (Area) Controller. Use it to build areas that activate when someone enters it. On activation, only one signal is sent. It will not activate again, until the catalyst leaves the area. It will activate once for each object, should multiple objects enter the area.
Enter the channel password to join this channel\n%s

Element.Translation: 棕色基礎裝甲1/4（Brown Basic Armor 1/4）
橙色標準裝甲（Orange Standard Armor）
縮短推進設定的等待時間。
Element.Original: Speeds up how long it takes to apply a change to your thrust configuration.

Element.Translation: 用於建立「火砲系統」（Cannon System），控制不限數量的「砲管」，分成多組會增加電力消耗。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結電腦磚及砲管磚。$MAINCOMBI 按「$ACTIVATE」進入／離開電腦。
Element.Original: The Cannon Computer is required for creating functioning Cannon systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Cannon Barrels, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Cannon Barrels using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Cannon Barrel. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.
Please type in a name for your new Ship!

Element.Translation: 強化基礎裝甲磚結構的材料，合成出耐久值較佳的標準裝甲磚。
Element.Original: Material capable of enhancing the structure of Basic Armor blocks and to create a more durable block, standard armor.

Element.Translation: 只容許使用「字母」、「數字」或「_-」！
Element.Original: Must only contain letters or numbers or (_-)!
Please enter in a name for your blueprint!

Element.Translation: 現在不能購買！\n請等候「%s」秒。
只容許使用「字母」、「數字」或「_-」！
Element.Original: Must only contain letters or numbers or (_-)!

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 現在不能儲存！\n請等候「%s」秒。
輸入新名稱（最長３個字元）。
Element.Original: Enter a new name (must be at least 3 letters)
Time to ban in minutes (-1 for permanently)

Element.Translation: 錯誤！商店某物品的存貨已滿！\n「%s」。
Element.Original: ERROR: Shop has reached the max\nstock for the item:\n%s

Element.Translation: 不容許你在本店購買！\n（無權限）
Element.Original: You are not allowed\nto buy at this shop!\n(no permission)

Element.Translation: 橙色標準裝甲1/4（Orange Standard Armor 1/4）
錯誤！禁止買賣違禁物品！\n「%s」。
Element.Original: ERROR: Item is forbidden\nfrom being traded:\n%s

Element.Translation: 不容許你在本店購買！\n（無權限）
Element.Original: You are not allowed\nto buy at this shop!\n(no permission)

Element.Translation: 抱歉，不能賣出此物品！\n因為不再買賣舊科技……
Element.Original:
Sorry, this item cannot be sold!
It is old technology

trading it...
You finished the race on rank %s!

Element.Translation: 恭喜！你以第「%s」名完成！贏得「%s」金錢！
Element.Original: Congratulations!\nYou finished on rank %s!\nYou won %s credits!

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 「$RESOURCES」按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉工廠的物品欄，放置配方需要的材料。
Element.Original: $RESOURCES Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close the Factory's Internal Inventory. (Used for placing the necessary materials for recipes)

Element.Translation: 用於建立「脈衝攻擊系統」（Damage Pulse System），控制不限數量的「脈衝攻擊裝置」，分成多組會增加電力消耗。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結電腦磚及脈衝磚。$MAINCOMBI 按「$ACTIVATE」進入／離開電腦。
Element.Original: The Damage Pulse Computer is required for creating functioning Damage Pulse systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Damage Pulse Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Damage Pulse Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Damage Pulse Modules. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.
I want to know something else

Element.Translation:
「海盜」是宇宙的渣滓。
千萬別遇上他們，善用你的導航系統避開海盜。
少數的生還者謠傳，海盜建造太空站、複製別人的藍圖建造海盜船。

被海盜追擊時，拉開１—２個區域距離就能逃脫。
Element.Original:
The pirates are the pest of the universe.
It's better to not engage then unless you absolutely must. Use your navigator often to check for hostiles.
There are rumors that they build their own bases, and even copy ship blueprints,
but only few have survived to tell the story. 

You can outrun the pirates and they usually stop pursuing if you get 1-2 sector clicks away.
Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation:
「商人公會」（Trading Guild）是廣為人知的銀河最大商會。
旅途上彼此的船隻經常擦身而過。
各地的公會商店提供各種買賣，公會艦隊定期運輸材料及巡防。

公會秉持中立，但是對開火挑釁者殺無赦。
Element.Original:
The traiding guild is the biggest trading company of the known universe.
On your travels you will probably encounter us in one or another way.
We have shops where we buy and sell various goods, but we also utilize a fleet to restock
shops, and defend ourselves. 

While we are by priciple neutral, we will respond if you fire at our shops, or breach the shields
of our vessels. But don't worry: we won't be mad at you for long should you survive.

Element.Translation: 我想知道更多商人公會的事情。
Element.Original: I want to know more about the traiding guild

Element.Translation: 不能載入玩家……\n正在重設回合！
不能載入戰鬥區域……\n正在重設回合！

你好，星際旅行者。

我是「%s」，星際商人公會的成員，
可以提供消息、任務等。

需要我的幫助嗎？
Element.Original:
Greetings, space traveler.

My name is %s, and I'm a member of the intergalactic traiding Guild.
You can get information, quests, and more.

How can I help you?

Element.Translation: 在宇宙同時存在多少模擬分組（性能）。
Element.Original: How many simulation groups may be in the universe simultaniously (performance)
I want to know something else

Element.Translation: 我想知道更多商店的事情。
Element.Original: I want to know more about shops

Element.Translation:
這裡是「進階商店」。
「一般商店」採用自動買賣系統，無商人公會的成員管理。
可以在此購買「商店磚」（Shop Module），在自己的太空站開設個人商店。

亦可以購買「配方」（Recipe），合成方塊或結合配方。

歡迎按「Ｂ」查閱詳情。
Element.Original:
This is an advaced shop.
The more common version of shops are not manned by member of the trading guild,
but utilize a fully automatic shop system. You can also buy your own shopping block right here,
to use the same technique on your own stations

Here you can also buy recipes for various purposes. Either to create a block, or a fixed recipe
to convert blocks. 

Feel free to browse (press 'B' after this converation has ended)
I want to know something else

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;Start
Element.Translation: 歡迎來到「陣營教學」！\n這裡你學習怎樣管理陣營及保護你的船隻、總部。
Element.Original:
Welcome to the Faction Tutorial.
This tutorial will explain how to manage
your faction and how to keep your ships and homebase
safe from players.

Element.Translation: 與「脈衝攻擊電腦」連結，組成「脈衝攻擊系統」（Damage Pulse System）。射出一團攻擊力場，火力與互相連接的磚數成正比。按「$ACTIVATE」決定那一格脈衝磚作為砲口。
Element.Original: The Damage Pulse Module, when used in conjunction with a Damage Pulse Computer, can create a basic but effective weapons system. The Damage Pulse fires an AOE field directly adjacent to the output point. Damage Pulses do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their damage. You can also choose which block outputs the pulse by finding the Damage Pulse Module you want to output the pulse, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Element.Translation:
太空站結構的「星際之門」（Warp Gate）讓玩家瞬間長距離空間跳躍，８個「星系」（System）共計１２８個「區域」（Sector）的距離。門的大小影響並持續消耗太空站的電力；船隻的質量影響每次通過門所消耗太空站的電力。

星際之門由１格深呈環狀的「星際之門裝置」所構成，與「星際之門電腦」連結。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結電腦磚及裝置磚，或「Shift＋V」集體連結。

在來源地及目的地皆建造星際之門後，手持「標記光線槍」連接２門，用槍右按來源地的電腦，左按目的地後會出現跳躍路線。可從「商人公會」的商人購入該槍。
Element.Original:
Warp Gates are a stationary structure that enables players to travel vast distances instantly. Their range is 8 systems (128 sectors). They have a permanent power cost based on their gate size and additionally a one time power cost per ship which passes through the gate. This cost is calculated on the mass of the warping ship. 

Warp Gates are constructed from a 1 block deep ring structure created from Warp Gate Modules. This must then be connected to a Warp Gate Computer. Press C on the computer, then V on the modules to link the two. Alternatively use Shift + V to mass link grouped modules.

After creating both the entry and exit gates at your target departure and destination structures, you must link the two with the Marker Beam. This handheld Support Tool is sold by Trade Guild vendors. Equipping the Marker Beam and Right Clicking on a Warp Gate Computer will “Mark” the departure structure. Left Clicking on the destination will pair the two and finalise the warp route.

Element.Translation: 爆炸效果電腦（Explosive Effect Computer）

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。

Element.Translation: 第四處重生點的隨機數值——Ｚ座標。
Element.Original: Forth Rotating Spawn: Local Pos Z Coordinate

Element.Translation: 第三處重生點的隨機數值——Ｚ座標。
Element.Original: Third Rotating Spawn: Local Pos Z Coordinate

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 加入多少「%s」？\n(只容許管理員)
Element.Original: How many %s do you want to add?\n(Admin only)

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation:
確定要離開此陣營？
離開後，你不能再進入此陣營的物體，
除非上述的已改成個人的。

如果你是此陣營的最後成員，陣營會隨之解散！
Element.Original:
Do you really want to leave this faction?
You'll be unable to access any ship/structure that belongs to this
faction except for your ships that use the Personal Permission Rank.

If you are the last member, the faction will also automatically disband!

Element.Translation: Not enough resources in connected or player inventory to repair!\nNeed %s
Element.Original: Not enough resources in connected or player inventory to repair!\nNeed %s

Element.Translation: 不能儲存船隻設計圖成為藍圖！\n伺服器不容許你儲存多於「%d」藍圖！
Element.Original: Cannot save blueprint from design!\nYou cannot save more than %d blueprints on this server!

Element.Translation: 不能儲存船隻設計圖成為藍圖！\n無載入設計！
Element.Original: Cannot save blueprint from design!\nNo design loaded!

Element.Translation: 不能儲存船隻設計圖成為藍圖！\n未找到玩家！
Element.Original: Cannot save blueprint from design!\nNo player found!

Element.Translation: 會發光引誘觸手獵殺的肉食性植物。
Element.Original: A carnivorous plant that lures it's prey with bioluminescent tendrils.

Element.Translation: 棕色進階裝甲1/2（Brown Advanced Armor 1/2）
需要「有效的主機名」（Hostname）（ＩＰ／主機，例如「play.star-made.org」）。
Element.Original: this must be a valid hostname (either ip or host, e.g. play.star-made.org)

Element.Translation: 酷！現在按「$ENTER_SHIP」進入你第一艘船隻。
Element.Original: Awesome! Now you can enter your first\nship with '$ENTER_SHIP'

Element.Translation: 按「$SPAWN_SHIP」生成船隻並命名。\n（前方要留有足夠的空間，不要對著地面、牆壁。）
Element.Original: Spawn a ship with '$SPAWN_SHIP' and give it a name.\n(don't look at ground/walls because\nthe core needs space to spawn)

Element.Translation: Seconds to show context help for modules on cursor
Element.Original: Seconds to show context help for modules on cursor

Element.Translation: 用於搖控可以觸發的磚。預設按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結觸發磚及需要觸發的結構（例如大門）後，按「$ACTIVATE」觸發／解除。
Element.Original: This module can be used to remotely activate any other module that can be activated. Press $ACTIVATE to Activate/Deactivate. You have to select it and connect it to the module (e.g. a door) for it to work. (Default: select with C, look at the door and press V.)

Element.Translation: 在船上左按放置「發電機」。
Element.Original: Place a power module\nanywhere on your ship\n(left click)

Element.Translation: 讓船隻航行，現在安裝電力及推進器。
Element.Original: Now let's make your ship flyable first.\nPlace the power and thruster anywhere on your ship.

Element.Translation: 在「建造模式」，會自動對齊船隻；\n「右Shift」加速移動穿透物體；\n使用「進階建造模式」。
Element.Original:
This is build mode. It's best to build in this mode,
as you can accelerate movement with Right Shift, and
pass through anything. You are also always aligned to
this ship, and of course you can use the advanced
build tools.

Element.Translation:
不錯！
在「目錄面板」你可以隨時儲存船隻的藍圖，並在商店購買。
替藍圖湊足材料後，生成船隻。
「$CATALOG_PANEL」開啟面板，把創作帶到其他宇宙（其他伺服器）。
Element.Original:
Very nice!
Note, that you can save a blueprint of a ship at any time
in the 'Catalog', buy a copy of it at any shop
and then spawn it by just providing
the necessary blocks.
Just press '$CATALOG_PANEL' to open the catalog panel.
You can even bring your own creations
into other universes (multiplayer servers).

Element.Translation: 在船上左按放置「推進器」。
Element.Original: Now, place a thruster\nmodule anywhere on your ship\n(left click)

Element.Translation: 其他分組例子，有武器系統。\n每組武器有一門砲口，你可以建造出一個大的分組或分成多組。\n但是，分組越多效率懲罰越大！
Element.Original:
Another example for block-groups are the weapon modules.
Each group of weapons will fire one projectile.
You can either have one big group, or multiple
weaker small ones. Keep in mind that you'll
receive a penalty, depending on
how many separate weapon groups you have.

Element.Translation: 輔助電力損毀後會爆炸。
Element.Original: Auxiliary power is volatile and will explode when destroyed.

Element.Translation: 部分系統的結構會影響效率，例如電力系統，讓玩家自行探索。
Element.Original:
For some systems, it is more efficient
to arrange the groups in a certain way.
The power recharge system uses this type, allowing the player
to construct a powerful reactor as efficient as possible.

Element.Translation: 所以結構好重要，例如立方體結構的電力系統，發電效率不及相同方塊數量的三軸直線結構。
Element.Original:
In this case, the dimension of the block-groups matter.
This means that a solid big cube of
recharge power modules gives a lot less energy than the same
amount of blocks, laid out in a giant three-dimensional cross.

Element.Translation: 《StarMade》 會即時計算船隻系統、\n系統之間的連結及指定方塊的分組。
Element.Original: StarMade uses a system to quickly\ncalculate ship systems and their\nconnections, as well as groups of a particular blocks.

Element.Translation: 大多數的系統由方塊分組構成。\n分組由２塊或以上的相同方塊互相連接，形成條狀或立方體的結構。
Element.Original:
A lot of systems work best in block-groups.
A block-group consists of two or more
blocks of the same type that are all touching each other.
A solid big cube of blocks is an example of a block-group,
but the same goes for a line.

Element.Translation: 不能播放視訊—電腦不支援視訊格式，\n請到「https://www.youtube.com/user/schemastarmade」觀看所有教學。
Element.Original: Cannot play movie file (currently not yet supported on this machine.\nAll tutorials are alternatively on https://www.youtube.com/user/schemastarmade

Element.Translation: 不能播放視訊—電腦不支援視訊格式，\n請到「https://www.youtube.com/user/schemastarmade」觀看所有教學。
Element.Original: Cannot play movie file (currently not yet supported on this machine.\nAll tutorials are alternatively on https://www.youtube.com/user/schemastarmade
PageUp bigger, PageDown smaller, F3 pause/unpause, F4 close

Element.Translation: 塗上白色警示條紋的綠色標準裝甲。
Element.Original: Green Standard Armor that has been emblazoned with white caution stripes.

Element.Translation: 可能作弊！充填「跳躍航行」太快！\n物體「%s」在「%s」。\n亦有可能是延遲引起的。
Element.Original: Possible hack by player charging jumpdrive too fast!\nEntity: %s in %s.\nfalse positive is possible through lag

Element.Translation: 在教學區域的最高速度\n是１５公尺／秒。
Element.Original: Max speed in tutorial\narea is 15 m/s.

Element.Translation: 每次按下加入多少方塊
Element.Original: How many blocks per click will be added

Element.Translation: 每次按下加入多少方塊
與「護罩輸入電腦」連結，組成「護罩輸入光線系統」（Shield Drain Beam System）。射出直線的輸入光線，效率與互相連接的磚數成正比。按「$ACTIVATE」決定那一格輸入磚作為砲口。
Element.Original: The Shield Drain Module, when used in conjunction with a Shield Drain Computer, can create a basic but effective shield transfer system. The Shield Drain Module fires a transfer beam in a straight line. Shield Drain Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their transfer rate. You can also choose which block outputs the effect by finding the Shield Drain Module you want to output the effect, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Element.Translation: 塗上白色警示條紋的綠色標準裝甲。
Element.Original: Green Standard Armor that has been emblazoned with white caution stripes.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 比賽大門裝置（Race Gate Module）
粉紅色水晶裝甲1/2（Pink Crystal Armor 1/2）
四角錐體紅色水晶裝甲（Red Crystal Armor Corner）
確定要離開現在的陣營，\n轉投此陣營？
Element.Original: Do you really want to join this faction\nand leave your current faction?

Element.Translation: 從目錄選擇出船隻設計圖。
Element.Original: Choose a design from the catalog.

Element.Translation: 不能取消此操作！系統暫停服務！
Element.Original: Cannot cancel current operation!\nSystems out of service!

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 利用索引（0,1,2,3等）取代＃，建立對應的ＩＤ次序。
Element.Original: Replace # with index (0, 1, 2, 3, ...) corresponding to the id order

Element.Translation: 不能新增船隻設計圖！\n船廠無與船塢核心錨連結！
Element.Original: Cannot create design!\nNo Shipyard Core Anchor connected to this shipyard!

Element.Translation: 不能新增船隻設計圖！\n船廠無與船塢核心錨連結！
Element.Original: Cannot create design!\nNo Shipyard Core Anchor connected to this shipyard!
Please wait for the entity to load...

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 提供指向性的爆發推力。\n\r強度以「推進／質量比例」；\n\r電力消耗以「推進」為基礎。
Element.Original: A ship module to give you a powerful push into any direction that you're thrusting to.\n\rIts strength depends on your thrust to mass ratio.\n\rIts power consumption depends on how much thrust you have.

Element.Translation: 紫色基礎裝甲1/4（Purple Basic Armor 1/4）
不能載入船隻設計圖！\n在資料庫，物體的船隻設計圖無效！
Element.Original: Cannot load design\nEntity for design not valid in database!

Element.Translation: 切換創造模式（如果適用）

Element.Original: Choose a blueprint from the catalog.

Element.Translation: 反應爐的電力反應室（Reactor Power Chamber）
不能載入船隻設計圖！\n在資料庫未找到物體的設計！
Element.Original: Cannot load design\nEntity for design not found in database!

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 選擇船廠物品欄的藍圖。
Element.Original: Choose a blueprint from shipyard inventory.

Element.Translation: 從已有的藍圖載入並新增船隻設計圖。
Element.Original: This will create and load a design of an existing Blueprint.

Element.Translation: 載入現在的船隻設計圖並新增藍圖。
Element.Original: This will create a Blueprint of the current loaded design

Element.Translation: 提煉晶體碎片的副產品，散發著珍珠色澤的晶體基複合材料。利用鍍膜把材料注入磚內點陣式空間合成出有用的晶體磚。
Element.Original: A pearlescent crystal composite. These blocks are byproducts of refining crystal shards, combining extranious substrates into versatile crystal lattices that are then melded into a useful crystal block.

Element.Translation: 接收到「受襲」訊號！\n請求立即支援！
Element.Original: Radio transmission intercepted:\n'We are being attacked!\nRequesting immediate backup!'

Element.Translation: 昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: 船廠的物品欄無船隻設計圖！
從船隻設計圖復原停泊物。
Element.Original: Restore the current docked ship to a design.

Element.Translation: 在虛擬區域測試你的船隻設計圖。\n射擊敵人或固定目標。
Element.Original: Take your current design for a test flight in a virtual sector.\nSpawn in enemy waves or shoot at some static targets.

Element.Translation: 四面體藍色進階裝甲（Blue Advanced Armor Tetra）
只容許分組的方向與其他分組一樣。
Element.Original: Unit group must have same orientation as the others unit groups

Element.Translation: 儲存快捷欄的版面配置

Element.Original: Unit group invalid for unknown reason

Element.Translation: 從船廠的物品欄選擇設計。
Element.Original: Choose a Design from shipyard inventory.

Element.Translation: 上述是「目錄教學」。\n感謝你閱讀、遊玩《StarMade》！
Element.Original: This concludes the Catalog tutorial.\nThanks for reading,\nand thanks for playing StarMade!

Element.Translation: 選擇並載入快捷欄的版面配置
加入快捷欄的版面配置。
四角錐體灰色標準裝甲（Grey Standard Armor Corner）
只容許分組的大小與最大的分組一樣：
Element.Original: Unit group must have same size as the biggest:

Element.Translation: 只容許分組的方向與其他分組一樣。
Element.Original: Unit group must have same orientation as the others unit groups

Element.Translation: 只容許分組的大小與最大的分組一樣：
Element.Original: Unit group must have same size as the biggest:

Element.Translation: 只容許分組的方向與其他分組一樣。
Element.Original: Unit group must have same orientation as the others unit groups

Element.Translation: 只容許分組的大小與最大的分組一樣：
Element.Original: Unit group must have same size as the biggest:

Element.Translation: 分組與其他的距離太遠！「%s／%s」方塊。
Element.Original: Unit group too far from next. It's %s / %s blocks

Element.Translation: 根據布爾函數運作的邏輯閘。把輸入的訊號倒轉後並輸出。
Element.Original: Will invert the input connected to this module, and delegates it to the modules connected to it. A logic gate is an idealized or physical device implementing a Boolean function; that is, it performs a logical operation on one or more logical inputs, and produces a single logical output.

Element.Translation: 分組與其他的距離太遠！「%s／%s」方塊。
Element.Original: Unit group too far from next. It's %s / %s blocks

Element.Translation: 分組與其他的距離太遠！「%s／%s」方塊。
Element.Original: Unit group too far from next. It's %s / %s blocks

Element.Translation: 觸發大門控制裝置（Activation Gate Controller）
分組與其他的距離太遠！「%s／%s」方塊。
Element.Original: Unit group too far from next. It's %s / %s blocks

Element.Translation: 此分組的端點與其他分組不符合（ＸＺ）。
Element.Original: End Points of this Unit group doesn't match up another unit group (XZ)

Element.Translation: 可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的門磚組成大門。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: 此分組的端點與其他分組不符合（ＹＺ）。
Element.Original: End Points of this Unit group doesn't match up another unit group (YZ)

Element.Translation: 只容許管理員查閱網路數據！
Element.Original: Network Statistics only allowed for admins!

Element.Translation: 如門磚一樣可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的力場磚組成大門。力場比鎖子門或玻璃門有更高的耐久值。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: 船廠弧形區域內，要有１塊已連結的船塢核心錨。
Element.Original: Shipyard must have exactly one connected Shipyard Core Anchor \nin the shipyard shipyard arc area!

Element.Translation: 此分組的端點與其他分組不符合（ＸＹ）。
Element.Original: End Points of this Unit group doesn't match up another unit group (XY)

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_A basic tutorial about the logic system;StateC1
Element.Translation: 按「$SELECT_MODULE」選擇「觸發磚」，\n再按「$CONNECT_MODULE」與某塊方塊連結。
Element.Original: To connect a block, press $SELECT_MODULE on one activation\nblock to select it, and $CONNECT_MODULE on the block you want to\nconnect it to.

Element.Translation: 船隻控制系統無反應！\n「%s」秒。

警告！
 
船隻的推進器數量不足，
速度減慢。
Element.Original:
WARNING!
 
Not enough Thrusters for
 the mass of your ship
It will only move slowly

Element.Translation: 警告！達到伺服器的「質量／方塊」！\n解除推進！\n伺服器不容許多過
Element.Original: WARNING! SERVER MASS/BLOCK REACHED!\nThrust deactivated!\nServer doesn't allow more than

Element.Translation: 散發著柔和橙光的Sintyr水晶。
Element.Original: A block of Sintyr Crystal. It's orange in colour and emits a soft glow.

Element.Translation: 用於建立「電力輸出光線系統」（Power Supply Beam System），控制不限數量的「電力輸出裝置」，分成多組會增加電力消耗。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結電腦磚及輸出磚。$MAINCOMBI 按「$ACTIVATE」進入／離開電腦。
Element.Original: The Power Supply Computer is required for creating functioning Power Supply systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Power Supply Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Power Supply Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Power Supply Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.

Element.Translation: 玩家完成迷你遊戲的獎品。
Element.Original: A special prize item mainly used in player created mini-games.
Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 青綠色進階裝甲1/4（Teal Advanced Armor 1/4）
由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 無人（在選項取得所有權）

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;StateE
Element.Translation: 「或閘」是其中一個輸入端為「開」，輸出端就有「開」。
Element.Original: OR will look at all the blocks that are\nconnected to it and only output the 'on'\nsignal when ONE or more of the receiving signals is 'on'.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;StateF
Element.Translation: 「延遲元件」是輸入訊號並延遲才輸出訊號。
Element.Original:
Now to the delay block.
The delay block takes a signal on/off and
outputs it just like the activation block.
However, it will not do this immediately
but with a delay.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;StateG
Element.Translation: 「延遲元件」方便玩家建造「迴路」（Loop），例如時鐘等更複雜的電路。
Element.Original: The delay block enables players to build\nlooped systems like clocks, and many more\ncomplex circuits.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;StateH
Element.Translation: 網上有幾個講解基礎邏輯電路的網站。\n你可以在《StarMade》重建那些參考電路。
Element.Original: There are several internet sites to look up basic\nlogic gates. You can rebuild these in StarMade.

Element.Translation: 四面體棕色標準裝甲（Brown Standard Armor Tetra）

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;StateA
Element.Translation: 你已經知道怎樣連結方塊建造出遙控控制。\n現在你使用更多更複雜的方塊，例如「反閘」、「或閘」、「及閘」、「延遲元件」。
Element.Original:
As you now know, you can link blocks together
to make a chain to remote control
the block at the end. You can build
a lot more complex things though.
This is where the NOT, OR, AND, and DELAY blocks
come into play.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;StateB
Element.Translation: 上述方塊的連結方法，與觸發磚一樣。\n最簡單易明的是「反閘」，把輸入的訊號倒轉輸出，\n「開」（On） 變「關」（Off），反之亦然。
Element.Original:
Every one of these blocks can be linked just
like the activation blocks.
The simplest one to understand is probably the NOT block.
What it does is simply inverting an incoming signal
from 'on' to 'off' and vice versa.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;StateC
Element.Translation: 及閘、或閘比較複雜，有多個輸入端，可與任何邏輯方塊接上。
Element.Original:
The more complicated blocks are the
AND and OR blocks.
Those blocks will need multiple inputs.
The inputs can by any logic blocks, even OR and AND
themselves.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;StateD
Element.Translation: 「及閘」是所有輸入端為「開」，輸出端才有「開」。
Element.Original: AND will look at all the blocks that are\nconnected to it and only output the 'on'\nsignal when ALL of the receiving signals are 'on'.

Element.Translation: 藍色基礎裝甲3/4（Blue Basic Armor 3/4）
白色水晶裝甲1/4（White Crystal Armor 1/4）
由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
Mining bonus multiplier in this System:

Element.Translation:
太空站結構的「星際之門」（Warp Gate）讓玩家瞬間長距離空間跳躍，８個「星系」（System）共計１２８個「區域」（Sector）的距離。門的大小影響並持續消耗太空站的電力；船隻的質量影響每次通過門所消耗太空站的電力。

星際之門由１格深呈環狀的「星際之門裝置」所構成，與「星際之門電腦」連結。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結電腦磚及裝置磚，或「Shift＋V」集體連結。

在來源地及目的地皆建造星際之門後，手持「標記光線槍」連接２門，用槍右按來源地的電腦，左按目的地後會出現跳躍路線。可從「商人公會」的商人購入該槍。
Element.Original:
Warp Gates are a stationary structure that enables players to travel vast distances instantly. Their range is 8 systems (128 sectors). They have a permanent power cost based on their gate size and additionally a one time power cost per ship which passes through the gate. This cost is calculated on the mass of the warping ship. 

Warp Gates are constructed from a 1 block deep ring structure created from Warp Gate Modules. This must then be connected to a Warp Gate Computer. Press C on the computer, then V on the modules to link the two. Alternatively use Shift + V to mass link grouped modules.

After creating both the entry and exit gates at your target departure and destination structures, you must link the two with the Marker Beam. This handheld Support Tool is sold by Trade Guild vendors. Equipping the Marker Beam and Right Clicking on a Warp Gate Computer will “Mark” the departure structure. Left Clicking on the destination will pair the two and finalise the warp route.

Element.Translation: 星系擁有者的太空站位置：
從船廠的物品欄選擇設計。
Element.Original: Choose a Design from shipyard inventory.

Element.Translation: 拆除停泊的船隻，並成為船隻設計\n圖。船隻所有材料會送往相關的儲\n藏點。空間不足，會形成船隻殘骸。
Element.Original: Deconstructs currently docked Ship, and creates a design of it.\nAll resources of the ship will be placed here and in connected chests.\nIf there is no room, the rest will spawn at your position.

Element.Translation: 警告！這會拆除船隻成為材料，但「 不會」新增船隻設計圖！
Element.Original: Warning: this will disassemble your ship into its resources without creating a design!

Element.Translation:
拆除停泊的船隻。船隻所有材料會
送往相關的儲藏點。空間不足，會
形成船隻殘骸。警告！『不會』新
增船隻設計圖！
Element.Original:
Deconstructs currently docked Ship.
All resources of the ship will be placed here and in connected chests.
If there is no room, the rest will spawn at your position.
Warning: this will not create a design!

Element.Translation: 從相關的儲藏點收集材料。材料足\n夠後，按船隻設計圖建造出船隻。
Element.Original: Collects the resources in here and in connected chests. When all resources for the design are provided, the ship will be constructed and will become yours to take.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 楔形棕色基礎裝甲（Brown Basic Armor Wedge）
七面體粉紅色水晶裝甲（Pink Crystal Armor Hepta）
由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 最大的ＮＰＣ陣營數目（－１＝無限（通常２—１０個陣營））。
Element.Original: Maximum npc factions per galaxy (-1 for unlimited (will still be around 2-10))

Element.Translation: 藍色基礎裝甲（Blue Basic Armor）
可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的門磚組成大門。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
colliding into another object does damage

Element.Translation: 為輕傷的太空人提供名種治療。按「$ACTIVATE」觸發，短時間後才能重用。
Element.Original: Medical supply cabinets dispense a variety of treatments to heal astronauts who have suffered minor injuries. Press $ACTIVATE to Activate, a short cycling time must elapse before re-use is possible.
Change the name of the object

Element.Translation: 不能進入船廠的船隻設計圖。無發現核心。\n（可能程式錯誤，請到「phab.starma.de」附上記錄回報錯誤！）
Element.Original: Can't enter ship design. No core found.\n(Please report at help.star-made.org! This might be a bug)

Element.Translation: 不能進入船廠的船隻設計圖。訪問核心被拒。
Element.Original: Can't enter ship design. Core access denied.

Element.Translation: 最多只能命名\n１６個物品欄！
陣營權限不足，不能重新命名。
只容許使用「字母」、「數字」或「_-」！
Element.Original: Must only contain letters or numbers or ( _-)!

Element.Translation: 輸入儲藏點的新名稱（最長１０個字元）。
Element.Original: Enter a new name for this stash (10 characters max)

Element.Translation: 無載入船隻設計圖／無船隻停泊
Element.Original: no design loaded / no ship docked

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 路軌質量承托裝置系統

警告！
「能量流動」中彈！
反應爐效率「%s%%」！
「%s」秒。
Element.Original:
---WARNING---
Reactor Energy Stream has been hit!
Reactor efficiency at %s%%!
(%s sec)

Element.Translation: 用於建立「電力輸入光線系統」（Power Drain Beam System），控制不限數量的「電力輸入裝置」，分成多組會增加電力消耗。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結電腦磚及輸入磚。$MAINCOMBI 按「$ACTIVATE」進入／離開電腦。
Element.Original: The Power Drain Computer is required for creating functioning Power Drain systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Power Drain Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Power Drain Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Power Drain Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.

Element.Translation: 現在的停泊物或設計對船廠太大
Element.Original: current dock/design too large for this shipyard

Element.Translation:
～～ 傳送開始
目標逃離……
返回基地……
～～ 傳送完畢。
Element.Original:
#### Transmission Start
Target has fled...
Return to base...
#### Transmission End

Element.Translation:
～～ 傳送開始
敵人確認……
消滅……
～～ 傳送完畢。
「觸發大門」（Activation Gate）由１格深呈環狀的「觸發大門裝置」所構成，與「觸發大門控制裝置」連結。用來探測是否有物體經過大門，並輸出訊號往連結的邏輯系統。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結控制裝置及裝置磚，或「Shift＋V」集體連結。
Element.Original: Activation Gates are capable of detecting an entity passing through it's Gate structure, sending a True signal to any Logic block linked to the Controller.. The gate must be a solid, 1 block deep ring structure linked to a Activation Gate controller. To link your Activation Gate Controller to the Activation Gate Module structure, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.

Element.Translation: 白色進階裝甲（White Advanced Armor）
可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的門磚組成大門。防爆門比鎖子門或玻璃門有更高的耐久值。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Blast Doors are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Increases the jump distance of your Jump Drive.

Element.Translation: 四角錐體白燈（White Light Corner）
提供無窮無盡的電力並存於「電容」。發電量與發電機組的體積、形狀相關，完善的設計有發電加成，開始時每磚提供２５電力／秒，發電量１００萬以後一定下降。
Element.Original: Power Reactors provide an infinite source of power to supply your Power Capacitors. The rate at which these reactors generate energy is dependant on the specific size and layout of each group of connected modules as well as the total number of modules placed on a ship. Well designed groups of reactors may generate bonus power, although this bonus slowly declines until it reaches 1 Million power generation. Each module also adds a flat 25 power generation per second. This flat rate is always granted independantly of the bonus.

Element.Translation: 反應爐穩定器單元裝置
教學完成。\n請隨意參觀太空站，向ＮＰＣ打探有用的消息，\n或按「ESC」鍵及「離開教學」。
Element.Original: I've taught you everything I know.\nCheck around the station. There are still a lot of NPCs around that will tell you\nuseful information!When you are done, just hit ESC and hit the 'Exit Tutorial' button.

Element.Translation:
最後１堂課，最重要的教學——「合成」（Crafting），讓你合成及賺錢。

看「檢視樹狀圖」，底端是原料，按「配方」（Recipe）合成出各種方塊。
原料有２種，「水晶碎片」（Crystal Shard）及「礦石」（Ore Raw）。
把原料合成出「通用材料」（Generic Material）及「膠囊」（Capsule）。

通用材料有「合金網格」（Alloyed Metal Mesh） 及「晶體電路」（Crystal Circuit），用於基本合成。
膠囊是進階材料，用於進階合成，有連串的配方。
Element.Original:
This is the last and most important lesson: Crafting
It's the best way to make money and anything you'll need in this world.

The crafting is based on a tree, with raw resources at the bottom. Almost every block has a recipe,
that is based on those raw resources. There are two main types of raw materials: crystal shards and ore.
You can process them into generic materials and capsules:

- Generic materials are alloyed metal meshes and crystal circuits. They can be used to make anything basic.
- Advanced materials are capsules. They are specific and needed for the more advanced recipes.

Element.Translation:
利用太空衣合成出「基礎工廠」（Basic Factory）。

在基礎工廠合成出「提煉膠囊廠」及「標準工廠」（Standard Factory），
然後合成出「進階工廠」（Advanced Factory）。

如果無「發電機」，可以使用「電力供應槍」（Power Supply Beam）射向工廠磚臨時發電，並合成出發電機磚。
所以現在要講解如何從廢料合成出發電機磚。
Element.Original:
You can produce the basic factory block with your suit's tools as well.

The basic factory makes the capsule refinery as well as the standard factory for
more advanced crafting. There is even an advanced factory, which in turn is produced
in the standard factory.

Should you not have a power block for your factories, you can use your power supply tool to power
it, so you can make a few blocks in emergencies . That's what we are going to do now: Produce a power
block from scratch!

Element.Translation: 船隻結構的跳躍航行系統讓玩家瞬間空間跳躍，充填後跳躍最遠８個「區域」（Sector）距離。有２種到達目的地方法，直接對著目的地的方向跳躍，或在「導航」（Navigation） 的「導航點」（Waypoint） 輸入座標後跳躍。後者讓玩家跳躍少於８個區域距離。「跳躍航行電腦」與「跳躍航行裝置」連結，充填效率與磚數成正比，消耗的電力亦然。如同其他系統或效果，可以在武器欄把跳躍系統拖放到快捷欄使用。左按充填完成後右按跳躍，之後有１０秒冷卻。切記！在戰鬥中進行充填是危險行為，充填時改變船隻結構或中彈會重設跳躍系統，先保證船隻周圍安全後才再次充填。
Element.Original: Jump Drives are the portable version of structures that enable players to warp. You can put them on a ship, charge them up, and instantly travel up to 8 sectors. The destination to jump can be influenced in two ways. Either you jump in the direction you were looking at when engaging the jump drive, or you can use a more precise method. Entering a waypoint in the navigation panel will enable you to jump towards it no matter in which direction you look. It even puts you directly at your waypoint sector if it is fewer than 8 sectors away. Jump Drives can be placed like any other weapon or effect. They will appear in the weapon panel to put in the hotbar for use. Keep in mind that there is a sweet spot for jump Drive modules. You can build them as small as you want, but they will take much longer to charge the up. Placing more blocks than the sweet spot will make charging even faster, if you want a specialized jump ship. But keep the escalating power costs in mind. To charge, you have to hold the left mouse button like shooting a weapon. After it is charged, you can press right click to jump. The mechanic to actively have to charge up the Jump Drive is in place to make it more dangerous to use in battle. The drive has a small 10 second cooldown after jumps. But be warned, changing the blocks on a jump drive will reset the charge immediately. The charge will also be reset if hit, so make sure you are safe before starting to charge up (you can still of course do it while flying).

Element.Translation:
你可以徒手採礦，但是船隻打撈會更有效率；
太空衣可以提煉原料，但是工廠提煉會更有效率！

否則太空衣提煉後，通用材料的產量少，無膠囊。
使用「提煉膠囊廠」（Capsule Refinery）提煉膠囊。
Element.Original:
You can mine resources by hand just fine, but it's a lot more efficient using a salvage ship.
Also, you can process raw resources with your tools embedded in your astronaut suit.
It's much more efficient to use a factory block for that though!

Especially when refining raw resources, you won't get any capsules and less generic materials
if you don't use the Capsule Refinery block for that.

Element.Translation: 飛彈容量裝置（Missile Capacity Module）
提煉礦石的副產品。混合多種廢金屬合成出結實的合金網格磚。
Element.Original: A thin metal mesh. These blocks are byproducts of the ore refining process, combining less useful metals into a useable alloy that is then manufactured into a sturdy mesh block.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 警告！\n你的艦隊「%s」正在受損！
從「護罩充填器」接收、儲存並在物體周圍形成護罩。不像其他系統要求磚相互連接。儲存磚的數量計算出護罩容量。
Element.Original: The Shield Capacitor is capable of generating a shield around the object it is attached to. While it is not affected by the tradition(Adjacent) grouping mechanism, they are affected by the non-traditional (Non-adjacent) grouping mechanism. Meaning that two Shield Capacitors next to each other, and two that are apart but attached to the same object, will have the same storage capacity. Shield Capacitors are dependant on Shield-Rechargers to replenish the special energy they use to project their shields.
You have been kicked\nfrom the chat channel:\n%s

Element.Translation: 四面體綠色標準裝甲（Green Standard Armor Tetra）
混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由Parseen晶體合成的楔形進階電路。
Element.Original: An advanced circuit wedge that's manufactured from Parseen crystals.
Please enter a positive number for the amount.

Element.Translation: 四角錐體紅色標準裝甲（Red Standard Armor Corner）
太空技術維修裝置（Astrotech Module）

不能賣出「%s」。
商店正在等候此方塊的船運，
期間暫停購買貿易，
直到「%s」抵達。
Element.Original:
Cannot sell %s.
The other shop is currently awaiting a shipment of this block
and holds off from buying any more
until it arrives: ~%s

Element.Translation: 膠囊內懸浮著純金屬Threns的異次元原子。
Element.Original: Cubatoms of pure metalic Threns float suspended within this capsule.

Element.Translation: 警告！完整值低於「%s」非常危險，系統受損後會爆炸！
Element.Original: WARNING: A integrity lower than %s is dangerous and can lead to system implosion on damage!

Element.Translation: 四角錐體深灰色基礎裝甲（Dark Grey Basic Armor Corner）
由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 青綠色基礎裝甲（Teal Basic Armor）
由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 現在可以設定方塊作為價格。
Element.Original: It's currently now allowed to set block as price

Element.Translation: 七面體粉紅色標準裝甲（Pink Standard Armor Hepta）
由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
