Element.Translation: 上述是「合成教學」。\n感謝你閱讀、遊玩《StarMade》！
Element.Original: This concludes the Crafting Tutorial.\nThanks for reading, and thanks for playing\nStarMade!

Element.Translation: 警告！完整值低於「%s」非常危險，系統受損後會爆炸！
Element.Original: WARNING: A integrity lower than %s is dangerous and can lead to system implosion on damage!
Grass covers this lump of Soil.

Element.Translation: 警告！「%s」出現大量的邏輯延遲；\n區域「%s」。
Element.Original: WARNING: Too much logic lag caused by\n%s; in sector: %s

Element.Translation: 深灰色標準裝甲1/4（Dark Grey Standard Armor 1/4）
混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 加成下降，如果穩定器／電力的分組比例太細。
Element.Original: bonus efficiency goes down if there are smaller groups compared to the others

Element.Translation: 綠色基礎裝甲3/4（Green Basic Armor 3/4）
晶瑩剔透的Rammet碎片熠熠閃亮。數項技術需要這些碎片。
Element.Original: Glittering Rammet Shards reflect so much light they almost seem to glow. Several technologies are based upon the use of these shards once processed.

Element.Translation: 橙色進階裝甲3/4（Orange Advanced Armor 3/4）
移動艦隊到目標區域。艦隊會攻擊\n敵人，並在目標區域２個區域距離\n內追遂敵人。
Element.Original: Moves fleet to a sector. The fleet will attack any enemy in proximity. A ship will stop chasing if it is more than 2 sectors away from the target sector.

Element.Translation: 警告！「編隊處於發展階段，可能\n造成故障」。艦隊會保持編隊，直\n到敵人靠近會解散編隊並攻擊。
Element.Original: WARNING: FORMATION IS EXPERIMENTAL AND CAN CAUSE GLITCHES. Fleet will keep formation. If an enemy is nearby, they will break formation and attack.

Element.Translation: 警告！「編隊處於發展階段，可能\n造成故障」。艦隊會保持編隊，不\n攻擊敵人。
Element.Original: WARNING: FORMATION IS EXPERIMENTAL AND CAN CAUSE GLITCHES. Fleet will keep formation and not attack nearby enemies.

Element.Translation: 艦隊不保持編隊，敵人靠近就攻擊。
Element.Original: Fleet will not keep formation. Any nearby enemy will be attacked.

Element.Translation: 艦隊船隻回到旗艦最後停泊的降落點。
Element.Original: Fleet ships will return to the pickup area of the flagship they last used to dock.

Element.Translation: 旗艦以外所有艦隊船隻會開採此區\n域的小行星。
Element.Original: All fleet ships except the flag ship will try to mine astroids in this sector.

Element.Translation: 使用艦隊在區域之間貿易。
Element.Original: Use fleet to trade between sectors.

Element.Translation: 巡邏艦隊在現在及目標區域之間巡邏。
Element.Original: Patrols Fleet between current sector and target sector.

Element.Translation: 用於建立「護罩輸入光線系統」（Shield Drain Beam System），控制不限數量的「護罩輸入裝置」，分成多組會增加電力消耗。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結電腦磚及輸入磚。$MAINCOMBI 按「$ACTIVATE」進入／離開電腦。
Element.Original: The Shield Drain Computer is required for creating functioning Shield Drain systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Shield Drain Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Shield Drain Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Shield Drain Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.

Element.Translation: 艦隊所有船隻可以使用隱形。
Element.Original: All fleet ships cloak if they can.

Element.Translation: 綠色標準裝甲（Green Standard Armor）
觸發大門裝置（Activation Gate Module）
綠色警示裝甲1/4（Green Hazard Armor 1/4）
艦隊所有船隻不使用雷達干擾。
Element.Original: All fleet ships stop radar jamming if they can.

Element.Translation: 艦隊所有船隻可以使用雷達干擾。
Element.Original: All fleet ships radar jam if they can.

Element.Translation: 艦隊所有船隻不使用隱形。
Element.Original: All fleet ships uncloak if they can.

Element.Translation: 昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: 粉紅色標準裝甲3/4（Pink Standard Armor 3/4）
由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 伽瑪值（需要使用影格緩衝區）
設定使用哪個世界（設定old，使用舊的世界）。世界不存在會自動建立新的。
Element.Original: set world to use (set 'old' for using the old world). if no world exists a new one will be set automatically

Element.Translation: 需要與「觸發磚」互相連接才能運作。船隻或玩家進入觸發區域，控制裝置會觸發旁邊的觸發磚。
Element.Original: This controller has to be placed next to an activation module for it to work. If a ship or person enters the area blocks connected to this controller, it will activate all activation blocks next to this block.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: 楔形紅色水晶裝甲（Red Crystal Armor Wedge）
四角錐體藍色水晶裝甲（Blue Crystal Armor Corner）
設成你的陣營（需要陣營磚）。
Element.Original: Set as own Faction (needs faction block)
Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 提煉礦石的副產品。混合多種廢金屬合成出結實的合金網格磚。
Element.Original: A thin metal mesh. These blocks are byproducts of the ore refining process, combining less useful metals into a useable alloy that is then manufactured into a sturdy mesh block.
Faction %s is now at peace with %s

Element.Translation: 名稱無效！\n只容許使用「字母」、\n「數字」或「_-」！
Element.Original: Invalid name!\nMust only contain\nletters or numbers or '_', '-'

Element.Translation: 這會加入你的物品欄所有方塊到藍圖。\n（警告！不能取回。）
Element.Original: This adds as many items as possible\nfrom your inventory to this blueprint.\n(WARNING: you can't take items out of a blueprint again)

Element.Translation: 然後，在快捷欄選擇武器並左按開火。\n\n在那裡試一試。
Element.Original: Then, you just have to select the slot and left click to use them.\n\nTry them out over there, at the shooting range.

Element.Translation: 教學完成。\n與「ＮＰＣ—05」對話開始下一堂教學！
Element.Original: I've taught you everything I know.\nTalk to NPC-5 for the last lesson!

Element.Translation:
還有２堂教學。
現在我會講解怎樣使用隨身武器，在船外保護自己。
Element.Original:
Just two more basic things to learn and you are done.
You need something to defend yourself without a ship.

I'll tell you about using personal weapons.

Element.Translation: 我把鐳射手槍、狙擊步槍及火箭筒給你。\n按「Ｉ」開啟物品欄，拖放武器往快捷欄。\n
Element.Original: I'll give you a laser pistol, sniper rifle and a rocket launcher.\nJust hit 'I' to open your inventory and drag them to your quick bar.\n

Element.Translation: 青綠色進階裝甲3/4（Teal Advanced Armor 3/4）
與「打撈電腦」連結，組成「打撈系統」（Salvage System）。射出直線的打撈光線，效率與互相連接的磚數成正比。按「$ACTIVATE」決定那一格打撈磚作為砲口。總括而言，打撈磚用於打撈破船、廢棄的太空站、開採小行星及星球。
Element.Original: The Salvage Module, when used in conjunction with a Salvage Computer, can create a basic but effective salvage/mining system. The Salvage Module fires a salvage beam in a straight line. Salvage Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their salvage speed. You can also choose which block outputs the beam by finding the Salvage Module you want to output the beam, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it. Salvage Modules can be used to Salvage parts from inactive or defeated Ships and Stations or mine Asteroids and Planets for resources.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 進階商店有４塊路軌停泊磚，讓其成為中立的總部（所有停泊物皆無敵）。
Element.Original: Advanced shops will have 4 rails dockers that can be used like a neutral homebase (anything docked is safe)

Element.Translation: 無效的區域多久從記億完全移除（秒，－１＝永不）。
Element.Original: Time in secs after which inactive sectors are completely removed from memory (-1 = off)

Element.Translation: 大門的目的地太遠！\n 區域距離「%s」，\n只容許最遠「%s」區域距離。
Element.Original: Gate Destination too far!\nDistance in Sectors: %s,\nbut max %s Sectors possible
require star-made.org authentication (USE_STARMADE_AUTHENTICATION must be true)

Element.Translation: 不能跳躍航行到有星球的區域「%s」。
錯誤！卸載船隻設計圖失敗！\n不能上傳船隻設計圖！
Element.Original: Error: Cannot unload design!\nNo Design Loaded!

Element.Translation: １個帳戶有多少受保護的玩家名稱 （超過此數值，最舊登入的玩家名稱不受保護）。
Element.Original: How many player names a player may protect with his account (if exceeded, the player name, that was logged in the longest time ago gets unprotected)

Element.Translation: 不能直接跳躍到有總部的區域「%s」。
由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 區域多久變成無效的（秒，－１＝永不）。
Element.Original: Time in secs after which sectors go inactive (-1 = off)

Element.Translation: 過了多久移除無效的區域

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;End
Element.Translation: 上述是「陣營教學」。\n感謝你閱讀、遊玩《StarMade》！
Element.Original: This concludes the Faction Tutorial.\nThanks for reading, and thanks for playing\nStarMade!

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 物品在太空漂浮多久才消失（秒）。
Element.Original: How much seconds items floating in space should be alive

Element.Translation: true，藍圖的預設是私人（否則是公共）。
Element.Original: If true, set blueprints private as default (else they are public)

Element.Translation: 模擬貿易去補充商店貨品

Element.Original: Trading guild will deliver stock to shops
How much seconds between simulation spawn ticks

Element.Translation: 與伺服器失去連線。\n\n（Actual Exception「%s」）
Element.Original: You have been disconnected from the Server\n\n(Actual Exception: %s)

Element.Translation: 設定宇宙的區域體積。『警告』！ 重設已存在宇宙的可能造成問題！
Element.Original: Sets the size of sectors in the universe **WARNING** scaling the size of an existing universe down may cause issues

Element.Translation: 伺服器內有不明物體……\n正在重新請求……

Element.Original: Select the item you want to take.

Element.Translation: 加入多少塊「%s」到藍圖？（警告！不能取回。）
Element.Original: How many %s do you want\nto use for this blueprint?\n(Warning: once used, you can't get the resource back)

Element.Translation: 不可用的物品（測試合成系統）。
Element.Original: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)
You are not in a faction!
Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 楔形灰色基礎裝甲（Grey Basic Armor Wedge）
反應爐的後勤反應室（Reactor Logistics Chamber）
跳躍到此區域的太空站\n「%s」。
大門的目的地太遠！\n 區域距離「%s」，\n只容許最遠「%s」區域距離。
Element.Original: Gate Destination too far!\nDistance in Sectors: %s,\nbut max %s Sectors possible

Element.Translation: 大門的目的地無效！\n未發現目的地的結構！
混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 不能放置方塊，\n其他物體的障礙。
Element.Original:
One or more blocks
could not be placed
because they are blocked
by another structure

Element.Translation: 不能移除方塊！\n物品欄滿載！
不能取代成選釋的方塊種類！
Element.Original: Can't replace this block with that type!

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 反應爐不支持的星際之門！
Element.Original: Reactor doesn't support direct warp gates!

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 船隻速度以ｍ／ｓ計算。數值太大可能有穿隧效果。
Element.Original: How fast ships, etc. may go in m/s . Too high values may induce physics tunneling effects

Element.Translation: 七面體深灰色基礎裝甲（Dark Grey Basic Armor Hepta）

Element.Original: Enable super admin for this server
Max number of clients allowed on this server

Element.Translation: 輸入指定的ＩＰ讓伺服器進行監聽。使用「all」監聽所有ＩＰ。
Element.Original: Enter specific ip for the server to listen to. use \"all\" to listen on every ip
Super admin password for this server

Element.Translation: 黑色標準裝甲（Black Standard Armor）
由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 裝飾用藍色控制台（Decorative Console（Blue））

Element.Original: This is a set of decorative pipes.

Element.Translation: 撞擊造成損傷的閾值（數值越小，細力量會造成損傷）。
Element.Original: Threshold of Impulse that does damage (the lower, the less force is needed for damage)

Element.Translation: 棕色基礎裝甲3/4（Brown Basic Armor 3/4）

Element.Original: if off, skin uploading to server is deactivated

Element.Translation: 強化電力性能的反應室。\n\r需要「反應爐管道」連接「反應室」及「反應爐電力」。
Element.Original: Reactor Chamber to enhance power.\n\rNeeds to be physically connected with a Power Reactor by using Reactor Conduit blocks.

Element.Translation: false，存檔檔名撞上相同的會拒絕存檔；true，自動在檔名後加上數字。
Element.Original: if off, saving with an existing entry is denied, if on the name is automatically changed by adding numbers on the end

Element.Translation: 目錄自動處理「檔案名稱問題」
伺服器多久自動存檔１次（秒，－１＝永不）。
Element.Original: Time interval in secs the server will autosave (-1 for never)

Element.Translation: 觸發抗減慢模式前先做多久的撞擊測試（毫秒）。
Element.Original: Milliseconds a collision test may take before anti-slowdown mode is activated

Element.Translation: 有２種原料——碎片（Shard）及礦石（Ore），\n再細分成各種類。\n在基本的合成，原料的顏色不是問題。
Element.Original:
There are two kinds of raw resources:
Ores and Shards. There are several
types of each to find in this world.
For basic crafting, the color doesn't matter.

Element.Translation: 昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: 小行星有動態物理特性
「一日」有多長。（恆星系統的轉動）（秒，－１無轉動）
Element.Original: how long is a 'day' (stellar system rotation) in milliseconds (-1 to switch off system rotation)

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 箱子裡物品生成的倍數（數值小於１＝更少，０＝無）。
Element.Original: multiply amount of items spawned in chests of generated chests. use values smaller 1 for less and 0 for none

Element.Translation: 玩家有多少船隻藍圖的存檔（－１＝無限）。
Element.Original: How many slots per player for saved ships (-1 for unlimited)

Element.Translation: 做得好！正在合成出發電機。
Element.Original: Great! as you can see, it will\nproduce a power module now.
colliding into another object does damage

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 除錯（清楚明白後才開啟）。
Element.Original: debug (don't activate unless you know what you're doing)

Element.Translation: 船隻在商店重新啟動的費用（在太空中重啟會以秒計算費用）。
Element.Original: Cost to reboot a ship at a shop (per second it would take to reboot in space)

Element.Translation: 啟用小行星可以太空移動。
Element.Original: enables asteroids to be able to move in space

Element.Translation: 星球的每面疏散分佈 、隨機供應兩種原料。
Element.Original: Planets however always have two random\nkinds of minerals per side, but they\nare more sparsely distributed.

Element.Translation: 指定小行星供應指定原料。
Element.Original: Specific asteroid types will always contain\nthe same mineral types.

Element.Translation: 在合成的「配方」（Recipe），「網格」及「電路」是最基本的材料。\n需要１０塊網格或電路合成出「基礎工廠」。
Element.Original:
Meshes and Circuits are your main ingredients
for all basic crafting recipes. You only need
10 of either Metal Mesh or Crystal Circuits
to make the basic factory.

Element.Translation: 多挖一些「Hattel碎片」！\n用滑鼠滾輪不選擇武器，對著礦物右按。
Element.Original:
Please mine some Hattel Shards!
Deselect any weapon (mouse wheel)
and hold the right mouse button
on the minerals.

Element.Translation: 好的，這裡礦物資源豐富，我們開挖吧！
Element.Original:
Ok, there is a big stack
of mineral rich resources
over there.
Let's go mining

Element.Translation: 不錯，你湊足材料。\n宇宙中，各種原料分佈在星球及小行星。
Element.Original: Great, you have all the resources you need.\nThroughout the universe many different types\nof minerals can be found on planets and asteroids.

Element.Translation: 四面體紅色標準裝甲（Red Standard Armor Tetra）
多挖一些「Threns礦石」！\n用滑鼠滾輪不選擇武器，對著礦物右按。
Element.Original:
Please mine some Threns ore.
Deselect any weapon (mouse wheel)
and hold the right mouse button
on the minerals!

Element.Translation: 四角錐體藍色標準裝甲（Blue Standard Armor Corner）
按「改變合成」按鈕，打字輸入「電力」（Power），\n在下拉式選單選擇「發電機」（Power Reactor Module），設定工廠合成。
Element.Original:
Press the 'Change Production' button, and type
in 'power', then hit the drop down
and select 'power reactor module'
to setup the factory

Element.Translation: 如你所見，這裡可以存取物品，與快捷欄一樣。
Element.Original: As you can see, you can put things\ninto the factory or pull them out,\njust like you would do with your hotbar.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 現在放入合金網格。\n（有需要的，我會給你）
Element.Original: Now just throw in your metal mesh in\n(I will give you some if you need any).

Element.Translation: 現在工廠會合成出「發電機」。\n按「檢視樹狀圖」按鈕查閱需要的材料。
Element.Original:
Awesome! The factory will now produce power
recharge modules.
Oh, and with the 'View Graph' button you can
always check what you need to
produce an item.

Element.Translation: 不錯！你合成出「基礎工廠」！\n工廠合成需要電力，這裡太空站電力充足！\n在太空生存，用「電力供應槍」供電。
Element.Original:
Awesome! You now have a basic factory!
Remember that factories need power
to produce! This station has enough power though!
Should you ever be in a survival situation,
use a personal power beam to provide power.

Element.Translation: 黑色基礎裝甲（Black Basic Armor）

Element.Original: How many %s do you want to take?

Element.Translation: 好！現在對著工廠按「$ACTIVATE」開啟。
Element.Original: Great!, now press '$ACTIVATE' on the factory\nto open it.

Element.Translation: 取消等候回覆的貿易請求
把「基礎工廠」磚放在標示的位置。
Element.Original: Now place the basic factory on the\nmarked position.

Element.Translation: 目錄面板無的藍圖預設選項。
Element.Original: Default option for blueprints not in catalog yet

Element.Translation: 藍圖的預設權限「敵人使用」
目錄面板無的藍圖預設選項。
Element.Original: Default option for blueprints not in catalog yet

Element.Translation: 藍圖的預設權限「陣營使用」

教學完成。
與「ＮＰＣ—01」對話開始下一堂教學！

再見！
Element.Original:
I've taught you everything I know.
Talk to NPC-1 to start the next part of this tutorial!

Have a good tick!

Element.Translation:
已儲存你物品欄的物品，離開教學後退還。
我們會在你的物品欄或快捷欄，準備了新物品。

按「Ｉ」開啟物品欄並拖放物品往畫面下方的快捷欄。
之後利用「滑鼠滾輪」或「鍵盤橫排數字欄」選擇快捷欄內的物品。
Element.Original:
We saved all the stuff you had in your inventory, you'll get it back when you complete or exit the tutorial.
We're going to give you some things along the way too.

Those are placed either in your quick bar, or when that is full, in your inventory.
You can open the inventory with 'I' and drag blocks
and items into your quick bar at the bottom.
Then you can either use the mouse wheel or keyboard numbers to select the
item you want to use.

Element.Translation:
好！

現在開始基礎教學。
對話時或開啟教學視窗後，你不能動作。
在亙動教學，你可以四處走動及嘗試。
按「下一步」教學視窗會顯示各環節的內容。
Element.Original:
Ah, great! That's much better!

Now let's go over some basics:
As long as you are talking or a tutorial window is open, you can't perform any actions.
However, there will be plenty of interactive steps where you can freely move around and try things out.
You will see that an interactive step is coming up if "(press next to take control)" appears
in the tutorial window.

Element.Translation: 方塊設定的語法分析。\n在伺服器失敗！
true，其他陣營的船隻不能被更改、觸發或進入。
Element.Original: If true, ships of other factions cant be edited, activated, or entered
All right, show me the way!

Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Blast Doors are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Grass covers this lump of Rock.

Element.Translation: 膠囊內懸浮著礦物Chabaz的異次元原子。
Element.Original: Cubatoms of Chabaz minerals float suspended within this capsule.

Element.Translation:
你好！
我挺喜歡「商人公會」，但是外面還有很多不錯的陣營！

開啟「陣營面板」（Faction Panel） 建立「你的陣營」。
好處是你可以發布消息、設定階級、各種設定，當中最重要是建立「總部」（Home Base）。
一般情況，總部是無敵的，停泊在總部的船隻都是。

每個陣營只有１處總部，所以選址好重要。

同時你可以「宣稱」星系，納入你的領土。
在領土內採礦，產量加成１２倍。
掃描距離增加，有人進入領土，你都會收到消息！

如何擴張領土？你需要花費「陣營點數」（Faction Points）。
在陣營面板可以查詢點數，日後利用點數建立任務、臨時保護你其他太空站。
如果你在領土耗費太多點數或成員死亡次數過多，你會損失領土，甚至讓總部陷入危險。
第１塊領土是免費提供！
Element.Original:
Hello there.
I really love being in the trading guild, but there are other awesome factions out there!

You can even create your own in the faction panel.
Having a faction is especially useful when you are in the same universe as other humans like you.
You have news posts, ranks, settings, and what is most important: A home base.
Home bases can't be destroyed normally, so it's the perfect place to dock your ship to,
as it will get the same protection as the base.

Each faction can only have one home base though, so choose its location carefully.

But, home bases are not the only great thing about factions. You can also claim whole star systems as your
territory. Mining in your territory will give you a 12x mining yield bonus and you'll also receive a message
every time a human enters one of your systems. Your scan range is increased as well!

Territory doesn't come for free though. You have to pay for them with Faction Points [FP]. Check out the faction
point reports in your faction panel. You can later also use faction points to create missions and temporarily protect stations other
than your own home base. If you spend too many on territory or your faction members die too often, you will lose territory
and in the end even your home base can become vulnerable, but that rarely happens if you don't take a risk.
The first territory is also free!

Element.Translation: 使用「方向鍵」切換停泊鏈。
Element.Original: Use the cursor Keys to cycle\nthrough docked structures

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 四面體深灰色基礎裝甲（Dark Grey Basic Armor Tetra）

Element.Original: Glittering Parseen Shards reflect so much light they almost seem to glow. Several technologies are based upon the use of these shards once processed.

Element.Translation: 四角錐體青綠色進階裝甲（Teal Standard Armor Corner）

Element.Original: See, what happens if you 'slave'\nthe missile to the\ncannon.

Element.Translation: 旁邊房間有２塊電腦磚，分別是火砲及飛彈電腦。\n無甚麼特別！

Those two computers
in that other room
are just a cannon and a missile.
Nothing special!

Element.Translation: 當１塊飛彈磚與１００塊砲管連結，\n散彈槍效果只有１％。
Element.Original:
But if you had 1 missile module
connected to 100 cannon modules,
the resultant shotgun effect would
only be 1%.

Element.Translation: 攻擊效果取決於２種武器的比例，\n例如１：１有１００％效果。
Element.Original:
The effect is based on the ratio
of the two weapons.
Since the ratio of these two weapons
are 1 to 1, the resultant effect is
100%.

Element.Translation: 看 ！火砲變成散彈槍。\n噢，我忘記跟你講重點……
Element.Original: Check it out! The cannon is now a\nshotgun!\nOh and I forgot something important...

Element.Translation: 功用與「基礎路軌」相似，只是無顯示物體。與「降落點」互相連接才能運作。
Element.Original: Pickup Rails are a non physical, non visible block that functions as a basic rail. To enable automatic docking to it, a Pickup Area module must be placed adjacent to the Pickup Rail.

Element.Original: By changing the ratio, you can\ncustomize each weapon system to your\nliking.

Element.Translation: 武器組合的攻擊力，與２種分開的武器一樣。\n千萬別輕視武器組合。
Element.Original:
A combined weapon will always have the
same damage per second as the two weapons
separately, so there is no downside to
combining weapon systems.

Element.Translation: 簡單有效的炸藥，威力與數量成正比。用於打開缺口、撞角、自爆、陷阱、清拆等。引爆方法有衝擊、人手、射擊、邏輯系統。按「$ACTIVATE」引爆。
Element.Original: The Warhead is a simple, but effective explosive. It can be grouped with other warheads to increase the explosion created. They may be activated by collisions, triggered by logic systems, manual triggering (risky stuff), or simply shot. The can be used for ramming, self destruct systems, breaching charges, traps, demolition and more. Press $ACTIVATE to detonate

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。

Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 紅色水晶裝甲（Red Crystal Armor）
工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 加快爆發推進的充填速度。
Element.Original: Increases the recharge speed of your Thrust Blast.

Element.Translation: 從各種膠囊合成出基本材料。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉工廠的物品欄，放置配方需要的材料。
Element.Original: Manufactures basic crafting parts from generic capsule types. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close the Factory's Internal Inventory. (Used for placing the necessary materials for recipes.)

Element.Translation: 綠色進階裝甲（Green Advanced Armor）
「裝甲值」（Armor HP）與「耐久值」幾乎一樣，分別在不同的方塊特性。\n你可以在商店花費金錢維修。\n裝甲值會吸收所有傷害的５０％。
Element.Original:
Armor follows the same principle as structure HP, with the
difference that different blocks provide it, and that you can
only reset it to 100% on shops for credits.
Armor absorbs 50% of all damage as long as you have any armor left.

Element.Translation:
「重新啟動」系統可以回復１００％耐久值。
在建造模式按「$REBOOT_SYSTEMS」重啟，船隻大小及損失耐久值決定等候重啟的時間。
亦可以在商店花費金錢重啟。
船隻過熱時你不能重入船隻核心，等候重啟後方能進入。
Element.Original:
To reset your HP to 100% you will have to 'reboot' your systems.
This can be done by pressing '$REBOOT_SYSTEMS' in build mode. Rebooting takes
time depending on your lost HP and ship size, but can also be done
instantly on shops for credits.
When overheating you cannot enter the ship again until rebooted.
At this point you will be promted to reboot if you try to enter
the core.

Element.Translation: 按船上「系統」方塊的總數，例如電力、護罩等計算出船隻的「耐久值」（HP）。\n損失上述方塊，耐久值隨之下降，並有負面效果。\n降到５０％耐久值，船隻開始「過熱」（Overheat），你要決定維修船隻還是逃離。
Element.Original:
Your ship HP depend on how many 'System' blocks
like power, weapons, or shields you have on your ship.
When you lose those blocks, your HP will go down, which has
several negative effects.
Your ship will start overheating at 50%. At that point you will
have to decide if you want to try to rescue your ship or flee.

Element.Translation: 可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的門磚組成大門。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Original: Cubatoms of pure crystaline Nocx float suspended within this capsule.

Screen settings changed. Keep?
(Will automatically revert back in %s seconds)
NOTICE FOR 4k MONITOR OWNERS ON WINDOWS10: There is a scaling issue in fullscreen due
to Windows DPI scaling. Until a thirdparty library update can resolve this automatically,
there is a workaround:
1. For steam: Right click on StarMade -> properties -> local files Tab -> Browse local files button2. navigate to the dep\java\jre1.7.0_80\bin folder
3. here, right click on "javaw.exe" (must have the w on the end), and go to properties.
4. Go to the "compatibility" tab and check the "override high DPI scaling behavior." checkbox and Select "System" in the dropdown.

Element.Translation:
喂，過來！

按「O」跟我一起坐。
你對著最近的邊緣，決定你坐下來的方向！

試試坐上我對面的座位。
Element.Original:
Hi there!

 Do you want to sit like me? Just press 'O' on any surface.
The closest edge to where you are looking at determines which direction you'll sit!

Try it out on the chair at the other side of the table.

Element.Translation: 用於建立「打撈系統」（Salvage System），控制不限數量的「打撈裝置」，分成多組會增加電力消耗。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結電腦磚及打撈磚。$MAINCOMBI 按「$ACTIVATE」進入／離開電腦。
Element.Original: The Salvage Computer is required for creating functioning Salvage/Mining systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Salvage Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Salvage Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Salvage Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.

Element.Translation: 船隻內部搖控（Inner Ship Remote）
