「反應爐的反應室」為物體提供「跳躍航行」、「雷達掃描」、「隱形」等功能。\n放置「反應爐管道」在「反應爐電力」及「反應室」之間，或相同種類的「反應室」\n之間構成「反應爐鏈」，並自動連結。「反應爐鏈」有加強功能的效果。
Element.Original: Reactor chambers improve the functionality of your ship (jump drive, scanners, cloak, etc). Place down a chamber block and use conduit blocs it to your main reactor.\nYou can chain multiple reactor chambers together to get even more effects for your structure.

Element.Translation:
錯誤！
多位玩家正在控制同一名太空人
「%s」。
請附上記錄回報錯誤。
Element.Original:
Error: There is something
with the astronaut
more than one player is attached
%s
please report this.

Element.Translation: 啟用生成舊版本的海盜太空站。
Element.Original: enables spawning of old style pirate stations

Element.Translation: 貫穿效果電腦（Punch-Through Effect Computer）
為物體及玩家提供擴散的重力。
Element.Original: Enables Personal Gravity, providing a radial gravity field the size of your structure.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 用於建立「飛彈系統」（Missile System），控制不限數量的「飛彈管」，分成多組會增加電力消耗。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結電腦磚及飛彈磚。$MAINCOMBI 按「$ACTIVATE」進入／離開電腦。
Element.Original: The Missile Computer is required for creating functioning missile systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Missile Tubes, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Missile Tubes using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Missile Tube. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.

Element.Translation: 綠色警示裝甲3/4（Green Hazard Armor 3/4）
由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 所有船隻、太空站的電力儲存裝置。存電量與小組的體積成正比，當容量低於供應有浪費電力；當使用量高於容量有缺電並且影響系統運作。
Element.Original: Power Capacitors are what all ship systems draw their power from. Larger connected groups allow for more power to be stored per block used. If the total power capacity of a structure is less than that of the structures power generation, the excess power is lost. Systems trying to draw more power than is available in the power storage will have difficulty operating as well.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 掃描充填完成！\n右按觸發！
裝置方塊／需要的裝置方塊
在溫帶行星生長的小莓果灌木。
Element.Original: A small berry bush. Commonly found on temperate planets.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 這玩意好爽，你都過來玩無所不能的邏輯系統，\n一起砌出積體電路。
Element.Original: Check this cool contraption I made. You can pretty much do anything with the logic blocks, as they\nwork just like electrical circuits.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 藍色進階裝甲3/4（Blue Advanced Armor 3/4）
由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 綠色進階裝甲3/4（Green Advanced Armor 3/4）
容易合成，簡單的燈管提供照明。
Element.Original: Simple to create, Light Rods are an easy way to add some lighting to the area.

Element.Translation:
「傳送門」（Transporter）讓玩家在傳送門之間轉移。傳送門分別與各自的「傳送門控制裝置」及「傳送門裝置」連結。

預設是「私人」只會接受私人的傳送要求；
「公共訪問」接受範圍內所有傳送要求；
「陣營通行」接受範圍內陣營成員的傳送要求。

轉移時會減少船隻、太空站的護罩。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結控制裝置及裝置磚，或「Shift＋V」集體連結。
Element.Original:
The Transporter allows you to teleport to other nearby Transporters. Both Transporter Controllers need to be connected to their own Transporter Modules. Each Controller can have multiple Modules.

Default mode is “Private”, these transporters can only targeted by other transporters on the same entity.
“Public Access” can be targeted by any transporter in range. Using it however will drop both the shields of the ship you transported from and to.
“Faction access” can be targeted by any transporter in range that belongs to the same Faction. Shields will also drop on transporting.

To link your Transporter controller to its Transporter Modules, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.

Element.Translation: 警告！\n \n無雷達掃描裝置與條目連結。
Element.Original:
WARNING!
 
No Scanner Modules
connected to entry point

Element.Translation: 七面體灰色標準裝甲（Grey Standard Armor Hepta）
警告！\n \n雷達掃描電力不足：
＃佇列內畫出的分段正在更新。\n請站在原地不要再新增物體！
Element.Original:
#SegmentsDrawn count will update
when all queued up
updates are done.
Please stand still to not queue new ones!

Element.Translation: 四面體紫色標準裝甲（Purple Standard Armor Tetra）
儲存多少玩家登入的記錄（名稱、ＩＰ、帳戶、時間）。
Element.Original: How many login history objects (with name, IP, account-name, and time) should be saved by player state
Choose a new name for your universe.

Element.Translation: 不能停泊，\n其他物體的障礙。
Element.Original: Docker can't be placed here because it is blocked\nby another structure

Element.Translation: 正在重新啟動，\n不能放置方塊！\n（%s）

Element.Original: Place core at a free position!

Element.Translation: 不能放置核心，\n其他物體的障礙。
Element.Original: Core cannot be placed here\nbecause it is blocked\nby another structure

Element.Translation: 在受損船隻放置方塊有負面效果！\n請重新啟動船隻後才建造。
Element.Original:
Placing blocks on a damaged ship
can lead to negative effects!
Please reboot the ship before placing
any blocks.
Please place on a rail surface!

Element.Translation: 在損傷的船隻放置裝甲方塊不會增加任何裝甲值！\n請在商店維修船隻，\n或在太空站重啟船隻後才放置。
Element.Original:
Placing armor on a ship that is not at 100%
will not add any additional armor!
Please repair the ship at a shop before placing
any armor blocks
Stations will repair all armor on reboot.

Element.Translation: 錯誤！\n \n不能這樣做！你只是旁觀者！
Element.Original:
ERROR
 
Can't do that!
You are a spectator!

Element.Translation: 不能放置！\n不是建築材料！
Element.Original: Cannot be placed!\nThis is not a building element!

Element.Translation:
警告！
請先放置火砲電腦，
或無自動連結武器。
（需要人手連結）
Element.Original:
Please place the cannon
computer first or else your
weapons aren't connected.
(you'll learn manual later)
Use %s to open the Shape Radial Menu

Element.Translation: 四角錐體黑色標準裝甲（Black Standard Armor Corner）
膠囊內懸浮著礦物Cinnabar的異次元原子。
Element.Original: Cubatoms of Cinnabar minerals float suspended within this capsule.

Element.Translation: 粉紅色水晶裝甲1/4（Pink Crystal Armor 1/4）

船隻結構的跳躍航行系統讓玩家瞬間空間跳躍，充填後跳躍最遠８個「區域」（Sector）距離。有２種到達目的地方法，直接對著目的地的方向跳躍，或在「導航」（Navigation） 的「導航點」（Waypoint） 輸入座標後跳躍。後者讓玩家跳躍少於８個區域距離。「跳躍航行電腦」與「跳躍航行裝置」連結，充填效率與磚數成正比，消耗的電力亦然。如同其他系統或效果，可以在武器欄把跳躍系統拖放到快捷欄使用。左按充填完成後右按跳躍，之後有１０秒冷卻。切記！在戰鬥中進行充填是危險行為，充填時改變船隻結構或中彈會重設跳躍系統，先保證船隻周圍安全後才再次充填。
Element.Original: Jump Drives are the portable version of structures that enable players to warp. You can put them on a ship, charge them up, and instantly travel up to 8 sectors. The destination to jump can be influenced in two ways. Either you jump in the direction you were looking at when engaging the jump drive, or you can use a more precise method. Entering a waypoint in the navigation panel will enable you to jump towards it no matter in which direction you look. It even puts you directly at your waypoint sector if it is fewer than 8 sectors away. Jump Drives can be placed like any other weapon or effect. They will appear in the weapon panel to put in the hotbar for use. Keep in mind that there is a sweet spot for jump Drive modules. You can build them as small as you want, but they will take much longer to charge the up. Placing more blocks than the sweet spot will make charging even faster, if you want a specialized jump ship. But keep the escalating power costs in mind. To charge, you have to hold the left mouse button like shooting a weapon. After it is charged, you can press right click to jump. The mechanic to actively have to charge up the Jump Drive is in place to make it more dangerous to use in battle. The drive has a small 10 second cooldown after jumps. But be warned, changing the blocks on a jump drive will reset the charge immediately. The charge will also be reset if hit, so make sure you are safe before starting to charge up (you can still of course do it while flying).

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 四角錐體棕色基礎裝甲（Brown Basic Armor Corner）
加快雷達掃描的充填速度。
Element.Original: Increases the recharge speed of your Scanner.

Element.Translation: 紅色進階裝甲3/4（Red Advanced Armor 3/4）
反應爐的偵察反應室（Reactor Recon Chamber）

為各系統供應電力，需要「反應爐穩定器」運作。

低穩定度減少供電；穩定度無１００％有高爆炸性。
即是反應爐鏈中彈後，內部爆炸造成更大的傷害。

建議穩定度１００％才投入戰鬥。
Element.Original:
Provides basic power regeneration that many other systems rely on. 
Requires Stabilizers to function properly.

If your Stabilization is too low, you will have reduced power generation.
The Reactor and its Chambers are also highly reactive unless you have 100% or more Stabilization.
Upon taking damage, your Reactor components will take additional damage from internal explosions.

It's advised to have more than 100% Stabilization to avoid taking extra damage when in combat.

Element.Translation: 塗上黑色警示條紋的黃色標準裝甲。
Element.Original: Yellow Standard Armor that has been emblazoned with black caution stripes.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 顯示數據的裝飾用電子儀表。
Element.Original: A decorative electrical panel displaying statistics.

Element.Translation: 反應爐穩定器節點（Reactor Stabilizer Stream Node）
楔形綠色警示裝甲（Green Hazard Armor Wedge）
微型裝配擴產裝置（Micro Assembler Enhancer）
散發著柔和黑光的楔形Nocx水晶。
Element.Original: A wedge of Nocx Crystal. It's black in colour and emits a soft glow.

Element.Translation: 使用ＮＩＯ時，資料檔案的ＭＢ限制（更快速）（使用２的倍數）。
Element.Original: megabyte limit of .data file when to use NIO (faster) (must be power of 2)

Element.Translation: 完成掃描「%s」的貨物，請查閱郵件。
Element.Original: Scanning cargo of %s completed. Check your mail

Element.Translation: 星際之門裝置（Warp Gate Module）
雷達掃描完成充填！\n右按掃描！
Element.Original: Scanner Charged!\nRight click on icon to scan!

Element.Translation: 雷達掃描未完成充填！\n左按充填！
Element.Original: Scanner not charged\nHold left mouse to charge!

Element.Translation: 不能掃描！\n雷達掃描冷卻！\n倒數「%d」秒。
警告！\n \n雷達掃描電力不足！
脈衝攻擊電腦（Damage Pulse Computer）
「%s」\n\n藍圖會在你的物品欄，右按藍圖查閱需要的材料。
Element.Original:
%s

This will put the blueprint in your inventory.
Right click on it to provide the necessary materials.

Element.Translation: 太空站藍圖花費「%s」金錢！\n現有金錢「%s」。
Element.Original: A station blueprint costs %s Credits!\nYou currently have %s Credits.

Element.Translation: 確定要刪除此條目？（伺服器會備份）
Element.Original: Do you really want to delete this entry?\n(a backup will be created on the server)

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_A basic tutorial about the logic system;StateA
Element.Translation: 《StarMade》內置一個集成的，圖靈完備性（Turing completeness） 的邏輯系統。\n讓你建造出功能齊備的ＣＰＵ。
Element.Original: StarMade has a fully integrated, Turing complete logic system.\nThis means you could build a fully functional CPU\nwithin StarMade.

Element.Translation: 錯誤！\n不能刪除！不是你的！
Element.Original: ERROR:\nCannot delete!\nYou do not own this!

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_A basic tutorial about the logic system;StateB
Element.Translation: 「邏輯系統」（Logic System）由相亙連結的「邏輯閘」（Logic gate）方塊組成，\n系統的結構與積體電路的相似。
Element.Original:
The system works by connecting
blocks with each other to create
basic circuits similar to electronic ones.
These circuits are called 'logic gates'.

Element.Translation: 只容許使用「字母」、「數字」或「_-」！
Element.Original: Must only contain Letters or numbers or (_-)!

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_A basic tutorial about the logic system;StateC
Element.Translation: 當中最重要的方塊是「觸發磚」（Activation Module），\n按「$ACTIVATE」開關，\n並輸出訊號往相互連結的方塊。
Element.Original:
The most important block in the logic system
is the 'Activation Block'. This block can be
turned on and off by pressing $ACTIVATE on it.
It can also share this on/off signal to all the blocks
that are connected with it.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_A basic tutorial about the logic system;StateD
Element.Translation: 放置觸發磚後，連結其他可以被觸發的方塊。\n之後對觸發磚按「$ACTIVATE」觸發兩者。\n觸發磚可以與門、燈、武器電腦及任何可以被觸發的方塊連結。
Element.Original:
When you place an activation block,
and connect it to another activation block,
both blocks will be activated if you press $ACTIVATE
on the first one.
Activation blocks can also be linked to doors, lights,
weapon computers, and anything else that can be
activated in Starmade.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_A basic tutorial about the logic system;StateE
Element.Original: They can also be linked to gravity modules,\nalthough the activation block needs to be directly linked\nto the gravity module at this moment.

Element.Translation: 不能打撈「受保護的總部」！
黃色警示裝甲3/4（Yellow Hazard Armor 3/4）
如門磚一樣可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的力場磚組成大門。力場比鎖子門或玻璃門有更高的耐久值。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: 橙色水晶裝甲1/4（Orange Crystal Armor 1/4）
提煉後Jisper礦石可以用於合成。數項技術需要這些礦石。
Element.Original: Jisper Ore has useful manufacturing properties if refined into a more readily usable state. Several technologies are based upon the use of these ores once refined.

Element.Translation: 膠囊內懸浮著礦物Larimar的異次元原子。
Element.Original: Cubatoms of Larimar minerals float suspended within this capsule.

Element.Translation: 同時進行的爆炸數量（每次爆炸消耗２０ＭＢ ＲＡＭ及所有ＣＰＵ執行緒（預設１０，中端電腦的單人遊戲環境））。
Element.Original: the more the faster explosions at the same time are executed (costs in total about 20MB RAM each and of course CPU because it's all threaded) (10 is default for a medium powered singleplayer)

Element.Translation: 畫出方框顯示已連結的方塊
如門磚一樣可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的力場磚組成大門。力場比鎖子門或玻璃門有更高的耐久值。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: 用於建立「維修光線系統」（Repair Beam System），控制不限數量的「太空技術維修裝置」，分成多組會增加電力消耗。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結電腦磚及維修磚。$MAINCOMBI 按「$ACTIVATE」進入／離開電腦。
Element.Original: The Repair Beam Computer is required for creating functioning Repair systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Repair Beam Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Astrotech Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at an Astrotech Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.

Element.Translation: 不能宣稱的星系！\n（管理員保護）
Element.Original: System can not be claimed!\n(admin protected)

Element.Translation: 灰色進階裝甲（Grey Advanced Armor）

Element.Original: System can not be claimed!\n(invalid UID)

Element.Translation: 四面體藍色標準裝甲（Blue Standard Armor Tetra）
每輸入一次訊號，觸發正反器輸出開或關的狀態。
Element.Original: When this block receives an active signal from another logic block it will toggle on or off.

Element.Translation: 用於不同配方的棕色顏料。
Element.Original: A canister of brown paint, used in various recipes.

Element.Translation: 在方塊使用線性放大過濾（需要重啟）
Element.Original: Use linear mag filter on Blocks (restart required)

Element.Translation: 用來宣稱船隻、太空站、小行星或星球的主權。有相當高的耐久值，但不是無敵，所以要重點保護。停泊於「總部」（Home Base）的船隻處於無敵狀態。每棟建築只能放置１塊陣營磚，並提供單人、陣營或公眾權限。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: The Faction Module can be used to claim ownership of ships, stations, asteroids, and planets. It is fairly durable, but it isn't impervious. So protecting it is of the utmost importance. Ships fitted with an active Faction Module cannot be destroyed while docked at their factions home base. Only one Faction Module can be placed per structure. The Faction Module allows use of several features to its user. These features include: -Password protection -Permissions: Single-user/Faction/All Press $ACTIVATE on it to access them.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 反應爐護罩的強度２（不可用）
由Parseen晶體合成的進階電路。
Element.Original: An advanced circuit that's manufactured from Parseen crystals.

Element.Translation: 拉近效果電腦（Pull Effect Computer）

Element.Original: Increases EM damage of a linked weapon.

Element.Translation: 陣營點數負數，\n不能宣稱星系！
Element.Original: Cannot claim sector with\nnegative faction points!

Element.Translation: 不能宣稱或取消宣稱！\n陣營權限被拒！
不能設定權限！\n訪問被拒！
在陣營留言版發布新聞\n「%s」……
Element.Original: A news post has been posted\non your faction board\n%s...

Element.Translation: 不能設定權限！你的陣營階級不足！
Element.Original: Cannot set permission!\nYour rank is too low!

Element.Translation: 「星系」（System）由１６ｘ１６ｘ１６個區域組成，中心點是恆星。
Element.Original: A System is a big collection of sectors, 16 by 16 by 16 sectors\nto be exact. In the middle of each system\nis almost always a star located.

Element.Translation: 按「$NAVIGATION_PANEL」尋找你四周的物體。\n使用「篩選」幫助你尋找指定種類的物體，在顯示器清單選擇物體。
Element.Original:
You can look at all the objects in your vicinity
by pressing $NAVIGATION_PANEL. The filter will
help you organize it
by disabling or enabling certain objects. Clicking on an
object in the list will select it in your HUD.

Element.Translation:
宇宙無垠！
航行是生存要點，
無論你到重要地點打撈，
還是與新玩家見面。
Element.Original:
The universe is a big place.
Travelling to other places
salvaging important locations and meeting new players
is vital to survive.

Element.Translation: 永久勾出選擇物體的輪廓
Element.Original: Always show outline for targeted entities

Element.Translation: 你現在所在「區域」（Sector）在宇宙的位置，由３個「坐標」（Coordinate）標示。\n顯示在ＧＵＩ上方你的名稱旁邊。
Element.Original:
You are currently in a sector.
A sector is composed of 3 coordinates to indicate where
it is located in the universe.
These coordinates are visible on top
of the GUI near your name.

Element.Translation: 平面另一側放置的非立方體方塊有鏡像旋轉。
Element.Original: Rotates non-cubic blocks on the other side of the plane\nto mirror the blocks you place

Element.Translation: 按「導航點」（Waypoint）按鈕並輸入坐標，導航你要去的區域。\nＨＵＤ有白色閃爍標示所在地。
Element.Original:
To make a waypoint for a specific sector,
press the 'waypoint' button and enter
the coordinates of the sector you want
to travel to. This waypoint will now
be shown as a white blinking indication on your HUD.

Element.Translation: 平面另一側放置的立方體方塊有鏡像旋轉。
Element.Original: Rotates cubic blocks on the other side of the plane\nto mirror the blocks you place
The center block where the mine is created, can have up to 6 touching mine blocks to alter mine type and strength.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 只容許使用「字母」、「數字」或「_-」！
Element.Original: Must only contain letters or numbers or (_-)!

Element.Translation: 本機資料庫已有相同的檔案！
Element.Original: File already exists\nin your local database!

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 晶瑩剔透的Varat碎片熠熠閃亮。數項技術需要這些碎片。
Element.Original: Glittering Varat Shards reflect so much light they almost seem to glow. Several technologies are based upon the use of these shards once processed.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 已有相同的檔案。確定要覆寫？
四角錐體深灰色進階裝甲（Dark Grey Advanced Armor Corner）
膠囊內懸浮著純金屬Jisper的異次元原子。
Element.Original: Cubatoms of pure metalic Jisper float suspended within this capsule.

Element.Translation: 不能上傳！\n上傳正在被使用！
Element.Original: Cannot Upload!\nThere is already\nan upload in progress!

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 送出貿易訂單！\n在星圖查閱有效的貿易（按「%s」）。
Element.Original: Trade Order Sent!\nActive trades can also be checked in the Galaxy Map (press '%s')

Element.Translation:
喂！讓我教你怎樣導航！

操控船隻後，按「Ｐ」開啟「星圖」顯示全銀河。
《StarMade》銀河，由１２８ｘ１２８ｘ１２８個「星系」（System） 組成；「星系」由１６ｘ１６ｘ１６個「區域」（Sector）組成。
所以大到你不相信，你要知道自己的位置。

利用「導航面板」（Navigation Panel）尋找周圍的物體，設定「導航點」（Waypoint），亦讓你知道自己船隻的最後位置。
Element.Original:
Hi! I'll tell you how to navigate in this universe!

Once you have a ship, open up the galaxy map with P, and you will see the whole galaxy.
The Universe is subdivided into sectors, systems (16x16x16 sectors), and galaxies (128x128x128 systems).
So one galaxy is pretty big already, but there are quadrillions of them, not lying.
It's very important to know your way around.

You can check all the objects close to you in the navigation panel and set manual way points to any sector.
The navigation also has a function that lets you track the last ship you were in.

Element.Translation: 楔形藍色基礎裝甲（Blue Basic Armor Wedge）
四面體灰色基礎裝甲（Grey Basic Armor Tetra）
混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 設定宇宙的區域體積。『警告』！ 重設已存在宇宙的可能造成問題！
Element.Original: Sets the size of sectors in the universe **WARNING** scaling the size of an existing universe down may cause issues

Element.Translation: 推開效果裝置（Push Effect Module）
工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 不能進入的區域。\n（管理員鎖定的區域）
Element.Original: Cannot enter sector\n(Sector locked by admin)

Element.Translation: 不能離開的區域。\n（管理員鎖定的區域）
Element.Original: Cannot exit sector\n(Sector locked by admin)

Element.Translation: 灰色基礎裝甲1/4（Grey Basic Armor 1/4）
工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 錯誤！只適用於操控船隻的時候！
Element.Original: ERROR: Only available inside a ship!

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 商店生成機率（在１到０之間取值）（0，小行星區域無商店生成；1，商店周圍生成 （原設８％即0.08）。
Element.Original: (must be between 0 and 1): 0 is no shops spawned in asteroid sectors, 1 is shop spawned in everyone (default: 8% -> 0.08)

Element.Translation: 與「護罩輸出電腦」連結，組成「護罩輸出光線系統」（Shield Supply Beam System）。射出直線的輸出光線，效率與互相連接的磚數成正比。按「$ACTIVATE」決定那一格輸出磚作為砲口。
Element.Original: The Shield Supply Module, when used in conjunction with a Shield Supply Computer, can create a basic but effective shield transfer system. The Shield Supply Module fires a transfer beam in a straight line. Shield Supply Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their transfer rate. You can also choose which block outputs the effect by finding the Shield Supply Module you want to output the effect, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Element.Translation: 綠色水晶裝甲3/4（Green Crystal Armor 3/4）

Element.Original: Chest not found!\nIt has been removed.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 拉近效果裝置（Pull Effect Module）
混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 七面體白色標準裝甲（White Standard Armor Hepta）
工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 藍色標準裝甲3/4（Blue Standard Armor 3/4）
如門磚一樣可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的力場磚組成大門。力場比鎖子門或玻璃門有更高的耐久值。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 七面體黃色基礎裝甲（Yellow Basic Armor Hepta）
白色基礎裝甲1/2（White Basic Armor 1/2）
歡迎來到「武器系統教學」！\n這裡你學習怎樣使用及自訂武器。
Element.Original: Welcome to the Weapon System Tutorial.\nThis tutorial explains how to use and customize\nyour weapons.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 未能取得「伺服器清單」，請檢查你的網路連線。
Element.Original: Unable to retrieve server list, please check your internet connection and settings

Element.Translation: 昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: 未能取得「伺服器清單」，請檢查你的網路連線。
Element.Original: Unable to retrieve server list, please check your internet connection and settings

Element.Translation: 同時啟用匿蹤航行及反鎖定，對方的飛彈武器失效不能鎖定船隻。\n\r
Element.Original: Enables anti lockon while the Stealth Drive is active, stopping any missile weapon from locking on to you.\n\r

Element.Translation: 昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: 切換建造／移除的滑鼠鍵
恭喜！你完成所有教學。\n按「ＥＳＣ」有主選單讓你隨時離開教學。\n這裡有其他ＮＰＣ，讓你打探世界的秘密！
Element.Original:
Congratulations! You are done with the tutorial. End
it any time you want in the main menu (ESC).
There are some more NPCs around that
may tell you one or another secret about this world!

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 四面體橙色進階裝甲（Orange Advanced Armor Tetra）
容易合成，簡單的燈管提供照明。
Element.Original: Simple to create, Light Rods are an easy way to add some lighting to the area.

Element.Translation: 功用是預設時逆時針轉動停泊物９０度角，並讓停泊物向著同一方向互相連接的路軌移動。與９塊為１組的「觸發磚」連結，改變每次轉動的角度。每塊觸發磚增加轉動４５度，可以利用觸發磚的觸發及解除功能有每次不同的轉動角度，９塊處於觸發狀態的觸發磚提供連續的逆時針轉動。
Element.Original: This is the rail rotation module. Whatever goes on to it will rotate by default 90 degrees, and then move on in the given direction if there is another rail block to go to. The degree of rotation can be modified by connecting activation blocks. Connect from the rail rotator up to 9 activation blocks. Each active block will add 45 degrees to its rotation. So it is possible to dynamically change the rotation by just activating and deactivating the activation blocks. Nine active blocks will result in a constant rotation.

Element.Translation: 同時啟用匿蹤航行及雷達干擾，船隻在導航的標記消失。\n\r
Element.Original: Enables radarjammer while the Stealth Drive is active, only hiding your navigation marker/radar signature.\n\r
dedicated servers can be registered on the StarMade registry

Element.Translation: 此反應室與其他的反應室互相排斥！
Element.Original: Chamber is mutually exclusive with another chamber!

Element.Translation: 此反應室無具體的選項。
Element.Original: No options available to specify this chamber!

Element.Translation: 未探索（掃描或到達「%s／%s」區域）
請求取得資料的的星系……
根據布爾函數運作的邏輯閘。有多個輸入端及單一輸出端。所有輸入端處於「開」狀態，輸出端才有「開」狀態。
Element.Original: A logic gate is an idealized or physical device implementing a Boolean function; that is, it performs a logical operation on one or more logical inputs, and produces a single logical output. This module will send "on" only when all logic modules connected to it are "on".

Element.Translation: 加長雷達掃描星系的距離。
Element.Original: Increases the system range of your Long Range Scanner.

Element.Translation: 無效的管道！放置在「反應爐電力」及「反應室」之間，或相同種類的「反應室」之間構成「反應爐鏈」！
Element.Original: Invalid conduit! Conduit connects more than two chambers/reacor! Must be chamber<->chamber or main<->chamber!
Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 反應室太小！最少需要「%s」方塊。
Element.Original: Chamber too small! Needs at least %s blocks

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 未探索（掃描或到達「%s」區域）
無效的管道！放置在「反應爐電力」及「反應室」之間，或相同種類的「反應室」之間構成「反應爐鏈」！
Element.Original: Invalid conduit! Conduit connects more than two chambers/reacor! Must be chamber<->chamber or main<->chamber!

Element.Translation: 按住並滑鼠滾輪做縮放
楔形灰色標準裝甲（Grey Standard Armor Wedge）

Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 四面體紫色進階裝甲（Purple Advanced Armor Tetra）

Element.Original: An wedged ingot of refined Hylat.

Element.Translation: 增加工廠的生產線，提高合成的效率。
Element.Original: Makes factories more efficient by increasing the number of production lines active during each factory cycle.

Element.Translation: 七面體青綠色基礎裝甲（Teal Basic Armor Hepta）
註冊「專有伺服器」（Dedicated Server）時取得「綁定帳戶令牌」。
Element.Original: uplink token, provided when registering a dedicated server

Element.Translation: 即時刷新「ping/pong」（警告！清楚明白後才變更）。
Element.Original: flushes ping/pong immediately (WARNING: only change when you know what you're doing)

Element.Translation: 四角錐體黃色水晶裝甲（Yellow Crystal Armor Corner）
連線問題。\n可能是失去連線或\n伺服器繁忙未能回應。
Element.Original: Connection problem.\nEither you are losing connection\nor the server is under too heavy load to answer.

Element.Translation: 載入繁忙，遊戲正在備份。
Element.Original: Under heavy load. Game is trying to catch back up.

Element.Translation: 楔形紅色基礎裝甲（Red Basic Armor Wedge）
四角錐體橙色標準裝甲（Orange Standard Armor Corner）
工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 連線多少次後，觸發防止濫發行為（預設１次／秒持續３０秒）。
Element.Original: max attempts before refusing connections in spam protect period (default is 1/sec for 30 sec)

Element.Translation: 深灰色標準裝甲1/2（Dark Grey Standard Armor 1/2）
想重新教學嗎？傳送門會傳送你到教學區域。\n按「下一步」開始教學或「離開」。
Element.Original:
Do you want to do the tutorial?
It will teleport you to the tutorial sector
Hit next to start the tutorial, or exit to
cancel!

Element.Translation: 正在傳送你到教學區域！
Element.Original: Teleporting you to the tutorial sector now!

Element.Translation: 昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: 四面體青綠色進階裝甲（Teal Advanced Armor Tetra）
工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 黃色標準裝甲1/4（Yellow Standard Armor 1/4）
由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 「$RESOURCES」按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉工廠的物品欄，放置配方需要的材料。
Element.Original: $RESOURCES Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close the Factory's Internal Inventory. (Used for placing the necessary materials for recipes)

Element.Translation: 使用多少ＣＰＵ執行緒數目。警告！數值太大會造成ＣＰＵ使用量尖峰。最佳數值是ＣＰＵ核數減１。
Element.Original: Available threads of total for CPU generation. WARNING: too high can cause cpu spikes. About the amount of available cores minus one is best

Element.Translation: 加長星際之門的跳躍距離。
Element.Original: Increases the jump distance of your Warpgates.

Element.Translation: 確定要離開現在的陣營，\n轉投此陣營？
Element.Original: Do you really want to join this faction\nand leave your current faction?

Element.Translation: 藍色標準裝甲（Blue Standard Armor）
七面體黑色進階裝甲（Black Advanced Armor Hepta）
合成快速、便宜的透明體，只是耐久值不足。
Element.Original: Relatively cheap and easy to make, Glass allows clear exterior views, however it has little in the way of durability when shot.

Element.Translation: 深灰色進階裝甲1/4（Dark Grey Advanced Armor 1/4）
七面體藍色進階裝甲（Blue Advanced Armor Hepta）
如門磚一樣可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的力場磚組成大門。力場比鎖子門或玻璃門有更高的耐久值。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: %s；等級: %s [%s-%s] (反應室大小: %s，剩餘RC使用量: %s%%)
昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: 橙色基礎裝甲（Orange Basic Armor）
船廠核心錨位（Shipyard Core Anchor）
由Bastyn晶體合成的楔形進階電路。
Element.Original: An advanced circuit wedge that's manufactured from Bastyn crystals.

Element.Translation: Can't fire missile. It takes %s missile capacity to fire!
Element.Original: Can't fire missile. It takes %s missile capacity to fire!

Element.Translation: ～～無線電廣播～～\n隨你試用武器，之後找「ＮＰＣ—05」上最後一堂課。
Element.Original:
####RADIO-TRANSMISSION####
Try out the weapons as long as you
like and then go over to NPC-05
for your last lesson
Increases the usage duration of your Stealth Drive.

Element.Translation: 容易合成，簡單的燈管提供照明。
Element.Original: Simple to create, Light Rods are an easy way to add some lighting to the area.

Element.Translation: 提煉後Fertikeen礦石可以用於合成。數項技術需要這些礦石。
Element.Original: Fertikeen Ore has useful manufacturing properties if refined into a more readily usable state. Several technologies are based upon the use of these ores once refined.

Element.Translation: 畫出最多多少飛彈尾焰（需要重啟）
工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 正在按左鍵使用集中光線。\n按右鍵使用非集中的打撈光線，會更有效率。\n（可用於所有武器）
Element.Original:
You are focusing beams
with the left mouse button.
Salvage beams are more powerful
unfocused with the right mouse button.
(works with all weapons/etc)

Element.Translation: 不能設定！\n先開啟傳送門控制裝置！
Element.Original: Cannot set! \nYou must hit a transporter computer!

Element.Translation: 船殼受損！重啟系統去重設耐久值〔%s〕。
Element.Original: Hull Damage! Reboot Systems to reset HP ['%s']

Element.Translation: 重生點區域，預設的Ｚ座標。
重新啟動去重設耐久值及恢復系統。
Element.Original: Reboot to reset HP and restore Systems

Element.Translation: 警告！\n偵測到入侵者！\n準備甲板戰！
Element.Original:
WARNING!
Intruders on structure
detected!
You are being boarded!

Element.Translation: 重生點區域，預設的Ｙ座標。
重生點區域，預設的Ｘ座標。
四角錐體綠色標準裝甲（Green Standard Armor Corner）
楔形Hattel帶電電路（Hattel Charged Circuit Wedge）
用於不同配方的紅色顏料。
Element.Original: A canister of red paint, used in various recipes.
You are not in a faction!

Element.Translation:
物體無在資料庫存檔！
請等候自動存檔
或遠離現在的區域最短３個區域距離
及２０秒以上。
Element.Original:
Entity not yet saved in database!
Please wait for auto save
or get the sector unloaded by getting at least 3 sectors away 
for more than 20 sec.

Element.Translation: 錯誤！\n無法購買！\n不在商店範圍！
Element.Original: ERROR:\nCannot buy!\nYou are not near a shop!

Element.Translation: 只容許使用「字母」、「數字」或「_-」！
Element.Original: Must only contain letters or numbers or (_-)!

Element.Translation: 設成你的陣營（需要陣營磚）。
Element.Original: Set as own Faction (needs faction block)
Please type in a name for your new Ship!

Element.Translation: 錯誤！\n無法購買！\n你不在商店附近！
Element.Original: ERROR:\nCannot buy!\nYou are not near a shop!

Element.Translation: 紅色進階裝甲（Red Advanced Armor）

Element.Original: You are not in a faction!

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
Please type in a name for your new Ship!

Element.Translation: 紅色基礎裝甲（Red Basic Armor）
只容許使用「字母」、「數字」或「_-」！
Element.Original: Must only contain letters or numbers or (_-)!

Element.Translation: 設成你的陣營（需要陣營磚）。
Element.Original: Set as own Faction (needs faction block)

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_A basic tutorial about the logic system;Start
Element.Translation: 歡迎來到「基礎邏輯教學」！
Element.Original: Welcome to the Basic Logic Tutorial.

Element.Translation: 楔形紫色進階裝甲（Purple Advanced Armor Wedge）
在方塊中間設定「對稱平面」。
Element.Original: puts symmetry planes in the middle of block

Element.Translation: 晶瑩剔透的Nocx碎片熠熠閃亮。數項技術需要這些碎片。
Element.Original: Glittering Nocx Shards reflect so much light they almost seem to glow. Several technologies are based upon the use of these shards once processed.

Element.Translation: 跳躍航行電腦（Jump Drive Computer）
工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 四角錐體黃色警示裝甲（Yellow Hazard Hull Corner）
由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
The Tractor Beam Computer is capable of controlling any amount of Tractor Beam Modules. \n\rStrength depends on the amount of linked modules, you can switch firing modes with your Right Click.
You switched to the \ngravity field of \n%s

Element.Translation: 橙色基礎裝甲1/4（Orange Basic Armor 1/4）
工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 輔助電力損毀後會爆炸。
Element.Original: Auxiliary power is volatile and will explode when destroyed.
Do you really want to delete all mails?

Element.Translation: 我不想用對講機，快過來這裡，跟我談一談。但是你別走失！
Element.Original: I'm over here! Come talk to me so I don't\nhave to use the radio.\nI suppose you need to get your bearings!

Element.Translation: 不能駛離商店！\n只容許「%s」駛離！
Element.Original: Can't undock from shop!\nOnly %s can undock!

Element.Translation: 膠囊內懸浮著純金屬Hylat的異次元原子。
Element.Original: Cubatoms of pure metalic Hylat float suspended within this capsule.

Element.Translation:
使用滑鼠改變視野；
「$FORWARD」前進、「$BACKWARDS」後退；
「$STRAFE_LEFT」左移、「$STRAFE_RIGHT」右移；
重力下「$JUMP」跳躍。
Element.Original:
The mouse controls your camera, use it to look around.
$FORWARD and $BACKWARDS control your forwards and backwards movements.
$STRAFE_LEFT and $STRAFE_RIGHT control your left and right movements.
'$JUMP' lets you jump when in gravity!

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 在圖形用戶介面使用線性放大過濾（需要重啟）
Element.Original: Use linear mag filter on GUI (restart required)

Element.Translation: 小行星半徑的最大方塊值（－Ｘ到＋Ｘ）。
Element.Original: Asteroid max radius in blocks (from -x to +x)

Element.Translation: 陣營「%s」視你為仇人！\n這不是對你的陣營宣戰！
Element.Original: Faction %s now considers you as a personal enemy!\nThis is not a war declaration against your faction!
You lost faction points for dying: %d

Element.Translation: 陣營成員「%s」死亡後損失「%d」陣營點數。死因「%s」。
Element.Original: Faction member %s lost %d Faction Points for dying. Cause of death: %s
You don't have the right\nto set permission to that\nvalue

Element.Translation:
警告！
選擇此階級後，
你不能再編輯更改你的階級。

確定要這樣做？
Element.Original:
WARNING!
If you set this rank, you will no longer
be able to edit or change it.

Do you really want to do this?

Element.Translation: 陣營點數不足，失去星系「%s」的控制。
Element.Original: Because of lack of faction points, you lost control over galaxy system %s

Element.Translation: ～～無線電廣播～～\n我會用對講機繼續幫助你。
妨礙跳躍電腦（Jump Inhibitor Computer）
由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 關鍵警告！無陣營點數及領土，你的總部不再無敵！
Element.Original: CRITICAL WARNING!\nWithout Faction Points and territory, your homebase has become destroyable!

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 紅色基礎裝甲1/2（Red Basic Armor 1/2）
白色進階裝甲3/4（White Advanced Armor 3/4）
由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: true，以每塊方塊的質量算出結構的重心；false，結構的重心永久在船隻核心。
Element.Original: if on, the center of mass for each structured will be calculated based on block mass. On 'false', the center of mass is always the core position

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 沒用的舊版本太空站，你如何取得？「這可不是月球！」
Element.Original: This was an old version of stations, it is currently not in use... How did you get this anyways?? "That's no moon"

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 管理員錯誤訊息！\n未發現要移除的物體：\n
Element.Original: ADMIN-MESSAGE ERROR\nObject to clean not found: \n

Element.Translation:
管理員訊息！
匯入前移除區域，
已移除：
可以改變方塊的方向或形狀（例如楔形）。\n按住「$BUILD_MODE_FIX_CAM」後滑鼠滾輪改變方向。
Element.Original:
Orientation is available if a rotatable block
is selected. Those blocks
are either blocks with individual sides
or special shapes like wedges.
You can also rotate through the block orientations
with the mouse wheel while holding $BUILD_MODE_FIX_CAM

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation:
你要學懂停泊船隻！
把船隻核心的「停泊光線」（Docking Beam）射向「砲塔停泊磚」（Turret Docking Unit）或其他停泊磚。

「停泊磚擴張器」（Docking Enhancer）與停泊磚互相連接及連結後會擴張泊位。
記著，兩者要互相連接並連結成為１組。n
你可以往船隻或砲塔加上ＡＩ裝置、陣營磚。
之後透過「結構面板」（Structure Menu）觸發ＡＩ裝置，在陣營磚簽名。
Element.Original:
A real awesome thing you can do is docking your ships!
You can use a turret docking block or a normal docking block for that.
Just aim your docking beam (it comes equipped with every ship core), at the docking block.

You can increase the docking area by connecting docking enhancers to the docking blocks,
but keep in mind that they all have to touch, as only the largest group counts.

You can also give your ship or turret an Artificial Intelligence. Make sure the ship or turret has your faction signature
by placing and activating a faction block. Then place down a bobby AI block and activate it. You can also
activate AI for turrets directly in the structure panel of the ship the turrets are docked to.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Increases Heat damage of a linked weapon.

Element.Translation: 已連接的儲藏室沒有足夠的資源去放置地雷。需要: %s
Element.Original: Not enough resources in connected storage to lay mine. Needed: %s

Element.Translation: 不能構造沒有類型的礦井. \nPlace 礦井核心旁邊的地雷類型塊來設置其類型。
Element.Original: Can't construct mine without type.\nPlace a mine type block next to the mine core to set its type.

Element.Translation: 冰塊壓縮得宜合成出冷颼颼的冰晶體。
Element.Original: When Ice is compressed properly, it forms Ice Crystal. A glow emenates from the cold within.

Element.Translation: 必須將地雷至少放置在 %s 米之外, 以免相互干擾。ali
Element.Original: Mines have to be placed at least %s meters apart to not interfere with each other.

Element.Translation: 昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;End
Element.Translation: 上述是「戰鬥模式教學」。\n感謝你閱讀、遊玩《StarMade》！
Element.Original: This concludes the Battle Mode Tutorial.\nThanks for reading,\nand thanks for playing StarMade!

Element.Translation: 七面體黑色水晶裝甲（Black Crystal Armor Hepta）
掠奪堆積的倍數（數值小於１＝更少，０＝無）。
Element.Original: multiply amount of items in a loot stack. use values smaller 1 for less and 0 for none

Element.Translation: 正在發展的ＡＩ部分，將來會有改變。\n你現在可以招募及管理ＡＩ船員。
Element.Original:
The use of AI is part of a bigger
picture that is still a work in progress,
you can already hire and use your own AI
crew.

Element.Translation: 現在只能在「進階商店」招募船員。\n除了起始點的進階商店，進階商店在宇宙隨機生成，但是生成率比「一般商店」低。\n利用「導航面板」尋找有商人公會ＮＰＣ的進階商店。
Element.Original:
At this moment, hiring crew can only be done
at an advanced shop. Those shops are located in
the starting sector of new worlds but also
spawn randomly, although more rarely than normal shops.
To find them, check your navigation panel
for Trading guild NPCs during your travels.

Element.Translation: 每間進階商店有一名ＮＰＣ，按「$ACTIVATE」進行對話，招募最多５位船員。
Element.Original: An advanced shop has an NPC, which\nyou can talk to with $ACTIVATE. He lets you hire\nup to 5 NPCs.

Element.Translation:
「資料庫轉移」（Database Migration）由「v0.078版本」到「v0.079＋版本」。
只能升級現在的宇宙。
匯入的舊目錄資料亦會自動升級！
切記！『先備份檔案』。
（升級過程中會備份所有舊檔案）。
Element.Original:
Database Migration from v0.078 to v0.079+.
This updates only the current universe.
Old catalog data will automatically update, when you import!
Be sure to have a Backup!
(All you data got backed up on Version update)

Element.Translation: 轉移資料庫（用於舊版本）

Element.Original: You can also change their behaviour\nin the AI panel.

Element.Translation: 這將會刪除區域內，不是玩家生成的所有船隻。\n『不能復原』的動作。
Element.Original:
This will delete all ships in the area that have
not been spawned by a player.

This action cannot be undone.

Element.Translation: 刪除一定範圍內由「電腦／管理員」生成的船隻。
Element.Original: Clean up Mob/Admin-Spawned ships in range

Element.Translation: 按「$AI_CONTROL_KEY」管理你的ＮＰＣ船員，在清單選擇命令。
Element.Original:
You can control your NPCs by
pressing '$AI_CONTROL_KEY'. A list of your
NPCs will appear to the left and
you can select the one you want to
give commands to.

Element.Translation: 選擇目錄的物體及陣營並互相對抗（預設陣營ＩＤ，－２是商人公會；－１是海盜；０是中立）。
Element.Original: Choose catalog entries and faction to fight each other. (Default Faction ID's: 0 is neutral, -1 is pirate, -2 is Trading Guild)

Element.Translation: 實際上，你可以招募更多的船員。只是每次只有５位船員跟隨你。\n先讓船員下船後，再去招募其他船員，\n下船的船員會在原處待命。按「$ACTIVATE」下令。
Element.Original:
That doesn't mean that you can only get 5 in total.
However, you can only have 5 at a time that follow
your direct commands.
You can discharge NPCs to your ship and get more.
They will wait for you. Just press $ACTIVATE on one of
your crew members and tell him to wait or join you.

Element.Translation: 按「$AI_CONFIG_PANEL」開啟ＡＩ面板，\n可以重新命名船員甚至移除他們。
Element.Original: In the AI panel ('$AI_CONFIG_PANEL'), click on the Crew tab.\nHere you can rename your AI crew and remove them if needed.

Element.Translation: 注意ＮＰＣ有「家」，例如船隻。\n叫ＮＰＣ跟隨你，走進你的船，然後下命令。\n這樣ＮＰＣ會以船為新的「家」。
Element.Original:
Note that NPCs have a "home" they
belong to (like a ship). To attach them
to your ship, tell them to follow you.
Then go to your ship and tell them to go to a
point on your ship. This will make the ship
their new 'home', and they will move with it.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 白色標準裝甲1/4（White Standard Armor 1/4）
重新啟動會維修太空站的裝甲。\n\n
Element.Original: Rebooting will also repair your armor on stations.\n\n

Element.Translation: 這會重設整個資料庫。失去所有世界。\n\n警告！不備份就進行刪除，『不能復原』！
Element.Original:
This will reset the complete database. All created worlds will be gone.

.
WARNING: deleting without backup CANNOT be undone

Element.Translation: 資料庫轉移進行中。\n等候數分鐘。\n請勿中斷進度！
Element.Original: Database Migration in Progress.\nThis may take a few minutes.\nPlease do not interrupt this progress!

Element.Translation: 與物品欄一樣，供玩家存放物品，按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。與「貨物空間磚」連結可以加大儲物箱的容量。與打撈系統、邏輯系統及工廠連結後，設定篩選有自動化功能。
Element.Original: The Storage block functions like a persistent, dynamic inventory. This enables the user to store items from their inventory in it. You can expand its volume size by linking it to Cargo Space blocks. Press $ACTIVATE to access. Storage blocks can also act as filters, and can be linked to; Salvage systems, Logic blocks and Factories. This makes them quite useful in various automated setups.

Element.Translation: 資料庫轉移成功。\n可以遊玩，玩得愉快！
Element.Original: Database Migration was successfull.\nYou can now play the game. Have fun!

Element.Translation:
確定要維修裝甲？
這會重設裝甲值成最大數值！
這「不是」維修方塊。
即時維修會消耗「%s」金錢。
現有金錢「%s」。
Element.Original:
Do you want to repair your Armor?
This will reset all your armor HP to their max value!
This will NOT replenish or repair any blocks.

Repairing will be instant, but it will cost %s Credits
You currently have %s Credits

Element.Translation: 啟用固定自由鏡頭！\n重按「%s」解除。
Element.Original: Sticky free cam active:\nhit %s again to deactivate.

Element.Translation: 確定要重啟系統？\n這會移除低耐久值造成的系統錯誤。\n
Element.Original: Do you want to reboot your systems?\nThis will remove any system failures from low hp\n

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 綠色警示裝甲（Green Hazard Armor）
四面體粉紅色進階裝甲（Pink Advanced Armor Tetra）
橙色水晶裝甲（Orange Crystal Armor）
Reference distance for weapon ranges. (what blockBehaviorConfig.xml weapon ranges are multiplied with (usually the sector size)). Set to 1 to interpret weapon ranges in the config in meters
Element.Original: Reference distance for weapon ranges. (what blockBehaviorConfig.xml weapon ranges are multiplied with (usually the sector size)). Set to 1 to interpret weapon ranges in the config in meters

Element.Translation: 四角錐體綠色水晶裝甲（Green Crystal Armor Corner）
最多只能命名\n１６個物品欄！
好的，過來跟我對話！\n（不要對著自己的船隻，按「$ENTER_SHIP」離開船隻）
Element.Original: Ok, now please come talk to me!\n(Exit ship with '$ENTER_SHIP' while not looking at your ship)

Element.Translation: 不能修改管理員的權限！
Element.Original: Cannot modify rights\nof an admin role!

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;Start
Element.Translation: 歡迎來到「進階邏輯教學」！\n這裡你學習怎樣使用重要的觸發磚，及其他邏輯方塊。
Element.Original:
Welcome to the Advanced Logic Tutorial.
In the basic tutorial, you were introduced to the
activation block, which is the most vital block
in the system. Here you will learn about all
the other blocks used in logic and its triggers.
You don't have permission to edit this!
You don't have permission to edit this member!

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateI1
Element.Translation: 陣營成員在船隻放置「陣營磚」，\n按「$ACITVATE」開啟、簽上「陣營簽名」及設定，\n把船隻參加陣營，只供陣營成員使用。
Element.Original:
It is possible to assign a ship to your faction.
Only you and your faction members will be able
to use it. To do this, place a "faction module" on the ship,
press $ACITVATE on it and enter the faction signature.
The signature will stay as long as the faction block
is not destroyed.

Element.Translation: 黃色水晶裝甲（Yellow Crystal Armor）
與「光線攻擊電腦」連結，組成「光線攻擊系統」（Damage Beam System）。射出直線的攻擊光線，火力與互相連接的磚數成正比。按「$ACTIVATE」決定那一格光線磚作為砲口。
Element.Original: The Damage Beam Module, when used in conjunction with a Damage Beam Computer, can create a basic but effective weapons system. The Damage Beam fires an energy beam in a straight line. Damage Beams do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their damage. You can also choose which block outputs the beam by finding the Damage Beam Module you want to output the beam, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Element.Translation: 警告！\n不能持有更多金錢！
「發電機」及「電容」功用俱備。發電效率與發電機相似，除了只以輔助磚的數量計算出發電量及容量。在快捷欄開關，「開」往船隻的電容輸出電力；「關」往內置的電容充電。警告！輔助磚具爆炸性，失去其中１塊磚，２分鐘內全組爆炸。
Element.Original: Power Auxiliaries are the result of combining Power Capacitors and Power Reactors into a single block. Their power regeneration scales similar to the normal power reactors except that only the group count matters and that their soft cap is also per group. They also have the ability to store power internally. You can turn these Auxiliaries "On" and "Off" by toggling it in your weapons menu. - On: Aux regeneration gets added to the main ship, any internally stored power is drained into the main ship's Power Capacitors. - Off: Aux regeneration charges their own internal power storage at a slow rate. WARNING: These blocks are highly volatile! If a group loses a block, it will create an explosive chain event that can destroy an entire reactor group in less than 2 minutes!

Element.Translation: 可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的門磚組成大門。防爆門比鎖子門或玻璃門有更高的耐久值。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Blast Doors are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation:
正在以３２位元模式運行遊戲。
如果你的系統是６４位元模式，這可能會限制遊戲的表現、記憶體造成當機。
解決方法——從STEAM運行Beta程式啟動。

在遊戲名稱右按，選擇「啟動Beta程式啟動」（Launch with Beta Launcher），

或在官網（www.star-made.org）下載６４位元程式啟動。
Element.Original:
You are running in 32-Bit mode. If your system is 64-Bit,
this can limit the performance and memory given to the game and crash it.

To fix this, please run the beta launcher in STEAM.
To do this, just right click on the game and click on
"Launch with Beta Launcher".

If you don't run the game in STEAM,
please download the 64-Bit launcher from www.star-made.org

如門磚一樣可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的力場磚組成大門。力場比鎖子門或玻璃門有更高的耐久值。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。

Element.Translation: 不容許的用戶名稱。\n最少 3 個字元。\n只容許「字母」、「數字」、「-」「_」。
Element.Original: Your username is not allowed.\nMust be at least 3 characters.\nOnly letters, numbers, '-' and '_' are allowed.
Please enter a name for your character.

Element.Translation: 正在初始化宇宙失敗！請到「phab.starma.de」附上記錄回報錯誤！
Element.Original: Initializing Universe failed! Please send in an error report to help.star-made.org! %s

Element.Translation: 正在初始化宇宙失敗！請到「phab.starma.de」附上記錄回報錯誤！
Element.Original: Initializing Universe failed! Please send in an error report to help.star-made.org! %s

Element.Translation: 正在初始化宇宙失敗！請到「phab.starma.de」附上記錄回報錯誤！
Element.Original: Initializing Universe failed! Please send in an error report to help.star-made.org! %s

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation:
「傳送門」（Transporter）讓玩家在傳送門之間轉移。傳送門分別與各自的「傳送門控制裝置」及「傳送門裝置」連結。

預設是「私人」只會接受私人的傳送要求；
「公共訪問」接受範圍內所有傳送要求；
「陣營通行」接受範圍內陣營成員的傳送要求。

轉移時會減少船隻、太空站的護罩。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結控制裝置及裝置磚，或「Shift＋V」集體連結。
Element.Original:
The Transporter allows you to teleport to other nearby Transporters. Both Transporter Controllers need to be connected to their own Transporter Modules. Each Controller can have multiple Modules.

Default mode is “Private”, these transporters can only targeted by other transporters on the same entity.
“Public Access” can be targeted by any transporter in range. Using it however will drop both the shields of the ship you transported from and to.
“Faction access” can be targeted by any transporter in range that belongs to the same Faction. Shields will also drop on transporting.

To link your Transporter controller to its Transporter Modules, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.

Element.Translation: 未完成登入程序！請重試。
Element.Original: Login Procedure not finished!\nPlease try again.

Element.Translation: 未完成登入程序！請重試。
Element.Original: Login Procedure not finished!\nPlease try again.

Element.Translation: 膠囊內懸浮著純晶體Hattel的異次元原子。
Element.Original: Cubatoms of pure crystaline Hattel float suspended within this capsule.
The Beacon provides an easily seen flare of brightness.

Element.Translation: 反應爐護罩的強度１（不可用）
可以在武器欄獨立顯示及命名，連結船上的邏輯系統後，拖放到快捷欄並觸發。
Element.Original: This logic block can be named and assigned in the weapons bar to activate logic from within the ship. To assign on the hotbar, the module must be connected to at least one other logic block.

Element.Translation:
作用是在船廠的區域定位「船隻核心」。
在Ｕ形走廊內隨意放置並有指向性。
Element.Original:
Place down exactly one shipyard core anchor anywhere within the arcs internal width / height. You can orientate this block in all 24 directions like a rail block.
This block will align the ships core within your shipyard.

Element.Translation: 四面體灰色進階裝甲（Grey Advanced Armor Tetra）
混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;Start
Element.Translation: 歡迎來到「戰鬥模式教學」！
Element.Original: Welcome to the Battle Mode Tutorial

Element.Translation: 黃色進階裝甲1/4（Yellow Advanced Armor 1/4）
四面體黑色水晶裝甲（Black Crystal Armor Tetra）
留意武器組合只能有２塊電腦磚，選擇時想清楚。
Element.Original: Keep in mind that the weapon computer can only be used in\nONE combination at a time, so choose wisely what you want.

Element.Translation: 你亦可以在武器加上「效果裝置」（Effects），改變損傷的類型，在「效果教學」另談。
Element.Original: You can also add effect blocks to a weapon computer,\nwhich will change the type of damage you are doing.\nThis will be covered in the 'Effects Tutorial'.

Element.Translation: 亦可以按「$WEAPON_PANEL」開啟「武器面板」，\n把作為「隨從」（Slave）的電腦磚拖放到主電腦磚的欄位，\n毋需做連結的動作。
Element.Original:
You can also do the same with the 'drag and drop' feature
in the weapon menu (open with $WEAPON_PANEL). Just pick
a weapon and drag it into the slave slot of another.
You can also unlink by selecting a slave and dropping
it in the unlink box.

Element.Translation: 警告！\n武器或工具不會運作！\n伺服器不容許每電腦有多於「%s」分組。
Element.Original: WARNING!\nWeapon/Tool will not not work on server!\nServer doesn't allow more than %s computers of this type.

Element.Translation: 當主電腦連接７塊方塊，隨從連接３塊方塊，\n射速只有５０％加成，但是每發損傷增加，\n而每秒傷害不變，讓你自訂武器。
Element.Original:
If you connect 7 blocks to the main computer and
3 to the secondary, you will only get around half
of the reload buff but each shot will do more damage.
The DPS remains unchanged.
This way you can fully customize your weapon.

Element.Translation: 現在動手嘗試，放置武器電腦，連結５塊武器磚。\n重複前述建造另一武器。
Element.Original:
Try this now. Place down a weapon computer
and connect 5 weapon modules to it.
Next, place another weapon computer down
and connect 5 weapon modules to that.

Element.Translation: 現在對著作為主武器的電腦按「$SELECT_MODULE」，\n然後對著作為次要效果的電腦按「$CONNECT_MODULE」連結。\n被選的電腦磚會有色彩顯示。
Element.Original:
Now press $SELECT_MODULE on the weapon
computer you want to use as your main weapon.
Finally press $CONNECT_MODULE on the second weapon computer.
The coloured boxes around the computers will now
indicate its connection.

Element.Translation: 作為次要效果的電腦磚，其連結武器磚的數量，按比例影響次要效果。\n但是武器組合的傷害，由武器磚的總數決定。
Element.Original:
The ratio of connected blocks on each of
the connected systems determines how much
of the secondary effect the main weapon will
receive.
The damage however will be determined by the total block
count from all weapon blocks.

Element.Translation: 警告！達到伺服器的「質量／方塊」！\n物體的武器或工具無任何效果！\n伺服器不容許多過「%s」。
Element.Original: WARNING! SERVER MASS/BLOCK REACHED!\nWeapons/Tools of this entity will not have any effect on server!\nServer doesn't allow more than %s

Element.Translation: 舉例，５０武器磚與其他５０武器磚連結的組合，與１００武器磚的武器傷害一樣。
Element.Original:
Example, a weapon that uses 50 blocks in
combination with another weapon that uses 50
blocks has the same damage per second as a single weapon
with 100 blocks.

Element.Translation:
次要效果如下，
火砲「增加射速」（機槍）；
飛彈「增加發射彈數」（散彈槍）；
脈衝攻擊「增加傷害」（大口徑）；
光線「增加射程、彈速」（狙擊槍）。
Element.Original:
Secondary effects:
Cannons: Makes the weapon reload faster (machine-gun).
Missile: Splits up the weapon into smaller parts (shotgun).
Pulse: Increases the weapon damage (High calibre).
Beam: Makes the weapon range greater and and the
projectile faster (sniper).

Element.Translation: 記著，武器組合由２塊電腦磚連結組成。\n每塊電腦磚再與相關的武器磚連結。
Element.Original:
As mentioned before, you have to connect
two weapon computers together to combine them.
Both weapon computers have to have
weapon modules connected to them.

Element.Translation: 改變建造範圍的長度。\n在「數字輸入」滑鼠滾輪或右按重設。
Element.Original: changes depth of building area\nTIP: use scroll wheel on number\nTIP: right click to reset

Element.Translation: 在《StarMade》有４種主要武器。\n反物質火砲（Antimatter Cannons）、飛彈（Missiles）、脈衝攻擊（Damage Pulse）、光線攻擊（Damage Beam）。\n每種武器有不同的特點，按情況使用。
Element.Original:
StarMade has four main weapon types at this point.
Antimatter Cannons, Missiles, Damage Pulse
and Damage Beam. Each weapon is useful on its own
but in most situations a specific weapon
will be the most effective.

Element.Translation: 把２塊電腦磚連結，建造出「武器組合」（Combination Weapon）。\n組合的「次要效果」（Secondary Effect）按連結的電腦所產生。
Element.Original:
StarMade uses a combination system for this.
You can link two main computers together to
change how the weapon behaves.
Each weapon has a secondary effect, that will
be applied to the weapon it is linked to.

Element.Translation: 改變建造範圍的高度。\n在「數字輸入」滑鼠滾輪或右按重設。
Element.Original: changes height of building area\nTIP: use scroll wheel on number\nTIP: right click to reset

Element.Translation: 改變建造範圍的寬度。\n在「數字輸入」滑鼠滾輪或右按重設。
Element.Original: changes width of building area\nTIP: use scroll wheel on number\nTIP: right click to reset

Element.Translation: 楔形紅色標準裝甲（Red Standard Armor Wedge）
電力不足！\n每秒需要ＶＳ每秒充填：\n

不能跳躍！
大門電力不足！
質量需要的電力：
Element.Original:
Cannot jump!

Power needed for mass:

不能跳躍！\n只能在無浮力、重力環境\n或對齊的太空站跳躍。
Element.Original: Cannot jump!\nCan only jump while free floating\nor in gravity/aligned to a station.

Element.Translation: 不能跳躍！\n大門電力不足！\n質量需要的電力：１
Element.Original: Cannot jump!\nNot enough power in gate!\nPower needed for mass: 1

Element.Translation: 此外，武器與燈磚連結，為砲彈、光線著色。
Element.Original: Additionally you can link light sources to your weapon,\nto change the colour of that weapon's projectile.
Do you really want to leave the faction

Element.Translation: 沒用的舊版本停泊磚，你如何取得？
Element.Original: This was an old version of the docks, it is currently not in use... How did you get this anyways??

Element.Translation: 不在「個人貨物磚」範圍！\n需要在相同的區域。
Element.Original: Selected personal cargo out of range!\nIt must be in the same sector as you.

Element.Translation: 「個人貨物磚」無選擇指定的儲物箱！
Element.Original: Selected personal cargo doesn't point to any storage block!

Element.Translation: 教學期間關閉貨物功能！
目標陣營被消滅，\n不復存在！
Element.Original: Target faction is corrupted\nand does not exist!

Element.Translation: 你的陣營不能跟自己打關係。
Element.Original: Your faction can't have\nrelations with itself.

Element.Translation: 現在火砲射速快１５倍，但是減少每發損傷。\n「每秒傷害」（ＤＰＳ）總數，與火砲電腦磚連接１０塊火砲磚一樣。
Element.Original:
Your cannon will now fire 15 times faster
but each shot will do less damage.
The total DPS will be the same as one cannon computer
with 10 cannon modules linked to it.

Element.Translation: 不能修改與ＮＰＣ陣營的關係！
Element.Original: Cannot modify relations\nto a NPC faction!

Element.Translation: 不能改變關係！\n權限被拒！

Element.Translation: 不能射擊！\n組合錯誤，原因「組合無效」。

不能射擊！正在初始化武器……
四面體藍色水晶裝甲（Blue Crystal Armor Tetra）

Element.Translation: 很抱歉，出現問題。請到「help.star-made.org」尋找更多的說明或幫助。

你現在是陣營的建立者！\n確定要降職自己？

Element.Original: You can't demote another\nfounder but yourself!

Element.Translation: false，存檔檔名撞上相同的會拒絕存檔；true，自動在檔名後加上數字。

Element.Original: Enables Long Range Scanner. Provides extra information of your current system and region, not yet usable (universe update).
Ship has not been found! (original name: %s)

Element.Translation: 你不會受到任何傷害！\n（重生保護「%s／」秒）
Element.Original: You are not taking damage!\n(spawn protection %s / %s sec)

Element.Translation: 你的階級權限不能踢出玩家！
Element.Original: You cannot kick players of this rank!

Element.Translation: 白色水晶裝甲（White Crystal Armor）

Element.Original: Do you really want to kick %s\nfrom the faction?
Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 現在不容許你購買藍圖！
Element.Original: You are currently\nnot allowed to buy\nblueprints!

Element.Translation: 不能儲存多於\n「%s」項座標。\n請先移除不需要的。
Element.Original: Cannot save more than\n%s coordinates.\nPlease remove some first.

Element.Translation: 請求的物品不適合在物品欄！
Element.Original: Requested items don't fit in inventory!

Element.Translation: 請求的物品不適合在物品欄！
Element.Original: Requested items don't fully fit in inventory!

Element.Translation:
你的物品欄滿載後，新增１塊「儲物箱物品」，
接收滿載掉出的材料。

防止玩家有滿載的懲罰。

右按儲物箱取回材料。
Element.Original:
Your inventory was over capacity.
A block storage item has been created
which contains all of your blocks.

This is done to ensure the over capacity penalty wouldn't hit a player out of the blue.

You can pull out blocks from there by right clicking on the item.

Element.Translation: 不在商店範圍，\n被管理員覆寫！
金錢不足！\n未能購買太空站藍圖！
Element.Original: You don't have enough\ncredits to buy a\nstation blueprint!

Element.Translation: 不能從鎖上的物品欄扔下！
不能購買配方……\n請使用合成系統！
Element.Original: Can no longer buy recipes...\nPlease use the crafting system!

Element.Translation: 伺服器：請求的配方無效！\n「%s」。
無再中彈後，縮短再次供應護罩的時間。
Element.Original: Decreases the time it takes since the last hit for shields to regenerate.

Element.Translation: 伺服器：支付不起的配方\n「%s」\n「%s」。
四角錐體紫色標準裝甲（Purple Standard Armor Corner）

Element.Original: Increases EM damage of a linked weapon.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 伺服器：無空的欄位給配方！
Element.Original: SERVER: no slot free for recipe!

Element.Translation: 伺服器：配方的價格種類不明「%s」\n「%s」。
不能購買藍圖。\n防止濫發行為！\n請等候「%s」秒。
不能購買藍圖。\n金錢不足！
此藍圖是免費的！\n（商店無限供應）
只能從商店直接生成船隻。\n請使用藍圖購買系統！
Element.Original: Can only spawn ships\nfrom shop directly. Please\nuse the blueprint buy system!
Increases the turn rate of your ship.

Element.Translation:
警告！
可能作弊！
玩家「%s」
嘗試賣出違禁物品。
Element.Original:
WARNING
Possible hacking:
Player %s
tried to sell forbidden item.

Element.Translation: 警告！\n時間及空間正在扭曲！
警告！\n檢測到太空時間瓦解！
區域多久變成無效的（秒，－１＝永不）。
Element.Original: Time in secs after which sectors go inactive (-1 = off)

Element.Translation: 七面體黃色標準裝甲（Yellow Standard Armor Hepta）
不能購買！\n不在商店範圍！
伺服器：\n無權限使用商店！
四角錐體深灰色標準裝甲（Dark Grey Standard Armor Corner）
不能儲存藍圖！無空的欄位「%s／%s」！
不在商店範圍，\n被管理員覆寫！
本機資料庫已有相同的檔案！
Element.Original: File already exists\nin your local database!

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Original: Server doesn't allow blueprint ship spawning!\nPlease use a shipyard!

Element.Translation: 不容許從藍圖生成太空站！
Element.Original: Server doesn't allow blueprint station spawning!

Element.Translation:
請輸入藍圖的名稱！

可用的
「%s」。
Element.Original:
Please enter in a name for your blueprint!

Available:
%s

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 現在不能上傳！\n請等候「%s」秒。

Element.Original: Please enter in a name for your blueprint!

Element.Translation: 現在不能儲存！\n請等候「%s」秒。
只容許使用「字母」、「數字」或「_-」！
Element.Original: Must only contain letters or numbers or (_-)!

Element.Translation: 不能上傳！\n上傳正在被使用！
Element.Original: Cannot Upload!\nThere is already\nan upload in progress!
The blueprint of this item doesn't exist in the catalog!

Element.Translation: 不容許從藍圖生成太空站！
Element.Original: Server doesn't allow blueprint station spawning!

Element.Translation: 不容許從藍圖生成船隻！\n請使用船廠！
Element.Original: Server doesn't allow blueprint ship spawning!\nPlease use a shipyard!

Element.Translation: 不能建立停泊！已存在的名稱！選擇其他名稱。
Element.Original: Cannot create dock! Name already exists! Choose a different name.

Element.Translation: 不能建立停泊！\n測試區域不容許的動作。
Element.Original: Cannot create dock!\nAction not allowed in test sector.

Element.Translation: 上述是「船隻系統教學」。\n感謝你閱讀、遊玩《StarMade》！
Element.Original: This concludes the Ship System Tutorial.\nThanks for reading,\nand thanks for playing StarMade!

Element.Translation: 楔形棕色進階裝甲（Brown Advanced Armor Wedge）
不能生成！\n只容許每個區域有「%s」個太空站！
Element.Original: Cannot spawn here!\nOnly %s station(s) per sector\nallowed!

Element.Translation: 不能從此藍圖生成！\n已被改變或移除。\n材料在太空。
Element.Original: Can't spawn this blueprint!\nIt was changed or removed.\nSpawning items in space.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 與「推開脈衝電腦」連結，組成「推開脈衝系統」（Push Pulse System）。射出一團推開力場，推力與互相連接的磚數成正比。按「$ACTIVATE」決定那一格推開磚作為砲口。
Element.Original: The Push Pulse Module, when used in conjunction with a Push Pulse Computer, can create a basic but effective momentum system. The Push Pulse Module fires a momentum AOE field directly adjacent to the output point. Push Pulse Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their effect. You can also choose which block outputs the effect by finding the Push Pulse Module you want to output the pulse, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.
The blueprint of this item doesn't exist in the catalog!

Element.Translation: 錯誤！物品欄無該藍圖。\n（可能作弊）
不能生成藍圖！\n藍圖需要的材料不足，\n不能生成！
Element.Original:
Cannot spawn blueprint!
The blueprint doesn't
have all the materials
to spawn it!

四面體橙色水晶裝甲（Orange Crystal Armor Tetra）
如門磚一樣可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的力場磚組成大門。力場比鎖子門或玻璃門有更高的耐久值。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation:
你從「ＮＰＣ—03」學回來的武器組合，「ＮＰＣ—03」以為是秘密，其實全宇宙的人早就知道！

另外「ＮＰＣ—03」未講清楚。連結武器做隨從，還有「效果裝置」（Effect）！

效果裝置用於防衛，可以強化護罩，提高船速等；
與武器系統連結用於攻擊，有對應的攻擊效果，例如針對裝甲、電力供應等；
用於物理，有推、拉、停止動作。讓你創作出拖拉物體的光線！

最後，把武器與燈磚連結，為砲彈、光線著色。
Element.Original:
You learned about combinations back there. NPC-03 thinks it's such a secret, but in reality everybody knows it!

In fact, he doesn't even know everything about it. There is actually a second system you can connect to your weapons
in the same way you are combining weapons: Effects!

Now, you can place effects and use them as a defensive standalone system, they can harden your shields,
increase top speed and much more.

You can also connect them to your weapons, which then will give that weapon an effect amongst others like armour efficiency, power drain
and even physical effects like push, pull, and stop, so you can make your very own tractor beam!

Oh and one last tip: You can colour your weapon projectiles or beams by connecting a coloured light to them. Easy as that!
