Element.Original: Glittering Mattise Shards reflect so much light they almost seem to glow. Several technologies are based upon the use of these shards once processed.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 四角錐體紫色基礎裝甲（Purple Basic Armor Corner）

Element.Original: Do you really want to leave/forefeit?

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.
Do you really want to remove this race?

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: ＡＩ死後掉落物品的倍數（數值小於１＝更少，０＝無）。
Element.Original: multiply amount of items spawned after AI destruction. use values smaller 1 for less and 0 for none

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 藍色的裝飾用串接（Decorative Cascade （Blue））

Element.Original: Up to how many blocks should be produced (0 for unlimited)?

Element.Translation: ＮＰＣ艦隊船隻滿載後的極速（最高速度的比例）。
Element.Original: How fast NPC fleet ships are compared to their max speed when loaded

Element.Translation: 黃色警示裝甲1/2（Yellow Hazard Armor 1/2）

Element.Original: Strength depends on the amount of linked modules, you can switch firing modes with your Right Click.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 最多只能命名\n１６個物品欄！
輸入儲藏點的新名稱（最長１０個字元）。
Element.Original: Enter a new name for this stash (10 characters max)

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 白色基礎裝甲（White Basic Armor）
棕色進階裝甲1/4（Brown Advanced Armor 1/4）
星球體積標準差（正常的高斯分布圖按１／３水平比例分布）（最小值０）。
Element.Original: Planet size standard deviation. Note: normal gaussian distribution graph scaled horizontally by 1/3 (min 0)

Element.Translation: 昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: 比賽在此區域不能開始！\n無參賽者！
Element.Original: A Race in this sector cannot be started!\nNo Racers!
A race started in this sector!

Element.Translation: 七面體綠色進階裝甲（Green Advanced Armor Hepta）
紅色標準裝甲（Red Standard Armor）
裝飾用藍色顯示屏（Decorative Screen（Blue））
白色標準裝甲3/4（White Standard Armor 3/4）
工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: When a system block gets taken out, the integrity of all systems will be temporarily protected and stay at the value they had before damage\nto prevent rapid integrity decline in a battle, when the inital system was built with good integrity.\nProtection cancels when a block gets added.
Element.Original: When a system block gets taken out, the integrity of all systems will be temporarily protected and stay at the value they had before damage\nto prevent rapid integrity decline in a battle, when the inital system was built with good integrity.\nProtection cancels when a block gets added.

Element.Translation: 啟用跳躍航行有多重充填。\n\r
Element.Original: Enables the ability to store multiple charges of your Jump Drive.\n\r

Element.Translation: 轉換新的檔案格式前先備份世界。
Element.Original: Back up world when migrating to a new file format

Element.Translation: 他們認為你的陣營是敵人
不可用的物品（測試合成系統）。
Element.Original: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)

Element.Translation: 紅色進階裝甲1/2（Red Advanced Armor 1/2）
黃色水晶裝甲3/4（Yellow Crystal Armor 3/4）
WARNING: Shield matrix is currently disrupted!\nUnable to stop any damage.
Element.Original: WARNING: Shield matrix is currently disrupted!\nUnable to stop any damage.

Element.Translation: 粉紅色標準裝甲1/4（Pink Standard Armor 1/4）
強化標準裝甲磚結構的高科技材料，合成出耐久值更高的進階裝甲磚。
Element.Original: High-Tech Material capable of further enhancing the structure of standard armor blocks. This creates advanced armor.

Element.Translation:
教學完成。
與「ＮＰＣ—03」對話開始下一堂教學！

再見！
Element.Original:
I've taught you everything I know.
Talk to NPC-3 for the next steps in the tutorial!

Have a good tick!

Element.Translation:
船上的電腦磚，會自動與核心連結。
放置火砲電腦後，放置的砲管磚會自動與電腦連結，除非你放置其他的磚。

開始吧！給你火砲電腦及砲管磚。放置火砲電腦後，放置砲管磚，再按「G」開啟武器面板。
Element.Original:
If you place a cannon computer or any other controller on a ship, it is automatically connected to the
core. After you place a computer, each cannon barrel is automatically linked, unless you select
something else.

Go ahead, give it a shot. I'll give you a computer and some barrels. Place the computer first and then
place the barrels. After you're happy with it, press 'T' to open the weapons panel.

Element.Translation: 當你把方塊正確地順序放置，你不需要手動連結！\n\n
Element.Original:
Luckily on ships, if you put them down in the right order, you
won't have to do any manual connecting at all!

Element.Translation:
「打撈光線」（Salvage Beam）讓你在安全距離外打撈方塊及採礦，
打撈速度比人手快，效率與互相連接的磚數成正比。

「火砲」（Cannon）提供基本的武器，火力一樣與互相連接的磚數成正比。
你亦可以建造「武器組合」，例如散彈槍、機槍等。
之後我會再談組合的教學。
Element.Original:
The salvage beam lets you take blocks and mine minerals from a safe distance.
It's also much faster than picking up those blocks by hand, and will increase efficiency with salvage beam size.

The laser cannon is your basic defence and does more damage the bigger it is.
You can also make different versions of it, like a shotgun or a machine gun type.
I'll explain how that works later.

Element.Translation:
做得好「%s」，你學得真快！
現在講解船上的武器、其他系統。
當中「打撈光線」及「火砲」是最重要的。
Element.Original:
Well done %s, you are a fast learner!
Now, let's check out how weapons and other systems work on ships.
There are several weapons to choose from, as well as several systems,
most importantly the salvage beam and the laser cannon.

Element.Translation:
現在給你１塊船隻核心、數塊發電機及推進器。
前方要留有足夠的空間，不要對著地面。按「Ｘ」生成船隻並命名。

讓我先把預製的船隻移除。
Element.Original:
I will give you a core, a few power modules and a thruster.
To spawn that core, just press 'X' and name it. Be sure there is enough space
in front of you, so don't look at the ground while doing this.

Let me remove this pre-made ship real quick for you.

Element.Translation: 船隻有２個必需的系統——電力及推進，讓你的船隻航行。\n記著，推進器越多，電力需求、加速度亦然！
Element.Original:
A ship needs two essential systems to be usable: Power and Thrust.
Place both types on your ship and you will be able to fly.
Keep in mind, the more thrust modules you place, the more power you will need
and the faster you'll accelerate!

Element.Translation:
有數種取得船隻的方法。在藍圖目錄購買、偷取、打敗他人、送贈及自己動手建造！
建造的數量不限！好的創作者會建造出獨當一面的同級船隻。
讓我開始遂一講解。
Element.Original:
There are various ways to acquire a ship. Buy one from the blueprint catalogue,
steal one, defeat one, get one as a gift, and of course build one yourself!
You can build as many as you like!
A good ship builder can construct ships that dominate any other ship of equal size,
but let's start with the basics.

Element.Translation:
啊！「%s」，你學得不錯！
我是「ＮＰＣ—02」！

現在教你如何操控、建造船隻。
Element.Original:
Ah %s, you made it!
I'm "NPC-02"!

Now that you know how to fly a ship, I will teach you how to build one.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 長度「%s」公尺、高度「%s」公尺、寬度「%s」公尺。
護罩「%s／%s（「%s」s/秒）」護罩充填器「%s」 護罩儲存器「%s」需要電力「%」e/秒。
Element.Original: Shields: %s / %s (%s s/sec); RegenBlocks: %s; CapacityBlocks %s; Power Needed: %s e/sec

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 四角錐體橙色基礎裝甲（Orange Basic Armor Corner）
四面體紅色水晶裝甲（Red Crystal Armor Tetra）
由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 膠囊內懸浮著純晶體Parseen的異次元原子。
Element.Original: Cubatoms of pure crystaline Parseen float suspended within this capsule.

Element.Translation: 強化後勤性能的反應室。\n\r需要「反應爐管道」連接「反應室」及「反應爐電力」。
Element.Original: Reactor Chamber to enhance logistics.\n\rNeeds to be physically connected with a Power Reactor by using Reactor Conduit blocks.

Element.Translation: 強化匿蹤性能的反應室。\n\r需要「反應爐管道」連接「反應室」及「反應爐電力」。
Element.Original: Reactor Chamber to enhance stealth capabilities.\n\rNeeds to be physically connected with a Power Reactor by using Reactor Conduit blocks.

Element.Translation: 啟用永久使用匿蹤航行，持續消耗電力。
Element.Original: Enables permanent usage of your Stealth Drive at the cost of always consuming power.

Element.Translation: 學習基本的移動及建造。
Element.Original: Learn the basics of moevement and building.
Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 利用護罩防護你的船隻。
Element.Original: Protect your ship by adding shields.

Element.Translation: 利用進階建造工具輕鬆快速建造。
Element.Original: Faster and easier building with advanced build tools.

Element.Translation: 學習如何在船上裝上推進器。
Element.Original: Learn how add thrust for your ship.

Element.Translation: 學習如何建造物體的電力供應。
Element.Original: Learn how to build power supply for a structure.

Element.Translation: 功用是控制路軌的移動、轉動速度。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結控制裝置及路軌磚、轉動路軌磚，或「Shift＋V」與所有同一方向的路軌集體連結，之後再與１組隨意數量的「觸發磚」連結 。分組內，觸發磚觸發與解除狀態的比例決定最高速度的百分比，例如由５塊觸發及５塊解除的分組有最高速度的５０%，與１００塊觸發及１００塊解除的分組一樣。
Element.Original: The rail speed controller is used to manipulate the speed of your rails. Place it down and connect from it to all the rails that should be controlled. Using shift+V in build mode will add all touching rail blocks in the same direction. Then connect any number of activation blocks from the rail speed controller. The number of active blocks in opposition to the number of inactive blocks determines the speed percentage. So 5 active and 5 inactive is 50% of max speed, the same as 100 active and 100 inactive

Element.Translation: 對生成「私改藍圖」（Modified blueprints）的玩家「踢出」處理。
Element.Original: Kick players that spawn modified blueprints

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 船預備好了，在門後方！\n按「R」進船。
Element.Original: I prepared a ship for you behind that door!\nYou can enter it with 'R'

Element.Translation: 有２種模式。\n「建造模式」（Build Mode）建造船隻；\n「飛行模式」（Flight Mode）航行、攻擊。
Element.Original: There are two modes:\n- Build Mode, to efficiently build a ship\n- Flight Mode, to fly your ship and fire weapons

Element.Translation: 做得好！現在，你在船隻「建造模式」！
Element.Original: Great! You are now in build mode of the ship!
A StarMade Server Instance is already running on port %s

Element.Translation: 「索引資料庫」新增成功！玩得愉快！
讓我知道你是否找到在另一區的「ＮＰＣ—02」。
Element.Original: Let's see if you can make\nyour way over to NPC-02 over on the\nother side of this area

Element.Translation: 新增「索引資料庫」時出現錯誤！請附上記錄回報錯誤！
Element.Original: An error occurred creating the index database!\nPlease sent an error report!

Element.Translation: 好，旁邊是你船隻的狀態列。\n記著船體越大，轉向越難。
Element.Original:
Great, on the sides you now see your ship's status
bars.
Also keep in mind that the bigger a ship is, the longer
it will take to turn.

Element.Translation: 新增「索引資料庫」時出現錯誤！請附上記錄回報錯誤！
Element.Original: An error occurred creating the index database!\nPlease sent an error report!

Element.Translation: 現在按「空白鍵」切換到「飛行模式」。
Element.Original: Switch now to flight mode by pressing\nthe space bar.

Element.Translation: 按「$WEAPON_PANEL」開啟「武器面板」，拖放新武器往快捷欄或重置排列。
Element.Original: You can also rearrange them, or\nassign new weapons to your hotbar\nin the weapons menu by pressing '$WEAPON_PANEL'

Element.Translation:
按「$FORWARD」、「$BACKWARDS」、「$STRAFE_LEFT $STRAFE_RIGHT」、「$UP $DOWN」使用推進器。
「左Shift」減速。
「滑鼠滾輪」、「鍵盤的橫排數字欄」選擇在快捷欄的工具或武器。
有１０項快捷欄，按「Ctrl＋滑鼠滾輪」或「Ctrl＋橫排數字欄」捲動。
Element.Original:
Press $FORWARD $BACKWARDS $STRAFE_LEFT $STRAFE_RIGHT and $UP $DOWN to use your thrusters.
Use Left Shift to slow down.
With the mouse wheel and number keys you can
select your weapon or tool from the hot bar.
There are 10 hotbars for weapons. Hold control
and mouse wheel scroll through them, or press
contol + number key to switch directly.

Element.Translation: 如門磚一樣可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的力場磚組成大門。力場比鎖子門或玻璃門有更高的耐久值。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: 左按「觸發／開啟」；\n右按「解除／關閉」。
Element.Original: Left click to activate/open.\nRight click to deactivate/close.

Element.Translation: （按「%s」切換到飛行模式；按「%s」離開結構）
Element.Original: (Press %s to switch to FLIGHT MODE; press %s to exit structure)

Element.Translation:
注意！
無選擇控制裝置！
舉例，放置武器前，
請先放置或選擇武器電腦。
Element.Original:
Note:
You placed a controllable Block
Without having a conroller selected!
E.g. if you place weapons, please
select/place the weapon computer
first.

Element.Translation: 不能觸發此方塊！請使用在可以觸發的方塊，例如門、船廠核心錨位！
Element.Original: Cannot activate this block! Use on activatable blocks like doors or shipyard ancors!

Element.Translation:
注意！
無選擇控制裝置！
舉例，放置武器前，
請先放置或選擇武器電腦。
Element.Original:
Note:
You placed a controllable Block
Without having a conroller selected!
E.g. if you place weapons, please
select/place the weapon computer
first.

Element.Translation: 護罩改變多少％，伺服器立即報告。
Element.Original: percent of shields changed for the server to broadcast a shield synch

Element.Translation: 用於不同配方的綠色顏料。
Element.Original: A canister of green paint, used in various recipes.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 電磁脈衝效果裝置（EMP Effect Module）
由岩石小碎片及骨塊合成的精細沙粒。
Element.Original: Small fragments of rock and bone make up this fine sand.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 限制在幫手區域放置方塊。
Element.Original: Only place blocks inside build helper area

Element.Translation:
拖放最少「%s」
「%s」
往你的物品欄下方
兩個欄位其中之一。
Element.Original:
Drag at least %s more
%s into
one of the two slots
below your inventory

Element.Translation: 這是線性幫手工具。\n按「確定」進入攝影機選擇模式。\n按下選擇起點，再按選擇終點。
Element.Original:
With this tool, you can create a line helper.
Press 'Ok' to go into camera pick-mode.
In this mode you can click once to select the starting point
of the line.
Then click again to select the second point.
Please click on the Craft and then on the \n'%s' button
Please remove \n the item from the\n'%s' inventory

Element.Translation: 請把「%s」\n從「%s」的物品欄\n拖放到你的物品欄。
Element.Original:
Please drag 
%s from the
'%s' inventory
back to your own inventory

Element.Translation: 楔形晶體基複合材料（Crystal Composite Wedge）
合成快速、便宜的透明體，只是耐久值不足。
Element.Original: Relatively cheap and easy to make, Glass allows clear exterior views, however it has little in the way of durability when shot.

Element.Translation: 你不能開走這艘船！\n請離開船隻！
Element.Original: You can't bring that ship!\nPlease get out of the ship\nfirst!

Element.Translation: 你不能開走這艘船！\n請離開船隻！
Element.Original: You can't bring that ship!\nPlease get out of the ship\nfirst!

Element.Translation: 由Bastyn晶體合成的楔形進階電路。
Element.Original: An advanced circuit that's manufactured from Bastyn crystals.

Element.Translation: 四面體深灰色標準裝甲（Dark Grey Standard Armor Tetra）
飛去「ＮＰＣ—02」那裡。\n（按「$ENTER_SHIP」離開船隻後走過去）
Element.Original: Fly over to NPC-02\n(Exit ship with '$ENTER_SHIP')\n(Walk over if you exit the ship)

Element.Translation: 太空技術維修電腦（Astrotech Computer）
功用與「停泊裝置」相似。互相連接的路軌磚組成一條路軌後，用「路軌停泊磚」停泊下來。
Element.Original: This is the basic rail module. As a single block this module works like a docking module. You can put more of them together to make a track. Use the 'Rail Docker' to dock to this block.

Element.Translation:
「比賽大門」（Race Gate）由１格深呈環狀的「比賽大門裝置」所構成，與「比賽大門控制裝置」連結。
按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結控制裝置及裝置磚，或按「Shift＋V」集體連結。
之後連結數道大門做賽道，利用「標記光線槍」右按目的地大門的控制裝置，左按來源地大門的控制裝置。
開啟比賽起點大門的控制裝置，按「建立新比賽」填好資料。

讓參賽者閱覽清單後「參加比賽」，創辦者亦可以「移除比賽」。

設定好上述後，起點大門的控制裝置再與１塊「觸發磚」或「按鈕」連結，用來送出比賽開始的訊號，同時參賽者看見標記提示需要通過的大門。
Element.Original:
Race gate modules must form a 1 block deep loop to create a working Race Gate. 
To link your Race Gate controller to its Race Gates, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.
Link multiple Race Gates with each other to create a Race Track. Right click the destination Gate with a Marker Beam tool and then left click the source Gate with it.
To create a race on your Race Track. Go to gate you want as starting position and open its Gate Controller Menu. Press the “Create new race” button and fill in the details.

After that anyone can join the created list by clicking on it and pressing “Join Race”, you can also remove the race with the “Remove Race” button. 

When all racers are ready, link an activation controller or button to the starting gate’s controller. Sending a true signal will start the race. Every racer will see a marker which gate to go through first.

Element.Translation: ＡＩ命中率（數值越大某距離內準度越高，１０＝１０公尺內９９％命中率）。
Element.Original: how accurate the AI aims (the higher the value the more accurate vs distance. 10 = about 99% accuracy at 10m)

Element.Translation: 載入「%d」條目（數量多過５００可能變慢）
與「火砲電腦」連結，組成「火砲系統」（Cannon System）。射出直線的砲彈，火力與互相連接的磚數成正比。按「$ACTIVATE」決定那一格砲管磚作為砲口。
Element.Original: The Cannon Barrel, when used in conjunction with a Cannon Computer, can create a basic but effective weapons system. The Cannon fires a simple projectile in a straight line. Cannons do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their damage. You can also choose which block outputs the projectile by finding the Cannon Barrel you want to output the shot, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Original:
Enables the free target mode for all warpgates on this structure.

Press %ACTIVATE on a Warpgate Computer to set a target sector.

Element.Original: The Shield Supply Computer is required for creating functioning Shield Supply systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Shield Supply Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Shield Supply Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Shield Supply Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.

Element.Translation: 擴大停泊區域。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結停泊磚及擴張磚，正如武器系統的連結，或放置停泊磚按「Ｃ」再放置擴張磚自動連結。擴張磚無需在停泊磚旁邊，無指向性，自動向四周擴大停泊區域。
Element.Original: The Docking Enhancer can be used to increase the size of the Docking Zone created by a Docking Module. To use them, simply connect them to the Docking Module whose zone you want to increase by selecting the Module with C, and then using V to connect each Enhancer. As with Weapons, and other blocks that can be connected. The Docking Enhancers do not have to be adjacent to the Docking Module. Alternatively, you can lay a Docking Module down, select it with C, and then each Docking Enhancer you put down afterwards will be automatically connected to the Docking Module. As of now, there is no need to orient Docking Enhancers, as they will increase the Docking Zone all around, no matter which way they are facing, or where they are put in correlation to the Docking Module.
Set price to buy this block at.

Element.Original: A logic gate is an idealized or physical device implementing a Boolean function; that is, it performs a logical operation on one or more logical inputs, and produces a single logical output. This module will send "on" only if at least one logic module connected to it is "on".

Element.Translation: 伽瑪值（需要使用影格緩衝區）
如門磚一樣可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的力場磚組成大門。力場比鎖子門或玻璃門有更高的耐久值。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: 放置在「反應爐電力」及「反應室」之間，或相同種類的「反應室」之間，並自動連結上述的構成「反應爐鏈」。
Element.Original: A conduit to connect a group of Reactor Power blocks to a Chamber.\n\r\n\rIt automatically connects chambers <-> chambers or chamber <-> reactor, when the touching conduit blocks are in physical contact with both groups.

Element.Translation:
「比賽大門」（Race Gate）由１格深呈環狀的「比賽大門裝置」所構成，與「比賽大門控制裝置」連結。
按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結控制裝置及裝置磚，或按「Shift＋V」集體連結。
之後連結數道大門做賽道，利用「標記光線槍」右按目的地大門的控制裝置，左按來源地大門的控制裝置。
開啟比賽起點大門的控制裝置，按「建立新比賽」填好資料。

讓參賽者閱覽清單後「參加比賽」，創辦者亦可以「移除比賽」。

設定好上述後，起點大門的控制裝置再與１塊「觸發磚」或「按鈕」連結，用來送出比賽開始的訊號，同時參賽者看見標記提示需要通過的大門。
Element.Original:
Race gate modules must form a 1 block deep loop to create a working Race Gate. 
To link your Race Gate controller to its Race Gates, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.
Link multiple Race Gates with each other to create a Race Track. Right click the destination Gate with a Marker Beam tool and then left click the source Gate with it.
To create a race on your Race Track. Go to gate you want as starting position and open its Gate Controller Menu. Press the “Create new race” button and fill in the details.

After that anyone can join the created list by clicking on it and pressing “Join Race”, you can also remove the race with the “Remove Race” button. 

When all racers are ready, link an activation controller or button to the starting gate’s controller. Sending a true signal will start the race. Every racer will see a marker which gate to go through first.

Element.Translation: 錯誤！\n 「%s」逾時停泊，ＵＩＤ「%s」。\n物體現在駛離！
Element.Original:
ERROR: Docking timed out on
%s
to UID '%s'
Structure will now undock!

Element.Translation: 楔形藍色進階裝甲（Blue Advanced Armor Wedge）
星際之門電腦（Warp Gate Computer）
從各種材料合成出標準的磚。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉工廠的物品欄，放置配方需要的材料。
Element.Original: Manufactures standard blocks from a variety of resources. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close the Factory's Internal Inventory. (Used for placing the necessary materials for recipes.)

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 確定要重生？\n死亡後在最後觸發的「重生點」重生。
Element.Original: Are you sure you want to respawn?\nYou will spawn at the last activated\n\"Undeathinator\" module.

Element.Translation: 抱歉！無選單讓你上一步，請選擇「離開遊戲」。
Element.Original: Sorry! There is no menu to go back to. Please choose 'exit game'.
Those who don't exist cannot be killed!.

Element.Translation: 取消訂單！\n商店不在貿易網路或權限改變。
Element.Original: Cannot order! Shop no longer in trade network\nor permissions changed

Element.Translation: 用於不同配方的藍色顏料。
Element.Original: A canister of blue paint, used in various recipes.

Element.Translation: 楔形紫色基礎裝甲（Purple Basic Armor Wedge）
確定要重生？\n死亡後在最後觸發的「重生點」重生。
Element.Original: Are you sure you want to respawn?\nYou will spawn at the last activated\n\"Undeathinator\" module.

Element.Translation: 無效的區域多久從記億完全移除（秒，－１＝永不）。
Element.Original: Time in secs after which inactive sectors are completely removed from memory (-1 = off)

Element.Translation: 無效的比賽大門。\n要建造成２Ｄ迴路！
Element.Original: Invalid Racegate Build\nMust be one 2D loop!

Element.Translation: （左按上方圖案選擇方塊的形狀）
Element.Original: (click & hold on block to select shape)

Element.Translation: 左右箭頭去旋轉方塊！\n滾輪左按選方塊形狀！
Element.Original: Rotate Blocks\n(also with mousewheel)\nClick for shape select!
A mix of decomposed organic materials.

Element.Translation: 深灰色基礎裝甲1/2（Dark Grey Basic Armor 1/2）
楔形黃色進階裝甲（Yellow Advanced Armor Wedge）

狙擊步槍
傷害「%s」；
速度「%s」；
顏色（RGBA）「%s」；
距離「%s」。

你可以使用此系統升級武器或船隻防衛。

控制裝置與相關裝置的連結，在控制裝置按「%s」後，對裝置磚按「%s」
或「Shift＋$CONNECT_MODULE」集體連結。

這樣可以建造出「武器組合」及加上「效果」，亦可以在武器面板設定。

效果（Effect）
「%s」，
注意，需要１：１大小比例才有最大效果，
武器磚與效果磚一樣數量。

如果效果磚不與武器連結，則變成防衛系統，
在武器面板拖放防衛系統到快捷欄並隨時開啟。
Element.Original:
You can use this system to upgrade your weapons or to use defensively on your ship.

To link your Controller to its Modules, press %s on the Controller, then %s on the individual modules, 
or alternatively Shift + $CONNECT_MODULE to mass select grouped modules.

Afterwards you can link it to a weapon by connecting the weapon controller you want to upgrade
with the effect controller you just made.
You can do this manually with $SELECT_MODULE and $CONNECT_MODULE or in the Weapons Menu.


Effect:
%s

Note that for the full effect, 
you need to connect 1:1 in size. 
The amount of linked modules of your effect has to be the same amount of your weapon.

If not used linked to a weapon, 
the system has a defensive effect you can enable
Place the computer on your hotbar in the Weapons Menu
and activate it:

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation:
控制裝置與其他武器系統（火砲、光線、脈衝攻擊、飛彈）連結，去自訂武器。

控制裝置與相關裝置磚的連結，在控制裝置按「%s」後，對裝置磚按「%s」或「Shift＋$CONNECT_MODULE」集體連結。

之後可以在武器面板設定，或按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結其他的武器電腦，建造出「武器組合」。

注意，「武器組合」２種武器的武器磚數量在１：１大小比例才有最大效果。
Element.Original:
This controller can be connected to other weapons
and systems (cannon, beam, damage pulse, missile)
to customize your weapon.

To link your Controller to its Modules, press %s on the Controller, then %s on the individual modules, 
or alternatively Shift + $CONNECT_MODULE to mass select grouped modules.

Afterwards you can link it to another weapon by connecting the weapon controller you want to upgrade
with the weapon controller you just made.
You can do this manually with $SELECT_MODULE and $CONNECT_MODULE or in the Weapons Menu.

Note that for the full effect, 
you need to connect 1:1 in size.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 提煉後Threns礦石可以用於合成。數項技術需要這些礦石。
Element.Original: Threns Ore has useful manufacturing properties if refined into a more readily usable state. Several technologies are based upon the use of these ores once refined.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 楔形綠色基礎裝甲（Green Basic Armor Wedge）
由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 功用是與儲物箱連結，加大「儲物箱」容量。
Element.Original: Cargo Space blocks are used to expand the volume of a chest, this allows you to store more blocks in it. \n\rYou have to link the Storage block to the Cargo Space blocks.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

四面體綠色進階裝甲（Green Advanced Armor Tetra）

Element.Original: Cubatoms of Dolom minerals float suspended within this capsule.

Element.Translation: 店主：「商人公會」（購買商店磚建立自己的商店）
Element.Original: Shop Owner: Trading Guild (buy a shop module to create your own shop)

Element.Translation: 四面體青綠色水晶裝甲（Teal Crystal Armor Tetra）
紅色進階裝甲1/4（Red Advanced Armor 1/4）
無人（你可以取得所有權）
現在的權限「每位玩家可以購買及賣出」；
Element.Original: Current Permission: Everyone has permission to buy and sell

Element.Translation: 你的船隻質量或大小不符合要求。\n\n被排除出戰鬥！
Element.Original:
Your ship doesn't meet
mass or dimension requirements

You are currently
excluded from battle!

Element.Translation: 楔形黃色標準裝甲（Yellow Standard Armor Wedge）
功用是提升路軌載重、對抗路軌減速。停泊物的質量超過路軌載重，在路軌上移動減慢。需要消耗電力運作。
Element.Original:
This block is used to combat slow down on rails. 
There is a certain mass free to place on each rail, but in case that is reached, the rail movement will slow down immensly. 
Each 'Rail Mass Enhancer' adds more possible mass to all the rails on your structure but also require power to function.

Element.Translation: 參加戰鬥的人數不足！\n未找到預定的……\n正在重設回合！
Element.Original: Not enough players to battle!\nPreset not found...\nResetting round!

Element.Translation:
你被選上參加下一場團隊戰鬥！

做好準備！
（或離開陣營）
Element.Original:
You are up for the
next team battle!

GET READY!

Element.Translation: 選擇目錄的物體及陣營並互相對抗（預設陣營ＩＤ，－２是商人公會；－１是海盜；０是中立）。
Element.Original: Choose catalog entries and faction to fight each other. (Default Faction ID's: 0 is neutral, -1 is pirate, -2 is Trading Guild)

Element.Translation: 楔形粉紅色水晶裝甲（Pink Crystal Armor Wedge）
觸發抗減慢模式前先做多久的撞擊測試（毫秒）。
Element.Original: Milliseconds a collision test may take before anti-slowdown mode is activated
Choose an item from the left panel.

Element.Translation: 正在載入，發現船隻設計圖無核心！
Element.Original: No core on design while loading!

Element.Translation: 散發著柔和白光的Parseen水晶。
Element.Original: A block of Parseen Crystal. It's white in colour and emits a soft glow.

Element.Translation: 這裡是多格欄位，有物品的不同形狀。\n放置在快捷欄後，滑鼠滾輪或右按選擇形狀。
Element.Original: This is a Multi-Slot. It contains multiple shapes of the same item.\nYou can put it in your hotbar and select a specific shape with the mouse wheel\nor right click it and take a specific one.

Element.Translation: 現在可以設定方塊作為價格。
Element.Original: It's currently now allowed to set block as price

Element.Translation: 功用是預設時順時針轉動停泊物９０度角，並讓停泊物向著同一方向互相連接的路軌移動。與９塊為１組的「觸發磚」連結，改變每次轉動的角度。每塊觸發磚增加轉動４５度，可以利用觸發磚的觸發及解除功能有每次不同的轉動角度，９塊處於觸發狀態的觸發磚提供連續的順時針轉動。
Element.Original: This is the rail rotation module. Whatever goes on to it will rotate by default 90 degrees, and then move on in the given direction if there is another rail block to go to. The degree of rotation can be modified by connecting activation blocks. Connect from the rail rotator up to 9 activation blocks. Each active block will add 45 degrees to its rotation. So it is possible to dynamically change the rotation by just activating and deactivating the activation blocks. Nine active blocks will result in a constant rotation.

Element.Translation: 現在的權限「只有同盟可以購買及賣出」；
Element.Original: Current Permission: Only allies have permission to buy and sell

Element.Translation: 現在的權限「只有陣營可以購買及賣出」；
Element.Original: Current Permission: Only faction has permission to buy and sell
Preparing npc assets (takes a bit the first time)

Element.Translation: 現在的權限「敵人不可以購買及賣出」；
Element.Original: Current Permission: Only enemies don't have permission to buy and sell

Element.Translation: 貿易的權限「陣營及同盟可以放入或取走方塊及貿易」。
Element.Original: Trade Permission: Faction and Allies can take/put blocks and can trade here.

Element.Translation: 貿易的權限「警告！每位玩家可以放入或取走方塊及貿易」。
Element.Original: Trade Permission: WARNING: Everyone can trade and put/take blocks.

Element.Translation: 貿易的權限「店主可以放入或取走方塊及貿易」。
Element.Original: Trade Permission: Owner can take/put blocks and can trade here.

Element.Translation: 貿易的權限「陣營可以放入或取走方塊及貿易」。
Element.Original: Trade Permission: Faction can take/put blocks and can trade here.

Element.Translation: 七面體黃色進階裝甲（Yellow Advanced Armor Hepta）
黃色進階裝甲1/2（Yellow Advanced Armor 1/2）
由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 強化超光速性能的反應室。\n\r需要「反應爐管道」連接「反應室」及「反應爐電力」。
Element.Original: Reactor Chamber to enhance FTL capabilities.\n\rNeeds to be physically connected with a Power Reactor by using Reactor Conduit blocks.

Element.Translation: 膠囊內懸浮著純金屬Zercaner的異次元原子。
Element.Original: Cubatoms of pure metalic Zercaner float suspended within this capsule.
Type the name of the player.

Element.Translation: 切換到已命名的物品欄
重新校準推進器。\n倒數「%s」 秒。
擴大妨礙跳躍的範圍到「連接的區域」及「斜角的區域」。
Element.Original: Increases the range of Jump Inhibitor. \n\rIncludes neighbouring and corner sectors.

Element.Translation: 方塊的亮度（影響重新載入區塊的時間，對ＦＰＳ無影響）
Element.Original: Block light quality (impacts chunk refresh time, but not fps)

Element.Translation: 四角錐體白色標準裝甲（White Standard Armor Corner）
啟用「戰爭迷霧」。false，開啟全視野。
Element.Original: Use 'fog of war'. Turning this off will make everything visible to everyone

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 反應爐護罩的電力效率１（不可用）
Element.Original: Reactor Shield Power Efficiency 1 NOT AVAILABLE
How many credits do you want to drop

Element.Translation: 啟用小行星可以太空移動。
Element.Original: enables asteroids to be able to move in space

Element.Translation: 四角錐體綠色基礎裝甲（Green Basic Armor Corner）
由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 啟用跳躍航行有自動充填。
Element.Original: Enables the ability to automatically charge your Jump Drive.\n\r

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 在船隻，按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結「路軌停泊磚」及船隻的「儲物箱」；在停泊地，按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結「卸載路軌」及停泊地的「儲物箱」。然後，停泊地的儲物箱開啟「觸發自動拉入物品」；關閉船隻的。分別開啟船隻及停泊地的「圓形選單」，設定好「裝載／卸載路軌設定」的內容。當船隻的「路軌停泊磚」停泊「卸載路軌」後，船隻卸載材料到停泊地的儲物箱。
Element.Original: This is the unload rail module. Docking to a block like this will pull items from the chests that are connected to the rail docker of the docked ship to the chests that are connected to this rail block. You can put more of them together to make a track. Use the 'Rail Docker' to dock to this block.

Element.Translation: 膠囊內懸浮著純晶體Varat的異次元原子。
Element.Original: Cubatoms of pure crystaline Varat float suspended within this capsule.

Element.Translation: 楔形粉紅色標準裝甲（Pink Standard Armor Wedge）
提供不同的視野。放置後自動與船隻核心連結，用「左／右箭頭鍵」切入，可以射出「停泊光線」（Docking Beam）。
Element.Original: The Camera provides another viewpoint. They are automatically connected to the main Ship Core when placed. To cycle through cameras, you can use the Left and Right arrow keys. Cameras also are capable of outputing a docking beam, allowing an alternate docking beam output than from the core itself.

Element.Translation: 四角錐體橙色水晶裝甲（Orange Crystal Armor Corner）
由Varat晶體合成的基礎電路。
Element.Original: A basic circuit that's manufactured from Varat crystals.

Element.Translation: 如門磚一樣可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的力場磚組成大門。力場比鎖子門或玻璃門有更高的耐久值。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Click on an item to view its description.

Element.Translation: 在這裡放置有穩定度加成「%s」，距離「%s／%s」公尺
Element.Original: Stab. Efficiency of block to place: %s%% (%sm / %sm)

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
Increases Kinetic damage of a linked weapon.
Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 「%s」不穩定！（警告！受損後可能解體！）

Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 深灰色基礎裝甲1/4（Dark Grey Basic Armor 1/4）
楔形橙色進階裝甲（Orange Advanced Armor Wedge）
黃色基礎裝甲1/4（Yellow Basic Armor 1/4）
擴大妨礙跳躍的範圍到「連接的區域」。
Element.Original: Increases the range of Jump Inhibitor. \n\rIncludes neighbouring sectors.

限制在幫手區域「建造／移除」

不能在創造模式填滿藍圖！
Element.Original: Can't fill blueprint from creative mode!

Element.Original: Can't fill blueprint from creative mode!

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Selected personal cargo out of range!

Element.Translation: 告訴我關於船隻的事情！

那裡有一艘預製的小型船隻，中央是核心。
按「Ｒ」進入核心並操控船隻。
Element.Original:
That over there is a small pre-built ship. The core is at the centre.
You can enter the core by pressing 'R', and take control of the ship.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation:
教學完成。
與「ＮＰＣ—02」對話開始下一堂教學！

再見！
Element.Original:
I've taught you everything I know.
Talk to NPC-02 for the next steps in the tutorial!

Have a good time!

Element.Translation:
除了方塊的數量，船隻的設計及結構亦影響《StarMade》物體的效用及效率。

現在讓我講解。
Element.Original:
Block count is not all that matters, the architecture and design also has an important role on the effectiveness
and efficiency of every structure in StarMade.

For now we are only talking about Ships.

Element.Translation:
「船隻核心」（Ship Core）是船隻的「心臟」，失去心臟等同殘骸，所以要不惜一切保護核心。

另外，核心是操控船隻的地方，建造時要注意。
Element.Original:
Every ship has a core. A core is the heart of a ship, and without it the ship will not
function, so be sure to protect it at any cost.

Additionally the core block will serve as your vessel's point of control,
so be sure you keep that in mind when building.

Element.Translation:
你好「%s」，我是「ＮＰＣ—01」！

我會講解《StarMade》的最重點事情——船隻！
Element.Original:
Greetings %s, I'm "NPC-01"!

I will teach you about one of the most important things in the StarMade Universe: Ships!

Element.Translation: 塗上白色警示條紋的綠色標準裝甲。

Element.Original: This is the turret axis module. Use a Rail Docker to dock to this block. A Rail axis will only move within the axis the block is facing. However, it is possible to chain two of them together to make turrets with full 360 degree freedom.

Element.Original: No bonus for this group because there is a bigger group on the same side of the active reactor!

不能打撈！你的陣營階級不足！
塗上黑色警示條紋的黃色標準裝甲。
Element.Original: Yellow Standard Armor that has been emblazoned with black caution stripes.

Element.Translation:
功用是檢查指定系統的狀態。
與１塊「觸發磚」互相連接作為輸出。
感應器再與指定系統的磚連結做檢查。建議使用「時鐘電路」（Clock）定期輸出檢查訊號。

感應器與以下系統連結：
—「發電機」
—「輔助電力」
—「護罩」
—「門或力場」
—「雷達干擾裝置」
—「隱形裝置」
—「跳躍航行」
—「貨物」

感應器預設狀態值是０％，代表會被處於「關」、或被耗盡的系統例如０電力或０容量所觸發。

如同「路軌速度控制裝置」一樣，用１組的觸發磚去改變預設狀態值，舉例，３塊觸發及３塊解除的觸發磚分組有狀態值５０％。
Element.Original:
The sensor blocks is used to check the condition of a linked system.
It requires a touching activation block which will be used as output.
It also requires a block linked to the sensor to trigger a check. A clock that periodically sends a signal to the sensor is recommended.

Link the sensor to any of these blocks:
- power reactors
- power auxiliaries
- shields
- doors/force fields
- radar jammer
- cloaker
- jump drive
- cargo

The sensor has a default state of 0%. Meaning that it will trigger for blocks in an "off" state or for systems that are depleted such as 0 power or 0 volume used.

You can link the sensor to a number of activation modules to set any % other than 0. It works like a rail speed controller using ratios. 3 true linked activation modules out of 6 will set it to 50%.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。

Element.Translation: 死亡後扣減金錢的比例（在１到０之間取值，１＝損失所有，０＝無損失）。
Element.Original: players credits lost of total on death (must be between 0 and 1): 1 = lose all, 0 = keep all

Increases the top speed of your ship.

Place some 'cannon barrel modules' now. You can place them

Element.Translation:
基礎強化的短程雷達掃描。啟用後提供周圍物體的額外資訊。
「雷達掃描的強度」是與「匿蹤的強度」對抗，決定透露多少匿蹤物體的情報細節，及會否成功反匿蹤。

—關閉隱形；
—關閉雷達干擾；
—武器分組資訊；
—反應室分組資訊；
—反應爐分組資訊。

一般附帶在船隻。
否則伺服器「啟用」需要安裝「反應爐的偵察反應室」。
Element.Original:
Basic enhancement for the Short Range Scanner. When the Scanner is active, it provides extra information of all nearby entities.
Your scanner strength versus the stealth strength of your target, decides how much information you receive and what it counters of a Stealth Drive.

- Disables cloak
- Disables jamming
- Weapon group information
- Chamber group information
- Reactor group information

If enabled on the server, this chamber will also enable the Short Range Scanner on your structure. 
Otherwise it's already available.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 採自紅色星球表面的泥石。
Element.Original: Surface rock and dust from a Red Planet.

Element.Translation: 警告！執行腳本失敗！\n（檢視記錄）
Element.Original: Warning: Script failed to execute!\n(see log)

Element.Translation: 啟用後，防止同級反應爐或妨礙強度以下的船隻進行跳躍。\n\r電力消耗以目標的反應爐等級充填為基礎。
Element.Original:
Enables the Jump Inhibitor.

When enabled, it prevents any ship with a reactor level equal or less than the inhibitor's strength, to not function..
Power consumption depends on the target reactor level regeneration.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 設定使用哪個世界（設定old，使用舊的世界）。世界不存在會自動建立新的。
Element.Original: set world to use (set 'old' for using the old world). if no world exists a new one will be set automatically

Element.Translation: 確定要丟棄此物品？『不能復原』！
Element.Original: Do you really want to dispose this item?\nThis cannot be undone!

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 警告！完整值低於「%s」非常危險，護罩受損後系統會爆炸！
Element.Original: WARNING: A integrity lower than %s is dangerous and can lead to system implosion on shield damage!

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
You don't have enough credits!\n%s of %s

Element.Translation: 伺服器不存檔：\n管理員延遲\n（剩下「%s」秒）
不能生成！\n只容許每個區域有「%s」個太空站！
Element.Original: Cannot spawn here!\nOnly %s station(s) per sector\nallowed!

Element.Translation:
警告，檔案損壞！
「%s」
正在新增備份，
正在重新建立區域，
請附上記錄回報錯誤！
Element.Original:
WARNING: File corrupt!
%s
creating backup,
and regenerating new sector
please report this bug

Element.Translation: 伺服器出現錯誤！\n請附上記錄回報錯誤 。\n「%s」。
Element.Original: Error occured on Server!\nPlease send in server error report.\n%s

Element.Translation: 不能生成！\n不容許在此區域生成太空站！
Element.Original: Cannot spawn here!\nNo station spawning allowed in this sector!

Element.Translation: 提煉原料存於膠囊，用於各種合金、複合材料的合成。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉工廠的物品欄，放置配方需要的材料。
Element.Original: Refines raw materials into easily stored and used capsules of pure elements as well as the more generic alloys and composites. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close the Factory's Internal Inventory. (Used for placing the necessary materials for recipes.)

Element.Translation: 正在自動往空的快捷欄配置武器……\n（可以在選項關閉）
Element.Original: Automatically assigning\nweapon slots...\n(can be turned off in options)

Element.Translation: 不容許上傳藍圖！\n\n正在上傳的資料會被拋棄。
Element.Original:
This server doesn't allow
uploading blueprints!

Uploading data is discarded.

Element.Translation: 不能儲存藍圖！無空的欄位「%s／%s」！
true，船隻及其他結構使用「耐久值」（Hitpoint）系統；false，使用舊式系統，船隻核心中彈後「過熱」（Overheat）。
Element.Original: ships and other structures use the hitpoint system. if off, a ship will overheat when the core gets taken out (old)

Element.Translation: 橙色基礎裝甲3/4（Orange Basic Armor 3/4）
在宇宙同時存在多少模擬分組（性能）。
Element.Original: How many simulation groups may be in the universe simultaniously (performance)
An wedged ingot of refined Sapsun.

Element.Translation: 如門磚一樣可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的力場磚組成大門。力場比鎖子門或玻璃門有更高的耐久值。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: ＡＩ識別個人水雷裝置（Personal AI Mine-Module）
最後教學，找「ＮＰＣ—04」講解合成、個人武器。
Element.Original:
Now lets go to the last stage
of the tutorial:
Meet NPC-04 for information about
crafting and personal weapons

Element.Translation: 爆炸對護罩傷害的加成ｘ
爆炸對船殼傷害的加成ｘ

Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: 與「電力輸入電腦」連結，組成「電力輸入光線系統」（Power Drain Beam System）。射出直線的輸入光線，效率與互相連接的磚數成正比。按「$ACTIVATE」決定那一格輸入磚作為砲口。
Element.Original: The Power Drain Module, when used in conjunction with a Power Drain Computer, can create a basic but effective power transfer system. The Power Drain Module fires a transfer beam in a straight line. Power Drain Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their transfer rate. You can also choose which block outputs the effect by finding the Power Drain Module you want to output the effect, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Element.Translation: 現在不能傳遞訊息。\n玩家「%s」\n參加遊戲後會收到。

Message can't be delivered
at this time.
Player '%s'
will receive it when joining.

Cannot send!
Receiver's faction name has
invalid format!
(faction name must between [ ])

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;Start
Element.Translation: 歡迎來到「合成教學」！\n這裡你學習怎樣合成及工廠系統。
Element.Original: Welcome to the Crafing Tutorial.\nIt will explain StarMade's\ncrafting and factory system.
A type of vegetation covered in sharp spines.

Element.Translation:
按「R」開啟電腦檢視船廠的功能，按造廠的狀態（例如是否有船隻停泊），再按「送出命令」按鈕下命令。
按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結電腦磚、「船廠設施」及１塊「船廠核心錨位」才能運作。
Element.Original:
A shipyard has several features. To access them, just hit ‘R’ (Activate/Open) on the shipyard, and press the “Place Order” Button.
Here you can choose from several commands depending on the shipyard’s current state (e.g. if a ship is docked or not)

The Shipyard computer must be linked to both Shipyard Modules and exactly one Core Anchor to function.
Link the computer and modules using C and V.
This is a decorative elecrical panel with screens.

Element.Translation: 楔形Bastyn帶電電路（Bastyn Charged Circuit Wedge）

Element.Translation: 用來擴大「砲塔停泊磚」停泊區域，功用與「停泊磚擴張器」相似。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結停泊磚及擴張磚，正如武器系統的連結，或放置停泊磚按「Ｃ」再放置擴張磚自動連結。擴張磚無需在停泊磚旁邊，無指向性，自動向四周擴大停泊區域。
Element.Original: The Turret Docking Enhancer can be used for the Turret Docking Module, much like the Docking Enhancer can be for the Docking Module. To use them, you must simply connect them to the Turret Docking Module whose zone you want to increase by selecting the Unit with C, and then using V to connect each Enhancer. As with Weapons, and other blocks that can be connected. The Turret Docking Enhancers do not have to be adjacent to the Turret Docking Module. Alternatively, you can lay a Turret Docking Module down, select it with C, and then each Turret Docking Enhancer you put down afterwards will be automatically connected to the Turret Docking Module. As of now, there is no need to orient Turret Docking Enhancer, as they will increase the Docking Zone all around, no matter which way they are facing, or where they are put in correlation to the Turret Docking Module.

Element.Translation: 接受等候回覆的貿易請求
由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 散發著柔和紅光的Mattise水晶。
Element.Original: A block of Mattise crystal. It's red in colour and emits a soft glow.

Element.Translation: 由Rammet晶體合成的進階電路。
Element.Original: An advanced circuit that's manufactured from Rammet crystals.

Element.Translation: 你的階級權限不能踢出玩家！
Element.Original: You cannot kick players with this rank!
Please enter a name for your Universe.

Element.Translation: 這將會在《StarMade》的文件夾新增「匯出／備份」的檔案。
Element.Original: The export/backup will be created in your StarMade installation folder.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 藍色進階裝甲1/2（Blue Advanced Armor 1/2）

Element.Original: You don't have permission to edit this member!
Choose a role for this player.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 立即停止有多於Ｘ塊觸發狀態方塊的邏輯系統。給予１０秒冷卻時間防止伺服器負荷過載。
Element.Original: stop logic of objects that activate more than x blocks at once. They will enter a logic cooldown of 10 seconds to prevent servers from overloading

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 容易合成，簡單的燈管提供照明。
Element.Original: Simple to create, Light Rods are an easy way to add some lighting to the area.

Element.Translation: 掃描後提供目標小行星或星球平面的礦石資訊。
Element.Original: Provides asteroid or planet plate resource information in the target panel when scanned.

Element.Translation: 在船隻，按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結「路軌停泊磚」及船隻的「儲物箱」；在停泊地，按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結「裝載路軌」及停泊地的「儲物箱」。然後，船隻的儲物箱開啟「觸發自動拉入物品」；關閉停泊地的。分別開啟船隻及停泊地的「圓形選單」，設定好「裝載／卸載路軌設定」的內容。當船隻的「路軌停泊磚」停泊「裝載路軌」後，停泊地裝載材料到船隻的儲物箱。
Element.Original: This is the load rail module. Docking to a block like this will push items from the connected chests of this rail block to the chests that are connected to the rail docker of the docked ship. You can put more of them together to make a track. Use the 'Rail Docker' to dock to this block.

Element.Translation: 青綠色基礎裝甲1/2（Teal Basic Armor 1/2）
工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的門磚組成大門。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: 火砲種類水雷裝置（Cannon Type Mine-Module）
按「儲存所有結構成為藍圖」把正在操控的船隻或太空站存檔。\n管理員或單機遊戲，在聊天輸入指令「/save nameofship」會儲存船隻及太空站。
Element.Original:
If you click on 'Create new entry' the game will save
your current entered ship into the catalog.
As admin or during singleplayer you can
also use the command '/save nameofship' in chat
to save ships and even stations (stations will not
be listed but can be loaded with the '/load' command)

Element.Translation: 遊戲連線時「從伺服器另存新檔到本機」，有本機存檔。
Element.Original:
'Save in local catalog' is only relevant
in multiplayer, it will not save the ship
in the server's catalog but in your local
singleplayer catalog.

Element.Translation: 上傳前三思而行，上傳藍圖讓你在伺服器購買藍圖，\n但是伺服器的管理員亦會取得藍圖。
Element.Original:
You can also upload your local blueprints to the server
so you can buy them on it.
You and the server admins will have access to it,
so be sure you are OK with that.

Element.Translation: 目錄有權限設定——公共、陣營、總部，讓你決定誰能生成相關船隻。\n第４選項「敵人可以使用」，讓管理員或在單機遊戲設定海盜及商人公會可以生成。
Element.Original:
Catalog entries have permissions
that determine who can spawn them: others(everyone)/faction/homebase.
There is a fourth option 'enemy usable' for admins or in singleplayer to
make a ship spawnable for pirates and the trading guild.

Element.Translation: 利用目錄儲存船隻藍圖的檔案。\n在單人遊戲，在StarMade的「Blueprints」資料夾存檔；\n在連線遊戲，在伺服器對應的資料夾存檔。
Element.Original:
The catalog keeps track of ship blueprints.
When saving a blueprint in singleplayer they will appear
in your StarMade/blueprints folder.
When you save them on a server they will appear
in the server owner's folder.

Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 祝你旅途愉快！\n我們樂意幫你。
Element.Original: Hi, I hope you enjoy your stay in this world!\nIt has a lot to offer.

Element.Translation: 功用是提供公共權限。設定相互連接的磚向公共開放使用。
Element.Original: Modifies the permissions needed to use blocks normally locked by faction modules. When connected to a module, it shuts off the faction member requirement needed to activate that block.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。

Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 提煉晶體碎片的副產品，散發著珍珠色澤的晶體基複合材料。利用鍍膜把材料注入磚內點陣式空間合成出有用的晶體磚。
Element.Original: A pearlescent crystal composite. These blocks are byproducts of refining crystal shards, combining extranious substrates into versatile crystal lattices that are then melded into a useful crystal block.

Element.Translation: 四角錐體青綠色標準裝甲（Teal Standard Armor Corner）
青綠色基礎裝甲3/4（Teal Basic Armor 3/4）
首先，你維修好這裡的連結，火砲會自動開火。
Element.Original: First, you need to fix this connection for me. This cannon should fire automatically,\nbut they are not linked.

Element.Translation:
（管理員）例外：
「%s」
檢測到物理矛盾（dif），
正在刪除物體並回復……
Element.Original:
(ADMIN) Exception:
%s
physics inconsistency detected (dif)
Performing cleanup on object to recover...

Element.Translation:
先放置「火砲電腦磚」（控制裝置），
與「火砲磚」（裝置磚） 連結，然後利用控制裝置開火！

這裡的電腦磚就是快捷欄裡的電腦磚。
Element.Original:
So if you place a Cannon Computer (the controller) down,
the cannon barrels (modules) that are connected to it will fire when you use the controller!

It's the computer that controls the cannons as one object on the quick bar.

Element.Translation:
運作原理如下。
２種磚，「控制裝置」（Controller） 及「裝置磚」（Modules）。

控制裝置透過連結控制裝置磚。
Element.Original:
Here's how it works:
Almost all functional blocks come in two types: A controller and modules.

Each module on a structure is used by the controller it is connected to.

Element.Translation:
這裡是最新式的系統！
你要明白這些系統如何運作！
Element.Original:
Now this is the system everyone in our universe is using: the controller system!
Understanding this system is the key to make anything functional in this world!

Element.Translation:
伺服器錯誤！
檢測到雙重字元的更新
「%s」。
請附上記錄回報錯誤。
Element.Original:
SERVER ERROR
Double character update
detected:
%s
Please send in server logs.

Element.Translation: 紫色基礎裝甲1/2（Purple Basic Armor 1/2）

列舉隨從的例子。

火砲電腦會增加射速；
飛彈電腦會增加發射彈數；
光線攻擊電腦會增加射程、彈速；
攻擊脈衝電腦會增加傷害。

組合種類繁多，讓我們把這台火砲改成散彈槍。
Element.Original:
Here are some of the most common examples:

- A 'Cannon Computer' slave will increase firing speed.
- A 'Missile Computer' slave will fire more projectiles.
- A 'Damage Beam Computer' will increase range and/or speed.
- A 'Damage Pulse Computer' will increase the damage dealt.

There are a lot of combinations.

I prepared an example for you over there! We are going to turn this cannon into a shotgun.

Element.Translation:
（管理員）例外：
「%s」
檢測到物理矛盾（miss），
正在刪除物體並回復……
Element.Original:
(ADMIN) Exception:
%s
physics inconsistency detected (miss)
Performing cleanup on object to recover...

Element.Translation:
改變方法如下，

需要２塊電腦磚，電腦磚與各自的裝置磚連結。
然後２塊電腦磚互相連結，建造出「武器組合」。

合二為一武器組合的攻擊效果，與那一塊電腦磚作為另一塊電腦磚的隨從（Slave）有關。
Element.Original:
This is how it works:

If you have two computers with each having their own connected modules, you can actually link
those two computers together to create a powerful combination weapon.

You forfeit the ability to fire both weapons separately for a single, more powerful weapon

Depending on which weapon system you "slave" to another, the results will differ.

Element.Translation:
客戶端錯誤！
檢測到雙重字元的更新
「%s」。
請重啟及附上記錄回報錯誤。
Element.Original:
CLIENT ERROR
Double character update
detected:
%s
Please restart and send in logs.

Element.Translation:
留心，這是讓你有優勢的提示。

你應該留意到火砲的充填時間太久。
其實你可以改變充填時間！
改變方法亦適於用其他武器。
Element.Original:
This information can give you an edge over your opponent, so listen closely:

As you may have noticed when you flew those ships back there, the laser cannon has a fairly
long reload time. There is actually a way to change that!
And the best thing is, you can apply the same knowledge to any other weapon out there.

Element.Translation:
你好！歡迎來到進階教學！

從「ＮＰＣ—02」得知你建造出第一艘船隻！
不錯！
Element.Original:
Hello there! Welcome to the advanced class!

I've heard from NPC-02 that you have already built your first ship!
That's really impressive!

Element.Translation: 船廠錯誤！關鍵性伺服器錯誤，\n無欄位去保留空間！

Element.Original: This is a decorative elecrical panel.

Element.Translation: 改變護罩密度針對低傷害武器，特別是高射速的。\n\r缺點是防護高傷害武器脆弱。
Element.Original:
Changes your shield density to take less damage from low damage weapons.
This makes the shield more vulnerable to high damage weapons though.

Efficient against fast firing weapons.

Element.Translation: 四面體粉紅色基礎裝甲（Pink Basic Armor Tetra）

Element.Translation: 功用是停泊在「基礎路軌」、「轉動路軌」或「路軌砲塔中軸」。箭頭指著停泊的方向。每塊停泊磚在武器欄單獨顯示及運作，不受停泊物的體積、質量影響，不能有障礙物。
Element.Original: This is a rail docking module. It is used to dock to a basic rail, a rail rotator, or a Rail Turret Axis. The arrow on its top side works like a magnet aligning itself with the arrow on the block you are docking to. For each docker you can set a docking beam from within your weapon panel. There is no restriction to the size and mass in docking, except overlapping areas are not allowed.

Element.Translation: 七面體黑色基礎裝甲（Black Basic Armor Hepta）
加快跳躍航行的充填速度。
Element.Original: Increases the recharge speed of your Jump Drive.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;StateE
Element.Translation: 遊戲會按玩家人數及意願，決定執行團體還是ＦＦＡ死鬥。\n按「$LEADERBOARD」開啟排行榜。
Element.Original:
The game will decide between FFA or Team Deathmatch
by looking at the player count in each faction.
The mode with the most players will be chosen.
Press '$LEADERBOARD' to see the Battle Mode leaderboard.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;StateD
Element.Translation: 戰鬥前，玩家選擇參加「團體陣營」或「ＦＦＡ陣營」（Free-for-all）。
Element.Original: To battle, the players have to join a\nspecific faction: Team factions or the FFA faction.

Element.Translation: 功用是引導「反應爐電力」及「反應爐穩定器」之間的「能量流動」（Energy Stream ）。
Element.Original:
Optional Block to direct the energy stream 
between your stabilizer and a main reactor.

Connect the nodes to create a path. The stream will
enter from the main reactor to the closest starting
point, and go from the end point to the stabilizer.

Element.Translation: 白色水晶裝甲3/4（White Crystal Armor 3/4）
滑鼠滾輪在快捷欄反轉捲動
為陣營取得星系的所有權
歡迎來到「ＡＩ教學」！\n這裡你學習怎樣使用ＡＩ及功用。
Element.Original:
Welcome to the AI Tutorial.
This tutorial will teach you about
the AI functionality in StarMade
and how to use it.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;StateB
Element.Translation: 在《StarMade》收集材料及建造耗時，\n戰鬥模式讓玩家即時「死鬥」（Death Match）或「團體戰鬥」（Team Battle）。
Element.Original:
In StarMade, building and
gathering resources takes time,
Battle Mode lets people duel in a
death match or team battle without having
to worry about the rest.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;StateC
Element.Translation: 管理員編輯「server.cfg」開啟「戰鬥模式」。\n「Use_Personal_Sectors」設定true，玩家不能離開自己的區域，\n商店提供無限材料讓玩家建造ＰＶＰ船隻。
Element.Original:
Admins can enable Battle Mode by editing
the server.cfg file.
If the "Use_Personal_Sectors" option is set to 'true',
each player will have its own sector he cannot leave,
but he will be provided with an infinite shop that
never runs out of supplies nor requires credits to use,
allowing you to build a PVP ship.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;StateA
Element.Translation: 「戰鬥模式」（Battle Mode）是《StarMade》的另類模式，\n用來測試將來的街機戰鬥遊戲模式。
Element.Original:
Battle Mode is a sub-mode for StarMade
as a simple test for future modes.
It essentially turns the game into a
arcade fighter.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 減少星際之門的電力消耗。
Element.Original: Decreases the power usage of your Warpgates.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 自動往空的快捷欄配置武器
Element.Original: Autoassign weapons on fire if bar empty

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。

Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: ～～無線電廣播～～\n我現在讓你試一試那些控制！
Element.Original: ####RADIO-TRANSMISSION####\nI'm going to let you try out the controls for a bit now!
Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的門磚組成大門。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: 低完整值的裝置不會解體！

Element.Translation: 警告！\n反應爐低穩定度，會造成反應爐鏈中彈後承受更多的傷害！\n
Element.Original: ---WARNING---\nLow reactor stability is causing additional damage on the ship's chambers!\n

Element.Translation: 「雷達掃描天線」決定掃描１次的時間。由最長的天線軸（隨意Ｘ、Ｙ、Ｚ軸）對上結構最長的軸所決定。
Element.Original: Antennas reduce the time needed to scan. The value is determined by the longest touching group dimension (either X, Y, or Z) versus the longest dimension of the structure it is placed on.

Element.Translation: 反應爐不再因低穩定度而受損！

功用及限制與「停泊裝置」相似，但是讓停泊物自由轉動有砲塔功能。形成指向性區域，不能有障礙物。
Element.Original: The Turret Docking Module functions very similarly to the Docking Module. Except that it allows the docked item to freely rotate, thus enabling turret capabilites. All the other rules and limitations of the Docking Module still apply. You can orient the block and thus the zone, and there must be no other blocks than the docked item in the zone.

Element.Translation: 裝甲值吸收更多的傷害。
Element.Original: Increases the amount of damage your armor blocks can withstand from any kinetic based damage.

Element.Translation: 功用是提供陣營權限。設定相互連接的磚向陣營成員開放使用，並關閉使用請求。
Element.Original: Modifies the permissions needed to use blocks normally locked by a certain faction rank. When connected to a module, it shuts off the faction rank requirement needed to activate that block.

Element.Translation: 「$RESOURCES」按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉工廠的物品欄，放置配方需要的材料。
Element.Original: $RESOURCES Press $ACTIVATE toOpen/Close the Factory's Internal Inventory. (Used forplacing the necessary materialsfor recipes)

Element.Translation: 用於建立「推開脈衝系統」（Push Pulse System），控制不限數量的「推開脈衝裝置」，分成多組會增加電力消耗。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結電腦磚及推開磚。$MAINCOMBI 按「$ACTIVATE」進入／離開電腦。
Element.Original: The Push Pulse Computer is required for creating functioning Push Pulse systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Push Pulse Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Push Pulse Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Push Pulse Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.

Element.Translation: 昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: 可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的門磚組成大門。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Original: Power Supply Beam\n(right click to view)

Element.Translation: 與「電力輸出電腦」連結，組成「電力輸出光線系統」（Power Supply Beam System）。射出直線的輸出光線，效率與互相連接的磚數成正比。按「$ACTIVATE」決定那一格輸出磚作為砲口。
Element.Original: The Power Supply Module, when used in conjunction with a Power Supply Computer, can create a basic but effective power transfer system. The Power Supply Module fires a transfer beam in a straight line. Power Supply Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their transfer rate. You can also choose which block outputs the effect by finding the Power Supply Module you want to output the effect, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Original:
After you placed a macro factory you will see
that it needs power to function. You can provide
that power by shooting it with your personal power
supply beam, or if you have them, placing down
power recharge blocks. If you don't have any power blocks
then it should focus to craft some in your new factory.

Copy catalog from another world?

Pressing cancel will not delete your blueprints,
but all catalog entries will reset their permissions (owner, pirate usable, etc).
