Element.Original: This block needs a connection to a computer!\nPlease place a '%s' first, or press [%s] on an existing one before placing this block

Element.Translation: 不能移除方塊！\n物品欄滿載！
放置穩定度「%s%%」反應爐穩定器。反應爐的穩定度，與反應爐及穩定器之間的距離成正比。方塊的說明會顯示穩定度１００%%的最短距離。
Element.Original: You are placing a Stabilizer with %s%%. Make sure that the stabilizers are far enough from any reactor (active or inactive). The minimum distance for 100%% is displayed on the block context help.

Element.Translation: 按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結「貨物空間磚」及「儲物箱」，\n或「Shift＋V」集體連結。
Element.Original: Cargo needs a connection to an inventory!\nPlease place a block with an inventory first (e.g. %s), or press [%s] on an existing one before placing this block

Element.Translation:
警告！反應爐的穩定度低於５０％。減少供電及反應爐鏈中彈後，內部爆炸承受更多的傷害。

在主反應爐遠方，才放置穩定器提升穩定度，
或在主反應爐附近，放置大量的穩定器。
Element.Original:
Warning: Your reactor stabilization is less than 50%. This negatively impacts the performance of your reactor, and causes extra damage to your reactor when it is hit.

Place some stabilizers a distance away from your main reactor to increase your stabilization.
The minimal distance is determined by the size of your main reactor. If you plan on building the stabilizers closer, you will need to place more of them.

Element.Translation: 反應爐重新啟動時，不能修改反應爐的設定。
Element.Original: Cannot modify reactor configuration while a reactor is rebooting!

Element.Translation: 反應爐重新啟動時，不能修改反應爐的設定。
Element.Original: Cannot modify reactor configuration while a reactor is rebooting!

Element.Translation: 不能打撈核心！請人手撿起。
Element.Original: Can't salvage core! Please Pick up manually.

Element.Translation: 不能打撈！你的陣營階級不足！
不能打撈「受保護的總部」！

Element.Original: Can only salvage defeated AI ships!

Element.Translation: 不能取得方塊！\n不能開採的物體。
Element.Original: Cannot take block\nStructure is not minable

Element.Translation:
伺服器警告！不明的「%s」
嘗試編輯
「%s」
（陣營訪問被拒）。
Element.Original:
SERVER-WARNING: unknown(%s)
tried to edit
%s
(faction access denied)
You can only salvage overheating ships.

Element.Translation:
伺服器警告！「%s」
嘗試編輯
「%s」
（陣營訪問被拒）。
混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 正在重新啟動，\n不能移除方塊！\n（%s）
腐朽的太空站！\n只能打撈廢料！\n（在太空站按「%s」維修太空站）
Element.Original:
The blocks on this Station are
worn and decayed!
You can only salvage scrap!
(Press %s on the station to repair)

Element.Translation:
輔助電力資訊！

容量「%s／%s」；
充填速度「%s」e/秒；

此分組容量「%s」；
充填速度「%s」e/秒。
Element.Original:
AUXILIARY POWER INFO

Capacity: %s/%s
Recharge Rate (e/sec): %s

This Group:
Capacity: %s
Recharge Rate (e/sec): %s

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateJ
Element.Translation: 按「$ACTIVATE」開啟大型工廠設定合成。\n在篩選輸入「電力」（Power），於下拉式選單選擇與電力相關的磚。\n在樹狀圖查閱需要的材料。
Element.Original:
Open the macro factory with $ACTIVATE and click on
change production. You can use the filter and type
for example 'power' to quickly find power modules
in the drop down menu. After you chose the power recharge
module, you can click on graph to see exactly
what you need for making that block.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateI
Element.Translation: 當你有２０塊合金網格或電路，按「合成大型」按鈕合成出「大型工廠」。\n大型工廠可以合成出所有方塊。你只能在太空站或星球放置工廠磚。
Element.Original:
When you have either 20 metal meshes or circuits,
press on the 'craft macro' button to craft your first macro
factory. The macro factory makes every craftable
block in the game. You can only place this block
on a station or a planet.

Element.Translation: 你無陣營。\n確定重設物體成中立？
Element.Original: You are not in any faction.\nDo you want to reset this object to neutral?

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateL
Element.Translation: 可以建造多間工廠，連結並處理各個合成。\n連結方法是，對工廠磚按「$SELECT_MODULE」，再對供應材料的工廠磚按 「$CONNECT_MODULE」。
Element.Original:
You can of course craft multiple factories
to do all these steps at once.
Furthermore you are able to link factories:
Press $SELECT_MODULE on the factory you want to be able
to take needed materials out for other factories and
press $CONNECT_MODULE on those to connect them with it.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateK
Element.Translation: 重點是工廠合成只按樹狀圖最底層的步驟做起，更底層的步驟由其他工廠合成。\n舉例，這裡需要「合金網格」及「動態Varat處理器」（Active Varat Processore），\n處理器需要在另一間工廠合成出來，或重設本廠的合成。
Element.Original:
IMPORTANT: The factory will only do the last step
of the graph. Every step below that will require it's
own factory. In this example the only thing that
this factory will consume is Metal Mesh and
'Active Varat Processore', which you need to produce
in a separate factory (or change the production on this one).

Element.Translation: 請先解鎖船隻，\n或陣營會被覆寫！
Element.Original: Please undock this ship first, or\nfaction would be overwritten!

Element.Translation: 在受損船隻放置方塊有負面效果！\n請重新啟動船隻後才建造。
Element.Original:
Placing blocks on a damaged ship
can lead to negative effects!
Please reboot the ship before placing
any blocks.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateM
Element.Translation: 連結後工廠自動從其他工廠磚取出材料。\n形成的生產線，會自動把底層的原料合成出頂端的產品。
Element.Original:
A factory will take ingredients needed from
all the factories that are connected to it.
This basically enables you to rebuild a whole
crafting tree. Then you can put in raw resources
in the bottom and get the high level product on the top.
You don't have crew in this slot.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 同時只能有５項待定的邀請。
Element.Original: You can only have five\ninvitations pending\nat the same time.
Please connect the block\nthe marker is pointing to!
Please select the block\nthe marker is pointing to!

Element.Translation: 消耗電力緩慢回復裝甲值。
Element.Original: Increases the amount of damage your armor blocks can withstand from any environmental based damage.
Cannot modify:\nYou are not in any faction!

Element.Translation: 你的陣營被消滅，\n不復存在！
Element.Original: Your faction is corrupted\nand does not exist!

Element.Translation: 輸入要邀請的玩家名稱。
Element.Original: Enter Name of the player you want to invite

Element.Translation:
在「顯示器」使用不同的文字風格。
開首<style></style>選擇「字型」及「顏色」，
例如<style>c=#FF0000,f=1</style> ->顯示紅色及中等大小的文字。
f=x（x的0,1,2代表文字大小）；
c=x（x代表ＣＳＳ、Ｈｔｍｌ的「十六進制顏色碼」（Hex code），編碼開首是「#」。


文字可以放入「變數」，
「%s」。

把「觸發磚」與作為文字來源的「顯示器」相互連接，再把「觸發磚」與另一台「顯示器」「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結，
之後觸發「觸發磚」會把另一台「顯示器」上的文字取代成文字來源的。
其他的文字指令有：
* '[PASSWORD]text'：隱藏文字；
* '[ADD]text'：[ADD]之後的文字會加入顯示在連結的另一台「顯示器」（[ADD]要放在句首）；
* '[DEL]number'：[DEL]之後的數目決定在連結的另一台「顯示器」移除多少文字（[DEL]要放在句首）；
* '[REPLACEFIRST]regexp[WITH]replacement'：使用ＪＡＶＡ語言取代特定的文字 ([REPLACEFIRST]要放在句首）；
* '[REPLACEALL]regexp[WITH]replacement'：使用ＪＡＶＡ語言取代特定的文字（[REPLACEALL]要放在句首）；

可以使用「感應器」檢查２台「顯示器」的文字是否一致（會自動忽略[password]指令）。
Element.Original:
You can use different kinds of styles for your display block.
Use a header like <style></style> to select font and color
e.g. <style>c=#FF0000,f=1</style> -> red text with medium font size.
f=x (x can be 0,1,2 for font sizes)
c=x (x has to be a hex code for font (used in css/html) starting with #)


Variables that can be placed inside the text:
%s

If you place an activation block next to this block and connect that block
to another display, the content of that display will be replaced with this one.
There are several other methods to edit the content of the connected display:
* '[PASSWORD]text': The text in this block will not show up.
* '[ADD]text': The text after [ADD] is added to the existing text of the connected block ([ADD] must be in the very front)
* '[DEL]number': Removes an amount of characters from the connected block ([DEL] must be in the very front)
* '[REPLACEFIRST]regexp[WITH]replacement': use java conform regular expressions to replace specific text ([REPLACEFIRST] must be in the very front)
* '[REPLACEALL]regexp[WITH]replacement': use java conform regular expressions to replace specific text ([REPLACEALL] must be in the very front)

You can also use the sensor block to check if two display blocks have equal text content. Just connect the sensor block to two display blocks as input. The [password] tag is ignored when comparing text.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateC
Element.Translation: 其他合成系統是「配方」（Recipe），決定固定的生產線。\n例如１０瓶任何種類的「膠囊」合成出「合金網格」。
Element.Original: The other system is using recipes.\nRecipes just determine fixed product lines.\nFor example: 10 of any ore capsule makes a meta mesh.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateD
Element.Translation: 現在動手，從零做起，首先使用個人光線。
Element.Original: Enough theory for now. Here is how you start\nwith absolutely nothing but your initial\npersonal power beam.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateA
Element.Translation: 《StarMade》的合成採用「一致性系統」。\n每件產品由一定數量其他產品合成出來，如此重複合成下去。\n有樹狀圖講解合成條件。
Element.Original:
Crafting in StarMade is based on a "consistence" system.
Every craftable element has an amount of
other elements it is made from. These other
elements again have other elements they are
made off and so forth.
You can compare this system with a tree that has branches.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateB
Element.Translation: 一致性樹狀圖無迴路，\n樹底元素的支節向上延伸重疊，\n不能形成單獨的分枝。
Element.Original: Consistence trees do not loop, so\nan element (the tree's root) is never in any\nof the branches of its own crafting tree.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateG
Element.Translation: 把碎片或礦石放入其中１個空格，另１格留空給產品，\n合成出大量某種膠囊後，拖放膠囊往物品欄。
Element.Original:
Put one type of shards or ores in it and leave
the second slot empty (the processed product will use this slot).
After a short time, you should be
getting a lot of capsules from that type.
Place those in your inventory.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateH
Element.Translation: 在物品欄按「微型」按鈕，把合成出來的膠囊拖放到那裡。\n需要任何種類的１０瓶膠囊合成出「合金網格」（從礦石膠囊）或「電路」（從碎片膠囊）。\n這２種基本產品合成出《StarMade》大多數的方塊。
Element.Original:
After you made some capsules, click on
the 'Micro' button in your inventory and place
them there. You need 10 capsules of any(!)
type to produce either metal meshes (ore capsules),
or circuits (shard capsules).
Those two are the base ingredients for most of
the blocks in StarMade.
Increases the strength of your Jump Inhibitor.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateE
Element.Translation: 《StarMade》有２種原料——水晶碎片（Crystal Shard） 及礦石（Ore），\n星球隨機供應２種原料；小行星則１種。\n小行星與恆星的距離，決定小行星供應哪種原料。
Element.Original:
StarMade's raw resources exist in two groups:
Crystal shards and ores. Each planet part
has two random resources, while the resources
on asteroids are set per type. You'll find
different types of asteroids depending on
the distance between the sector and the star.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateF
Element.Translation:
起初、利用太空衣及簡單的船隻採礦。
之後「$INVENTORY_PANEL」開啟物品欄，
按「合成膠囊」開啟個人的膠囊工廠。
當然，在工廠合成更快速、有效。
Element.Original:
To start, collect some raw ore by salvaging
some resources with a basic ship or as astronaut.
After you've done that, open your inventory with $INVENTORY_PANEL and click the
'Craft Capsule' button. This will open your personal
capsule factory. You can also craft a factory block
that is faster and more efficient.

Element.Translation: 飛彈耗盡！\n放置「飛彈容量裝置」增加物體的飛彈儲存數目。
Element.Original: Missile storage depleted!\nIncrease missile storage by placing missile capacity modules on your structure.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由Varat晶體合成的進階電路。
Element.Original: An advanced circuit that's manufactured from Varat crystals.

Element.Translation: 四面體白色基礎裝甲（White Basic Armor Tetra）
提煉後Zercaner礦石可以用於合成。數項技術需要這些礦石。
Element.Original: Zercaner Ore has useful manufacturing properties if refined into a more readily usable state. Several technologies are based upon the use of these ores once refined.

Element.Translation: 散發著柔和白光的楔形Parseen水晶。
Element.Original: A wedge of Parseen Crystal. It's white in colour and emits a soft glow.

Element.Translation: 四角錐體黑色水晶裝甲（Black Crystal Armor Corner）

Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation:
標記光線槍
標記「%s」，
位置「%s」。
左按「進入標記資訊」；
右按「標記」。
Element.Original:
Marker Beam
Current Marking On: %s
Local Pos: %s
Right click -> mark
Left click -> enter marker informatinon

Element.Translation: 順時針轉動路軌（Rail Rotator Clock Wise）

嘗試生成的船隻，方塊數量超出限制！
（例如陣營方塊）
「%s」在「%s」，
玩家「%s」。
Element.Original:
Tried to spawn ship with more than the
allowed amount of restricted block (e.g. faction block)
%s in %s
by %s

Element.Translation: 取消貿易因為失去艦隊！
Element.Original: Trade canceled because fleet was lost!

Element.Translation: 容許物體「%s」利用你的路軌磚拉入材料嗎？
Element.Original: Entity %s wants to pull items via your rail blocks. Allow?

Element.Translation: 容易合成，簡單的燈管提供照明。
Element.Original: Simple to create, Light Rods are an easy way to add some lighting to the area.

Element.Translation: 楔形白色水晶裝甲（White Crystal Armor Wedge）
永久容許陣營的，\n其他的先詢問
七面體綠色警示裝甲（Green Hazard Armor Hepta）
由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation:
反應爐的穩定度，與反應爐及穩定器之間的距離成正比。
各等級或大小的反應爐，有各種距離最佳化、穩定度最佳化。

低穩定度減少供電；穩定度無１００％有高爆炸性。
即是反應爐鏈中彈後，內部爆炸造成更大的傷害。

建議穩定度１００％才投入戰鬥。
Element.Original:
Increases the Stabilization rating of your active Reactor. This block loses efficiency the closer it gets to the Active reactor.
Each Reactor size (level) has an optimal distance where the efficiency of your stabilization reaches a maximum value.

If your Stabilization is too low, you will have reduced power generation.
The Reactor and its Chambers are also highly reactive unless you have 100% or more Stabilization.
Upon taking damage, your Reactor components will take additional damage from internal explosions.

It's advised to have more than 100% Stabilization to avoid taking extra damage when in combat.

Element.Translation: 不可用的物品（測試合成系統）。
Element.Original: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)

Element.Translation: This entity or one of the entities it is docked to, has old power blocks and will not allow the new reactor system to be placed down as long as any old power blocks remain.
Element.Original: This entity or one of the entities it is docked to, has old power blocks and will not allow the new reactor system to be placed down as long as any old power blocks remain.

Element.Translation: 提高開採礦石／碎片的產量加成。
Element.Original: Increases the ore/shard resource yield for each resouce block mined.

Element.Translation: 四角錐體灰色進階裝甲（Grey Advanced Armor Corner）
由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 「復原／重做」冷卻中，防止濫發行為。
Element.Original: UNDO/REDO is currently on cooldown avoid bandwidth spam.

Element.Translation: 物體有「反應爐電力」方塊。移除所有反應爐電力磚，才能放置「舊式電力」磚。
Element.Original: This entity has new reactor blocks and will not allow the old power system to be placed down as long as any new reactor blocks remain.

Element.Translation: 無效的區域格式。格式「ｘ, ｙ, ｚ」。
Element.Original: Invalid sector format. Type as 'x, y, z'

Element.Translation: 現在的反應爐不支持「自由鎖定的星際之門」。
Element.Original: Current reactor doesn't support free warp gate target.

Element.Translation: 使用「配方」的價格（按零件在合成的價格）。
Element.Original: use recipe based prices (the price is the price of the parts it is made out of in crafting)

Element.Translation: 物體有「%s」塊「舊式電力」方塊。移除所有舊式電力磚後，才能放置「反應爐電力」磚。
Element.Original: This entity has %s old power blocks and will not allow the new reactor system to be placed down as long as any old power blocks remain.

Element.Translation:
警告！此反應室需要「反應爐管道」連接到「反應爐鏈」。
放置「反應爐管道」在「反應爐電力」及「反應室」之間，或相同種類的「反應室」之間構成「反應爐鏈」。

建造出樹狀結構的反應爐鏈，增大反應室大小或連接更多相同種類的反應室分組，去加強相關功能的效果。
Element.Original:
Warning: There is no conduit block next to this chamber block to connect it to your reactor tree.
A chamber needs to be next to a line of conduit blocks to connect it to either the main reactor or to another group of chambers.

You can also add chamber blocks to existing groups of the same general type (e.g. adding stealth chambers to a group of cloak chamber blocks).

Chamber systems are structured like a tree: the tree trunk is the main reactor, and the branches connect the chambers with conduits.
Chamber blocks themselves can be placed next to each other of the same type to increase their size.

Element.Translation: 放置「反應爐管道」在「反應爐電力」及「反應室」之間，或相同種類的「反應室」之間構成樹狀結構的「反應爐鏈」。\n\n然後開啟「圓形選單」或按「%s」檢視反應爐鏈。
Element.Original:
A conduit connects chambers to a main reactor, or to another chamber in the tree.

Build lines of conduits to create a tree between your chambers and your main reactor.
Then open the radial menu to access your reactor under ship/station -> reactor or press %s when looking at the reactor.

Element.Translation:
護罩資訊「%s」

半徑「%s」公尺；
護罩「%s／%s」（容量庫「%s」）；
充填速度「%s」e/秒；
護罩維護「%s」；
電力消耗「%s」e/秒。
Element.Original:
SHIELD INFO %s

Radius: %sm
Shields: %s/%s (capacity banks: %s)
Recharge rate (e/sec): %s
Shield Upkeep: %s
Power consumption: %s

Element.Translation: 消耗電力為船隻提供動力。
Element.Original: The Thruster Module is capable of providing propulsion for ships of all shapes and sizes. Their main fuel source is power, taken from the ships Power Capacitors.

Element.Translation: 膠囊內懸浮著純金屬Fertikeen的異次元原子。
Element.Original: Cubatoms of pure metalic Fertikeen float suspended within this capsule.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 多重畫出最佳化（畫出區塊有問題時關閉）
Element.Original: MultiDraw Optimization (turn off on chunk Draw problems)

Element.Translation: 反應爐的質量反應室（Reactor Mass Chamber）
混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的門磚組成大門。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: 你的物品欄掉到太空去！

Element.Original: No punishment: respawn protection still on!\n%s / %s seconds
No punishment: Sector set to peace!

Element.Translation: [SERVER] 出現錯誤，\n請附上記錄回報錯誤。
非方塊的彩現距離（細節的程度）
永久勾出選擇物體的輪廓

Element.Translation: 輸入你的「StarMade注冊用戶名稱」。\n未註冊的，請到「www.star-made.org」。\n因為部分伺服器只接受注冊用戶。
Element.Original: Enter your StarMade Registry Username.\nIf you don't have one, please register at www.star-made.org\nas some servers only allow registered Users.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 由Sintyr晶體合成的基礎電路。
Element.Original: A basic circuit that's manufactured from Sintyr crystals.

Element.Translation: 要儲存「加密認證」到本機？

Element.Original: Lifetime (secs) of debris (0 to turn off)

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 藍色進階裝甲（Blue Advanced Armor）

Element.Translation: 用戶名稱或密碼錯誤。\n\n忘記上述，請到「registry.star-made.org」！
Element.Original: Username or password wrong.\n\nIf you forgot your username or password, please visit registry.star-made.org!

Element.Translation: 未能與《StarMade》的註冊建立連線。\n請檢查你的網路連線及重試。\n需要更多的說明或幫助，請到「 www.star-made.org」！

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 不能放置方塊。\n未初始化的區域。\n請減慢建造速度……
Element.Original: Block not placed.\nArea not initialized yet.\nPlease build slower..

Element.Translation: OpenAL（聲音有卡頓時關閉，但是視頻靜音，需要重啟）
Element.Original: OpenAL (Off fixes stutter, but silent videos. restart needed. working on fix)

Element.Original: Cannot build here!\nPosition blocked\nby active docking area!

Element.Original: Relatively cheap and easy to make, Glass allows clear exterior views, however it has little in the way of durability when shot.

Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateL
Element.Translation: 如果想陣營針對指定玩家，不是向其他陣營宣戰，在「仇人管理」輸入「仇人」的名稱。
Element.Original: Factions can, instead of declaring war against a whole faction,\ndeclare war against a single player. This can be done in the\n'Faction' tab and clicking on the 'Personal Enemies' button.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateK
Element.Translation: 在未來，會發展出陣營的戰爭模式針對總部。
Element.Original: In the future there will be a system that allows\nsome kind of faction war to deal with homebases.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateM
Element.Translation: 在聊天輸入「/f 」或按「Shift＋$CHAT」開啟「陣營聊天」。
Element.Original: Faction chat is also available by\nstarting a message with '/f ' in chat,\nor by pressing shift+$CHAT to do that automatically.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateH
Element.Translation: 其他設定——任何人能參加的「公共陣營」；\n針對挑釁者的「對挑釁行為宣戰」；\n全民皆敵的「中立的都是敵人」。
Element.Original:
You can also choose from several faction options:
'Public faction' makes it possible for players to
join without an invite. 'Declare war on hostile action'
will auto declare war when you faction is attacked.
'Consider neutral enemy' will change the relationship
with all faction-less entities to 'enemy'

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateG
Element.Translation: 在「成員」設定玩家的階級，或踢出陣營。
Element.Original:
You can assign a rank to a player by clicking on 'options'
next to his name.
In that options menu you can see all ranks and
the ability to kick that person from your faction.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateJ
Element.Translation: 同樣方法，把太空站參加陣營或設成「總部」（Homebase）。\n每個陣營只有１個總部，一般情況下總部及其停泊物都是無敵的。
Element.Original:
The same goes for a station, with the difference
that you can also make a station a faction's homebase.
Each faction can only have ONE homebase, as it has
a very big advantage: Homebases and everything docked
to it are invulnerable to damage.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateI
Element.Translation: 在清單按各陣營的名稱可以「宣戰」、提議「同盟／和約」。
Element.Original: In the faction hub, you can declare war\nand send peace/alliance offers by clicking on\nthe 'relation' next to the faction's name.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateD
Element.Translation: 在「陣營面板」管理、描述你的陣營、發布新聞。\n陣營成員會收到你的新聞。\n你亦從其他陣營收到和平或同盟請求。
Element.Original:
In the "Faction" tab, you can manage your faction.
You can add a description and
write news posts. News will be visible for all
members of your faction. You can also accept peace
or alliance offers from other factions.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateC
Element.Translation: 按「建立陣營」按鈕，輸入陣營的名稱並確定；或按「收到邀請」接受其他陣營的邀請。
Element.Original:
To create a faction, click on 'Create new faction'
in the 'Personal' tab. Choose a name
and click OK. You can alternatively,
also accept an invite by clicking on 'Invites'.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateF
Element.Translation: 在「編輯階級」勾選各項容許的權限。
Element.Original:
Edit: Members are able to edit description
and post news.
Kick: Members can kick players of a lower rank.
Invite: Members are allowed to invite players to the faction.
Permission-Edit: Only give this to faction leaders, as it enables
them to modify the ranks.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateE
Element.Translation: 每名陣營成員有「階級」。\n在「編輯階級」命名階級、設定相應的權限。
Element.Original:
Each member of your faction has a rank.
Ranks can be named and their permissions
can be set when clicking the "Roles" button.
To change the name of a rank, click on the name.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateA
Element.Translation: 陣營是《StarMade》重要部分。\n玩家可以集體參加某個陣營，一同奮鬥。
Element.Original: Factions are a vital part of StarMade.\nPlayers can gather under 1 faction and work together\nto accomplish a common goal.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateB
Element.Translation: 按「$FACTION_MENU」開啟「陣營面板」，建立、編輯你的陣營，或參加其他陣營。\n在「陣營中樞磚」查閱所有陣營資料，決定參加哪一方。
Element.Original:
Press '$FACTION_MENU' to open the faction panel.
From here you can create and edit your own, or join an existing
faction. The 'Faction hub' tab shows you an overview
of all current factions in the game
and allows you to join a public faction.

傳送完整的ＮＰＣ陣營套件到客戶端（高網路流量）。
Element.Original: Sends complete NPC faction package to clients (very bandwith intensive)

Element.Translation: 黃色基礎裝甲3/4（Yellow Basic Armor 3/4）
棕色基礎裝甲1/2（Brown Basic Armor 1/2）
混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 只容許相同陣營的船隻加入艦隊
Element.Original: Allow only factions ships to be added to fleet

Element.Translation: 只容許相同陣營的船隻加入艦隊。
Element.Original: only allows faction ships to be added to fleet

Element.Translation: 停泊鏈的最大數值（視乎操作系统的路徑及檔名長度，大數值可能故障）。
Element.Original: maximal deepness of docking chains (may cause glitches depending on OS (path and filename length) at high numbers)

Element.Translation: 進階商店有４塊路軌停泊磚，讓其成為中立的總部（所有停泊物皆無敵）。
Element.Original: Advanced shops will have 4 rails dockers that can be used like a neutral homebase (anything docked is safe)

Element.Translation: 普通商店有４塊路軌停泊磚，讓其成為中立的總部（所有停泊物皆無敵）。
Element.Original: Normal shops will have 4 rails dockers that can be used like a neutral homebase (anything docked is safe)

Element.Translation: 楔形黃色警示裝甲（Yellow Hazard Armor Wedge）
工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 膠囊內懸浮著純晶體Mattise的異次元原子。
Element.Original: Cubatoms of pure crystaline Mattise float suspended within this capsule.

Element.Translation: 啟用／關閉「從物品生成藍圖」。
Element.Original: enables or disables blueprint spawning from item

Element.Translation: 容許從藍圖生成太空站
載入效果設定時出現錯誤！查閱伺服器記錄。\n「%s」\n「%s」。
Element.Original:
An error happened while loading effect config!
See logs for details.
%s
%s

Element.Translation: 儲存效果設定時出現錯誤！查閱伺服器記錄。\n「%s」\n「%s」。
Element.Original:
An error happened while saving effect config!
See logs for details.
%s
%s

Element.Translation: 容許超載的個人物品欄。
Element.Original: Personal Inventory can go over capacity

Element.Translation: 儲物箱滿載後，每分鐘會掉出物品。
Element.Original: cargo is ejected every minute if storage is at over capacity

Element.Translation: 容許超載的個人物品欄
Element.Original: Allow over capacity for personal inventory

Element.Translation:
治療光線槍
電力「%s」；
速度「%s」；
顏色（RGBA）「 %s」。
啟用生成舊版本的海盜太空站。
Element.Original: enables spawning of old style pirate stations

Element.Translation:
劃出船廠的區域。
選擇「船廠電腦」後，把設施磚建造成Ｕ形，Ｕ的兩尖末端同一水平，再複製多個Ｕ形劃出直線的走廊（目前２個Ｕ形最大距離３２格）。
Element.Original:
Shipyard Modules build the outer frame and define the usuable build-area of your shipyard.
After selecting your shipyard computer, place down an arc (U shape) of modules. Both end points have to be in line with each other.
Place down duplicate arcs to create a corridor. (The maximal distance from arc to arc is currently 32 blocks).

Element.Translation: 儲物箱滿載後掉出物品
啟用／關閉「從物品生成藍圖」。
Element.Original: enables or disables blueprint spawning from item

Element.Translation: 使用舊版本的海盜太空站

時髦的頭盔，
在太空保護你免受傷害。

穿上或除下頭盔，把頭盔拖拖放快捷欄
並左按（先關閉物品欄）。
Element.Original:
A fashionable helmet
to protect against the
dangers in space.

To put helmet on/off, place it in the action bar 
and activate it with LMB (with closed inventory)

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 同時進行的爆炸數量（每次爆炸消耗２０ＭＢ ＲＡＭ及所有ＣＰＵ執行緒（預設１０，中端電腦的單人遊戲環境））。
Element.Original: the more the faster explosions at the same time are executed (costs in total about 20MB RAM each and of course CPU because it's all threaded) (10 is default for a medium powered singleplayer)

Element.Translation: 移除有異常方塊的物體（例如船上有太空站方塊）。
Element.Original: This will remove ships that have blocks that are normally disallowed (e.g. space station blocks on ships)

Element.Translation: 移除方塊不連貫的物體

Element.Original: If a loaded blueprint is invalid, it's type will be overridden

Element.Translation: 多少日後，其他建立者才能踢出「無效的建立者」（Inactivity）。
Element.Original: Days of inactivity after which a founder may kick another founder

Element.Translation: 陣營建立者無上線多少日後，變成可以被踢出
Element.Original: Days of inactivity after a faction founder becomes kickable

Element.Translation: 在商店維修船隻裝甲的費用。
Element.Original: Cost to repair a ship's armor at a shop

Element.Translation: 在商店維修船隻裝甲的費用
Element.Original: Ship armor repair cost per HP at shop

Element.Translation: 船隻在商店重新啟動的費用（在太空中重啟會以秒計算費用）。
Element.Original: Cost to reboot a ship at a shop (per second it would take to reboot in space)

Element.Translation: 不能觸發！\n大門的電力不足！\n需要電力：１。
Element.Original: Cannot activate!\nNot enough power in gate!\nPower needed for mass: 1

Element.Translation:
不能觸發！
大門的電力不足！
需要電力：
Element.Original:
Cannot activate!
Not enough power in gate!
Power needed for mass:

Element.Translation: 只能在重力方向坐上楔形方塊！
Element.Original: Can't sit on this wedge\nin this gravity direction!
dedicated servers can be registered on the StarMade registry

Element.Translation: 超過比例後每額外方塊需要的充填
Element.Original: Charge needed per extra block over ratio

Element.Translation: 昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: true，以每塊方塊的質量算出結構的重心；false，結構的重心永久在船隻核心。
Element.Original: if on, the center of mass for each structured will be calculated based on block mass. On 'false', the center of mass is always the core position

Element.Translation: 只能在重力下坐上楔形方塊！
Element.Original: Can't sit on this wedge\nwithout gravity!

Element.Translation: 需要的方塊總數的比例
在商店重新啟動船隻的費用（以秒計算）
Element.Original: Ship reboot cost per second at shop

Element.Translation: true，船隻及其他結構使用「耐久值」（Hitpoint）系統；false，使用舊式系統，船隻核心中彈後「過熱」（Overheat）。
Element.Original: ships and other structures use the hitpoint system. if off, a ship will overheat when the core gets taken out (old)

Element.Translation: 晶瑩剔透的Hattel碎片熠熠閃亮。數項技術需要這些碎片。
Element.Original: Glittering Hattel Shards reflect so much light they almost seem to glow. Several technologies are based upon the use of these shards once processed.

Element.Translation: 註冊「專有伺服器」（Dedicated Server）時取得「綁定帳戶令牌」。
Element.Original: uplink token, provided when registering a dedicated server
Can only sit on blocks and wedges!

Element.Translation: 檢測到重生點錯誤！\n請附上記錄回報錯誤。\n長度「%s」。
Element.Original: SPAWNING POINT ERROR DETECTED\nPLEASE SEND IN A REPORT\nLENGTH: %s

Element.Translation: 「生成受困保護」\n正在移除可能的撞擊！
此區域的雷達掃描訊號，\n正在阻止你的隱形及\n雷達干擾此星系！
Element.Original:
A scanner signal in
this sector has interrupted
your cloaking and jamming
systems!

Element.Translation: 雷達掃描發現「隱形物體」：\n
此區域有正在隱形或雷達干擾的物體。\n但是你的「雷達掃描的強度」不足，\n未能顯示物體！
Element.Original:
There is a cloaked/jamming
entity in this sector
but our signal isn't strong
enough to reveal it!

Element.Translation: 不能掃描！\n跳躍航行未完成充填\n「%s／%s」。

Element.Original: Do you really want to do this?

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 客戶端從伺服器下載皮膚的網速（太大可能有延遲）〔預設256～16kb/s〕。
Element.Original: how fast should skins be transferred from server to clients (too high might cause lag) [default 256 ~ 16kb/s]
A finely carved block of Cinnabar.

Element.Translation: 每個區域有多少座太空站。
Element.Original: How many stations are allowed per sector

Element.Translation: 每個區域有多少座太空站
１座太空站／太空站藍圖的價格。
Element.Original: how much does a station or station blueprint cost

Element.Translation: 立即停止有多於Ｘ塊觸發狀態方塊的邏輯系統。給予１０秒冷卻時間防止伺服器負荷過載。
Element.Original: stop logic of objects that activate more than x blocks at once. They will enter a logic cooldown of 10 seconds to prevent servers from overloading

Element.Translation: 物體同時有多少塊方塊被觸發，會被限制停止
Element.Original: Max logic activations at once per object stop

Element.Translation: 玩家記錄多少座標書籤。
玩家記錄多少區域的座標書籤
由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 七面體棕色水晶裝甲（Brown Crystal Armor Hepta）
棕色基礎裝甲（Brown Basic Armor）
由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 船廠的物品欄無船隻設計圖！
卸載現在的船隻設計圖。右按「設\n計」卸載。
Element.Original: Unloads the currently loaded design.\nThis can also be done by right-clicking on the design item.

Element.Translation: 歡迎來到「停泊教學」！\n這裡你學習怎樣建造停泊區域、停泊船隻及砲塔。
Element.Original:
Welcome to the Docking Tutorial.
This tutorial explains how to build
docking areas, and how to dock ships
and turrets

Element.Translation: 載入存在的船隻設計圖。右按「設\n計」載入。
Element.Original: Loads an existing design.\nThis can also be done by right-clicking on the design item.

Element.Translation: 邏輯追蹤佇列的最大數值。
只容許使用「字母」、「數字」或「_-」！
Element.Original: Must only contain letters or numbers or (_-)!

Element.Translation: 物體同時有多少塊方塊被觸發，會引起警告
Element.Original: Max logic activations at once per object warning

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 立即警告有物體擁有多於Ｘ塊觸發狀態方塊的邏輯系統。
Element.Original: warn about objects that activate more than x blocks at once

Element.Translation: 新增船隻設計圖，並放在這裡。在\n設計模式，你可以隨意使用各種類\n的方塊。
Element.Original: Creates and loads a fresh design and places it here.\nIn design mode, you can build with any block type and amount.

Element.Translation: 物體的邏輯訊號佇列上限
Element.Original: Max logic signal queue per object

Element.Translation: 按存貨量調整的商店價格最小值（例如正常值１００＄有最小值８０＄）。
Element.Original: minimum of base price a shop will want depending on its stock (e.g. max 80 credits if the normal cost is 100)

Element.Translation: 商店買賣價格的的下限
按存貨量調整的商店價格最大值（例如正常值１００＄有最大值１２０＄）。
Element.Original: maximum of base price a shop will want depending on its stock (e.g. max 120 credits if the normal cost is 100)

Element.Translation: 昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: 商店買賣價格的的上限
不可用的物品（測試合成系統）。
Element.Original: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 跳躍航行充填完成！\n右按跳躍！
Element.Original: Jump Drive Charged!\nRight click to jump!

Element.Translation: 「跳躍航行裝置」未與「跳躍航行電腦」連結。
Element.Original: No Jump Drive Modules Connected to this computer

Element.Translation: 商店買賣價格按存貨量調整（true，價格永久不變）。
Element.Original: shop buy and sell price change depending on stock (shop prices will always stay the same if true)

Element.Translation: 各種類的小行星按熱力分布。
Element.Original: Asteroid types are distributed based on heat.
There are other galaxies to explore!
Piracy can be a worthwhile source of income.

Element.Translation: 唉！我不太想用太空站的控制台！那些機器比自行合成的更差勁，\n便宜無好貨……
Element.Original: Man, I really don't like using the consoles on this station! The hardware just isn't as good as on the\nstuff you build yourself, and it's cheaper too...
It's often worth trying to befriend the neighbors.
You can visit every star in the sky.

Element.Translation: 「感應器」可以比較２台「顯示器」的內容，方便設定密碼、命令等。
Element.Original: Sensors can compare two Display Modules' contents. Useful for passwords, commands, etc.

Element.Translation: 使用「星際之門」瞬間長距離空間跳躍。
Element.Original: Warp Gates allow instantaneous travel across vast distances.

Element.Translation: 想比賽勝利嗎？使用「停止效果」砲塔！
Element.Original: Winning a race and want to stay that way?\nUse turrets with the Stop effect!

Element.Translation: 使用「船殼方塊」裝飾船隻，不會增加太多重量。
Element.Original: Using Hull blocks in place of Armor allows decoration without the extra weight.
Jump Inhibitors are useful for ambushes.

Element.Translation: 目標移動太快嗎？使用「停止效果」武器。
Element.Original: Is something moving too quickly?\nUse a Stop effect weapon to help your aim.

Element.Translation: 怎樣對付銅牆鐵壁的護罩？使用「電離效果」武器。
Element.Original: Fortress shields got you down?\nAdd an Ion effect to your weapons for shield-busting.

Element.Translation: 作為船隻的心臟，提供最基礎的推進、供電、電容及護罩儲存。切記！永久在物品欄內攜帶船隻核心避免在太空受困。按「$SPAWN_SHIP」在前方生成船隻。按「$ACTIVATE」進入／離開。
Element.Original: Each Ship Core functions as the cornerstone of your ship, it also provides a basic amount of thrust, power generation, power capacity, as well as some shield capacity. Remember, always carry spare cores to avoid becoming marooned. Press $SPAWN_SHIP with a Ship Core anywhere in your inventory to place the core in the space in front of you. Press $ACTIVATE to Enter/Exit.

Element.Translation: 散發著柔和藍光的Varat水晶。
Element.Original: A block of Varat Crystal. It's blue in colour and emits a soft glow.
If you don't have an Account yet, please go to www.star-made.org to create one

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 打撈者可能與眾不同，別樹一格。
Element.Original: Scavengers may not care about style, but other players might.

Element.Translation: 商人公會的商店是安全之地，除非你跟他們有過節。
Element.Original: You are safe within the boundaries of Trading Guild shops\n...provided they like you.
Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 「重力磚」的方向改變提供重力的方向。
Element.Original: Rotated Gravity Modules also influence their gravity direction.

Element.Translation: 深灰色進階裝甲（Dark Grey Advanced Armor）
大型船隻威力強大，但是機動性能不足。
Element.Original: Larger ships are more powerful, but much harder to move.

Element.Translation: 你不一定需要登入去遊玩單人或多人遊戲。
Element.Original: You don't have to be logged on to play single, or multiplayer
A little decoration goes a long way.

Element.Translation: 可以使用「重力磚」建造「重力電梯」！
Element.Original: You may use Gravity Modules to construct gravity lifts!

Element.Translation: 船隻的組件可以在路軌上移動或旋轉。
Element.Original: Rails allow you to move (and rotate) portions of your ship or its interior.

Element.Translation: 在裝飾用上「轉動路軌」吧！
Element.Original: Rail Rotators are useful for decoration, too!
An wedged ingot of refined Threns.

Element.Translation: 可以擊落自己／陣營的飛彈。
Element.Original: can shoot down own or missiles from own faction

Element.Translation: 目錄面板無出現的藍圖預設選項（其他玩家可以購買）。
Element.Original: Default option for blueprints not in catalog yet

Element.Translation: 使用「配方」的價格（按零件在合成的價格）。
Element.Original: use recipe based prices (the price is the price of the parts it is made out of in crafting)

Element.Translation: 只容許使用合法的檔名
Element.Original: Name must be a legal file name

Element.Translation: 護罩輸出電腦（Shield Supply Computer）
工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 儲物箱滿載後，每分鐘會掉出物品。
Element.Original: cargo is ejected every minute if storage is at over capacity

Element.Translation: 分組無效！只容許呈「Ｕ形」的平面。
Element.Original: Unit Group Invalid! Must be a flat 'C'-shape.

Element.Translation: 每塊星球平面生成特別區域（城市、金字塔等）的機率（改變此值可能改變部分平面，但不會改變已經被玩家修改的平面）。
Element.Original: one out of thisValue chance of a special region spawning per planet plate (cities, pyramids, etc) (changing this value migth change some plates, but won't change any plates that are already modified by a player)

Element.Translation: 生成星球特別區域的機率
「總部」（Home Base）不再無敵，「陣營點數」（Faction Points）變負數不再擁有領土。
Element.Original: Home bases become attackable if a faction's Faction Points are in the minus and the faction doesn't own any territory

Element.Translation: 陣營點數負數，總部不再無敵可以被摧毀
Element.Original: Make homebase destructable on FP deficit

Element.Translation: 區塊使用多少ＣＰＵ執行緒數目
Element.Original: Chunk request thread pool size CPU

Element.Translation: 使用多少ＣＰＵ執行緒數目。警告！數值太大會造成ＣＰＵ使用量尖峰。最佳數值是ＣＰＵ核數減１。
Element.Original: Available threads of total for CPU generation. WARNING: too high can cause cpu spikes. About the amount of available cores minus one is best

Element.Translation:
～～ 傳送開始
基地「%s」
發現敵人「%s」……
送出突擊小組……
～～ 傳送完畢。
Element.Original:
#### Transmission Start
Base %s:
Hostile signs in %s...
Sending raiding party...
#### Transmission End

Element.Translation: 區塊使用多少ＣＰＵ執行緒大小
Element.Original: Chunk request thread pool size total
Please enter a name for your Universe.

Element.Translation:
～～ 傳送開始
目標逃離……
返回基地……
～～ 傳送完畢。
Element.Original:
#### Transmission Start
Target has fled...
Return to base...
#### Transmission End

Element.Translation: 「區塊」（Chunk）需要多少「執行緒大小」（從磁碟生成）。
Element.Original: Thead pool size for chunk requests (from disk and generated)

Element.Translation: 設定每次畫面更新多少方塊。數值越大，放置大量方塊時更新速度越快。但是消耗網速，對玩家進行「濫發行為」。
Element.Original: How many blocks are sent per update. Huge placements will shot faster, but it will consume more bandwidth and is subject to spamming players
Do you really want to delete this universe

Element.Translation: 你找到多少艘隱形船隻？
Element.Original: How many cloaked ships have you found?

Element.Translation: 每個陣營只有１個總部，一般情況下總部及其停泊物都是無敵的。
Element.Original: Each faction can have one homebase.\nEverything docked thereto is invulnerable.

Element.Translation: 「干擾裝置」讓敵人ＡＩ不能鎖定目標。
Element.Original: Jammers interfere with hostile AI's targeting abilities.

Element.Translation: 與海盜太空站做鄰居要小心！海盜會不停找上門。
Element.Original: Be careful when settling near Pirate stations.\nThey will continually hunt you down.

Element.Translation: 白色進階裝甲1/2（White Advanced Armor 1/2）
不能在結構內開始教學。
Element.Original: You can't be in a structure\nto do this tutorial.

Element.Translation: 飛彈彈頭大小與耐久度成正比。
Element.Original: The larger a missile's warhead, the higher its hitpoints.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 只容許使用「字母」、「數字」或「_-」！
Element.Original: Must only contain letters or numbers or (_-)!
Please type in a name for your new Ship!

Element.Translation: 使用多個「按鈕」觸發「正反器」（例如燈掣）。
Element.Original: Multiple buttons may toggle a single Flip-Flop (e.g. for light switches)

Element.Translation: 連結多個「延遲元件」進一步延遲信號。
Element.Original: Delays can be chained to achieve longer delays.

Element.Translation: 連結「感應器」及「推進器」，顯示船速及裝飾推進器。
Element.Original: Sensors used on thrusters can detect your speed, useful for engine decoration.

Element.Translation: 減少雷達掃描的電力消耗。
Element.Original: Decreases the power usage of your Scanner.
As of June 1st, 2017, the StarMade Launcher consists of 10,688 lines of code.

Element.Translation: 連結「延遲元件」及「反閘」構成１個０﹒５秒的「時鐘電路」。
Element.Original: A cross-connected Delay and Not-Signal form a basic 0.5 second clock.
A strange, alien type of vine.

Element.Translation: 使用「路軌速度控制裝置」控制轉動速度。
Element.Original: You can use Rail Speed Controllers to set rotation speeds.

Element.Translation: 可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的門磚組成大門。防爆門比鎖子門或玻璃門有更高的耐久值。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Blast Doors are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 「按鈕」或「觸發磚」讀取相互連接「顯示器」的內容，觸發後改變與之連結「顯示器」的內容。
Element.Original: You can copy one Display Module to another using buttons/activators

Element.Translation: 連結「感應器」及「大門」，顯示機庫、氣閘的狀態。
Element.Original: Sensors can detect the state of doors, useful for hangar/airlock indicators.

Element.Translation: 星球體積平均值（正常的高斯分布圖）（最小值５０）。
「按鈕」或「觸發磚」讀取相互連接「路軌方塊」的方向，觸發後改變與之連結「路軌方塊」的方向。
Element.Original: Buttons/Activators copy adjacent rail types and orientations to the rails they are linked to.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 錯誤！\n無法購買！\n不在商店範圍！
Element.Original: ERROR:\nCannot buy!\nYou are not near a shop!

Element.Translation: 確定要購買藍圖？\n藍圖會在你的物品欄。\n右按藍圖查閱需要的材料。
Element.Original:
Do you want to buy this blueprint?
This will put the blueprint in your
inventory. Right click on it to provide
the necessary materials.

Element.Translation: 請到「phab.starma.de」附上記錄回報錯誤！
Element.Original: If you find a bug, report it on phab.starma.de!
As always, thank you for playing StarMade!\n ~ The Schine Team
Holding [%s] displays the quick radial menu.

Element.Translation: 除錯（清楚明白後才開啟）。
Element.Original: debug (don't activate unless you know what you're doing)

Element.Translation: 劃出停泊區域，利用船隻核心的「停泊光線」（Docking Beam）停泊或駛離。停泊磚有指向性（綠盒範圍），不能有障礙物。
Element.Original: The Docking Module allows the user to create a fixed Docking Zone. This Zone can then be Docked/Undocked with, by using the Ship Core's built-in Docking Beam. Docking Modules can be oriented, and must not have any obstructions in their Zone (The Green Box), other than the docked item in question. Otherwise, the Module will go offline, and no docking will be allowed until the obstruction is removed.
You may customize your controls from the options menu.

Element.Translation: Combine weapons to get different effects.
Element.Original: Combine weapons to get different effects.

Element.Translation: 所有武器平衡，挑出適合你的！
Element.Original: All weapons are balanced; use whichever fits your needs!

Element.Translation: 「飛彈鎖定」（光線攻擊＋飛彈）通常會打中目標。
Element.Original: Lock-on missiles (beam+missile) only rarely miss their targets.

Element.Translation: 「進階建造模式」（%s）讓你一次過放置大量方塊。
Element.Original: Advanced Build Mode ([%s]) allows you to place multiple blocks at once.

Element.Translation: 「進階建造模式」（%s）的箭頭指著前方。
Element.Original: In Advanced Build Mode ([%s]), the arrow points to the front of the ship.

Element.Translation: 「進階建造模式」（%s）讓你「複製／貼上」。
Element.Original: Advanced Build Mode ([%s]) allows you to copy/paste.

Element.Translation: 「進階建造模式」（[%s]）的「對稱平面」可以加快建造速度８倍！
Element.Original: Advanced Build Mode ([%s]) symmetry planes reduce your work by up to 8x!

Element.Translation: 藍色進階裝甲1/4（Blue Advanced Armor 1/4）
在「建造模式」按「%s」進入「進階建造模式」。
Element.Original: Pressing [%s] while in Build Mode gives you access to Advanced Build Mode.

Element.Translation: 紫色進階裝甲1/2（Purple Advanced Armor 1/2）
四角錐體灰色基礎裝甲（Grey Basic Armor Corner）
「圖靈完備性」的《StarMade》，讓你創意無限！
Element.Original: Circuitry in StarMade is Turing-complete: you can make anything!

Element.Translation: 「按鈕」或「觸發磚」與路軌相互連接，檢測在路軌經過的物體。
Element.Original: Activators and buttons adjacent to basic rails detect objects moving on that rail.

Element.Translation: 使用「船隻內部搖控」命名系統，拖放到快捷欄顯示。
Element.Original: You may specify names for Inner Ship Remotes, which will display on the hotbar.

Element.Translation: 裝甲方塊減弱船隻的機動性能，慎重選擇。
Element.Original: Heavy armor will protect you, but hinders mobility. Choose carefully.
Missiles may be destroyed with a well-placed shot.

Element.Translation: ＡＩ砲塔會自動截擊敵人的飛彈或太空人。
Element.Original: Point-defense turrets automatically fire at hostile missiles or astronauts.

Element.Translation: 增加工廠的生產線，提高合成的效率。
Element.Original: Makes factories more efficient by increasing the number of production lines active during each factory cycle.

Element.Translation: 「光線攻擊」近戰時有效，遠戰時無效。
Element.Original: Beams are quite effective up close, but useless at a distance.
Warheads may detonate if damaged. Use caution!
Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 灰色標準裝甲（Grey Standard Armor）
混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 歡迎來到「船隻系統教學」！
Element.Original: Welcome to the Ship System Tutorial

Element.Translation: 伺服器出現「SerialException」！請附上記錄回報錯誤，\n原因「%s」\n「%s」。
Element.Original:
SerialException on Server! 
Please send in report from server
caused by: %s
%s

Element.Translation:
存檔錯誤！
請尋找管理員重啟伺服器，
回報錯誤。
可能損失資料。
Element.Original:
ERROR while saving data!
Please tell an admin to
restart the server and to
send in a report
DATA MAY BE LOST IF CONTINUED

Element.Translation:
存檔錯誤！
請尋找管理員重啟伺服器，
回報錯誤。
可能損失資料。
Element.Original:
ERROR while saving data!
Please tell an admin to
restart the server and to
send in a report
DATA MAY BE LOST IF CONTINUED

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 比賽大門控制裝置（Race Gate Controller）
啟用／關閉「從物品生成藍圖」。
Element.Original: enables or disables blueprint spawning from item

Element.Translation: 不能一次過賣出堆積。\n先右按分開出來。
Element.Original: Cannot sell a whole stack at once (yet)\nRight click and split it first.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 可以被玩家、停泊光線及邏輯系統去開關。多塊互相連接的門磚組成大門。防爆門比鎖子門或玻璃門有更高的耐久值。按「$ACTIVATE」開啟／關閉。
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Blast Doors are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: 「觸發大門」（Activation Gate）由１格深呈環狀的「觸發大門裝置」所構成，與「觸發大門控制裝置」連結。用來探測是否有物體經過大門，並輸出訊號往連結的邏輯系統。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結控制裝置及裝置磚，或「Shift＋V」集體連結。
Element.Original: Activation Gates are capable of detecting an entity passing through it's Gate structure, sending a True signal to any Logic block linked to the Controller.. The gate must be a solid, 1 block deep ring structure linked to a Activation Gate controller. To link your Activation Gate Controller to the Activation Gate Module structure, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.

Element.Translation: 黑色水晶裝甲1/4（Black Crystal Armor 1/4）
對「私改藍圖」的容忍度 （原設１０％）。
３ｘ３球狀探測點。探測到「停泊裝置」後，引導物體進入「滑行路軌」。\n\r艦隊的船隻，會記錄最後停泊的降落點。玩家利用「母艦召回」召回船隻、降落在降落點；「旗艦」的位置，是起航後歸隊地點。艦隊功能未提供多艘母艦的設定。
Element.Original: The Pickup Point block will project a 3x3 detection sphere. When a ship's docking module enters that detection area, the entity will be guided to a Pickup Rail if applicable.\n\rShips will remember the last used Pickup Area modules they dock to and if they're part of a fleet, they'll return to them when the "Carrier Recall" order is issued. The flagship is where they'll try to return, multiple carriers per fleet is not allowed yet.
When put right next to a Mine Core, the damage of the mine is increased.

Element.Translation: 工廠消耗少量基本材料快速合成出來，耐久值一般無裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: 不能停泊在其他陣營的船隻！
Element.Original: You cannot dock on a\nship of another faction!

Element.Translation: 砲塔要在停泊鏈的末端。\n（現在）
Element.Original: turret must be on the end\nof the chain (for now)

Element.Translation: 砲塔要在停泊鏈的末端。\n（現在）
Element.Original: turret must be on the end\nof the chain (for now)

Element.Translation: 停泊物太大，\n不能在停泊區域停泊！\n駛離 %s 。
Element.Original: Size of docked structure\ntoo big for docking area!\nUndocking %s

Element.Translation: 不能停泊！\n停泊方塊使用中。\n
Element.Original: Cannot dock!\nDocking block in use by\n

Element.Translation: 不能停泊！\n不能混合路軌與舊的停泊系統！
Element.Original: Cannot dock!\nCan't mix rails with old dock!

Element.Translation: 除錯—管理員錯誤！\n「%s」不能停泊。\n目標區域停泊無效。
Element.Original: DEBUG-ADMIN ERROR:\n%s cannot dock\nThe target area is invalid to dock

Element.Translation: 黃色警示裝甲1/4（Yellow Hazard Armor 1/4）
綠色基礎裝甲1/4（Green Basic Armor 1/4）
不能停泊！\n防止停泊迴路！
Element.Original: Cannot dock:\nThis dock would cause\na loop!

Element.Translation: 在太空站上移的電梯，配合「重力磚」上移效果更佳。與「鎖子門」一樣，多塊電梯磚互相連接組成大型電梯。按「$ACTIVATE」觸發／解除。
Element.Original: The Plex Lift can be used to create elevators and lifts within large stations or ships where needed. They are especially useful when combined with the Gravity Unit. Similar to Plex Doors, having them adjacent on one another allows for larger/longer lifts. Press $ACTIVATE to Activate/Deactivate.

Element.Translation: 不能停泊！\n不能混合路軌與舊的停泊系統。
Element.Original: Cannot dock!\nCan't mix rails with\nold docking system.

Element.Translation:
我們領土的雷達掃描接收到友善訊號。

來自星系「%s」「%s」。
請送出雷達掃描船隻確認確切位置。
Element.Original:
Our scanners picked up a FRIENDLY
signature in our territory.

Origin System: %s %s.
Send Scanner there to get exact
positions!

Element.Translation:
我們領土的雷達掃描接收到中立訊號。

來自星系「%s」「%s」。
請送出雷達掃描船隻確認確切位置。
Element.Original:
Our scanners picked up a NEUTRAL
signature in our territory.

Origin System: %s %s.
Send Scanner there to get exact
positions!

Element.Translation: 不能停泊！伺服器只容許最多「%s」條停泊鏈。
Element.Original: Cannot dock:\nNo more than %s chains allowed on this server

Element.Translation: 編入船隻錯誤！\n「%s」\n位置無效，請附上記錄回報錯誤。
Element.Original:
Error adding ship 
%s
Position invalid
Please send in logs.

Error adding ship

Position invalid

Error adding ship

Error adding ship 
%s

Element.Translation: 不能停泊！\n不合適的結構！
不能停泊！\n陣營權限被拒！
反應爐的超光速反應室（Reactor FTL Chamber）
反應室太小！最少需要「%s」方塊。
Element.Original: Chamber too small! Needs at least %s blocks

Element.Translation: 楔形黑色進階裝甲（Black Advanced Armor Wedge）
混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 推開脈衝電腦（Push Pulse Computer）
由Rammet晶體合成的基礎電路。
Element.Original: A basic circuit that's manufactured from Rammet crystals.

Element.Translation: 充填後啟用，短時間內增加電力充填。
Element.Original: Enables the Reactor Booster. This increases your power recharge for a short duration while active. \n\rRequires to be charged prior to activation.\n\r

Element.Translation: 在太空死亡會扔下所有方塊。
Element.Original: player will drop all his blocks into space on death

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
When put right next to a Mine Core, it turns the mine into a short range cannon.\n\rFires constantly and dies when hit by a weapon or a ship.

Element.Translation: 不可用的物品（測試合成系統）。
Element.Original: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)

Element.Translation: 為無敵的人物關閉撞擊探測！
Element.Original: Collision detection is disabled for\ninvulnerable characters!

Element.Translation: 黑色基礎裝甲1/2（Black Basic Armor 1/2）
護罩輸入電腦（Shield Drain Computer）

Element.Original: Do you really want to do this?

Element.Translation: 這是你的總部。\n先撤消總部，\n然後重設此物體的陣營。
Element.Original: This is your homebase.\nYou have to revoke the homebase status first\nto reset the faction on this entity!

Element.Translation: 電離效果電腦（Ion Effect Computer）

Element.Original: Do you really want to do this?

Element.Translation: 重力感應器檢測到其他物體。\n按「%s」解除現有重力！
Element.Original: Gravity sensors detected different structure.\nPress '%s' to deactivate current gravity!

Element.Translation: 請把「%s」\n從「%s」的物品欄\n拖放到你的物品欄。
Element.Original:
Please drag 
%s from the
'%s' inventory
back to your own inventory
Please click on the Craft amd then the \n'%s' button

Element.Translation: 混合標準裝甲磚及水晶磚加工合成，晶體基複合材料結構大幅度提高耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation:
拖放最少「%s」
「%s」
往你的物品欄下方
兩個欄位其中之一。
Element.Original:
Drag at least %s more
%s into
one of the two slots
below your inventory
Please remove \n the item from the\n'%s' inventory

Element.Translation: 使用進階的能量光線著色
陣營階級「%s」。\n此階級或以上才能操作的物體！
Element.Original: Faction Rank %s\nMay only be accessed by this rank or better ranks!

Element.Translation: 陣營階級「建立者」。\n陣營建立者才能操作的物體！
Element.Original: Faction Founder Rank\nMay only be accessed by the founder rank!

Element.Translation: 在創造模式不能分開堆積。
Element.Original: Cannot split stacks in creative mode.

Element.Translation: 擁有者「私人的」。\n擁有者才能操作的物體！
Element.Original: Personal Owner Rank\nMay only be accessed by the owner of this entity!

Element.Translation: 投映出文字的全息顯示屏。可以用來查閱系統資訊。
Element.Original: Displays a holographic screen based on the text entered. Can also be used to track vital systems' information.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由基礎裝甲磚加工合成，有較佳的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: ＡＩ指令失敗：\n不能到達目標。
四面體白色水晶裝甲（White Crystal Armor Tetra）
用於建立「光線攻擊系統」（Damage Beam System），控制不限數量的「光線攻擊裝置」，分成多組會增加電力消耗。按「Ｃ」及「Ｖ」連結電腦磚及光線磚。$MAINCOMBI 按「$ACTIVATE」進入／離開電腦。
Element.Original: The Damage Beam Computer is required for creating functioning Damage Beam systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Damage Beam Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Damage Beam Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Damage Beam Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.

Element.Translation: 昔日有用的礦石，如今僅具收藏價值。隨著商人們出清存貨，只會一文不值。
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: 正常風格的方塊才有選項。
Element.Original: Option only available for normal BlockStyle

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 由Mattise晶體合成的進階電路。
Element.Original: An advanced circuit that's manufactured from Mattise crystals.

Element.Translation: 在伺服器清單的伺服器名稱
需要「有效的主機名」（Hostname）（ＩＰ／主機，例如「play.star-made.org」）。
Element.Original: this must be a valid hostname (either ip or host, e.g. play.star-made.org)

Element.Translation: 在伺服器清單公開伺服器主機名稱
Element.Original: Server host name to announce to server list

Element.Translation: 公開在《StarMade》的伺服器清單，方便客戶端尋找。在「HOST_NAME_TO_ANNOUNCE_TO_SERVER_LIST」提供「主機名」。
Element.Original: announces the server to the starmade server list so clients can find it. Hostname must be provided for HOST_NAME_TO_ANNOUNCE_TO_SERVER_LIST!

Element.Translation: 在伺服器清單公開伺服器
在防止濫發行為加入ＩＰ白名單（用「,」分開）（預設是「本地主機」（Localhost））。
Element.Original: ips excepted from spam control (separate multiple with comma) (default is localhost)

Element.Translation: 防止濫發行為的ＩＰ白名單
在伺服器清單的伺服器描述
光線攻擊電腦（Damage Beam Computer）
七面體粉紅色進階裝甲（Pink Advanced Armor Hepta）
只能向１間正在觸發的工廠供應電力。\n留意，遇上電力問題，請先關閉其他工廠。
Element.Original:
Tip: power supply can only supply
one active factory. Please make
sure other factories of the same
structure are disabled if there is no
other power source.

Element.Translation:
Tip: power supply can only supply
one active factory. Please make
sure other factories of the same
structure are disabled if there is no
other power source.
Element.Original:
Tip: power supply can only supply
one active factory. Please make
sure other factories of the same
structure are disabled if there is no
other power source.

Element.Translation: 在進階建造模式，玩家「建造／移除」的最大面積。
Element.Original: max area a player may add/remove in adv. build mode

Element.Translation: 防止濫發行為的持續時間。
方塊出現新礦脈的機率（１﹒０＝１００%）。
Element.Original: Chance per block to place a new resource vein (1.0 = 100%)

Element.Translation: 貿易訂單錯誤。未找到送出的貿易圈。
Element.Original: Error in trade order. Sender Trade Node not found.

Element.Translation: 貿易訂單錯誤。未找到接收的貿易圈。
Element.Original: Error in trade order. Receiver Trade Node not found.

Element.Translation: 貿易訂單錯誤。未找到接收的貿易圈。
Element.Original: Error in trade order. Receiver Trade Node not found.

Element.Translation: 小行星變０後的重生時間（秒，－１＝永不）。
Element.Original: seconds until a sector that is mined down to 0 asteroids is replenished (-1 = never)

Element.Translation: 小行星區域的重生時間（秒）
Element.Original: Asteroid sector replenish time in seconds

Element.Translation: 連線多少次後，觸發防止濫發行為（預設每秒１次持續３０秒）。
Element.Original: max attempts before refusing connections in spam protect period (default is 1/sec for 30 sec)

Element.Translation: 防止濫發行為的觸發值
貿易訂單錯誤。未找到送出的貿易圈。
Element.Original: Error in trade order. Sender Trade Node not found.

Element.Translation: 不能輸入此種類的方塊。
錯誤！\n方塊不能與自己連結！
Element.Original: Error: Cannot connect a block\nto itself!

Element.Translation: 提煉後Sapsun礦石可以用於合成。數項技術需要這些礦石。
Element.Original: Sapsun Ore has useful manufacturing properties if refined into a more readily usable state. Several technologies are based upon the use of these ores once refined.

Element.Translation: 每間商店有中樞磚，供玩家查閱陣營的清單、招募及外交關係。
Element.Original: This module contains an interface for factions. Users can look up lists, join recruiting factions, and see the overall relationshp of factions to each other. A permanent faction hub can be found on every shop.

Element.Translation: 確定要移除此艦隊成員？
Element.Original: Do you really want to delete this Fleet Member?

Element.Translation: 散發著柔和紫光的Rammet水晶。
Element.Original: A block of Rammet crystal. It's purple in colour and emits a soft glow.

Element.Translation: 膠囊內懸浮著礦物Lukrah的異次元原子。
Element.Original: Cubatoms of Lukrah minerals float suspended within this capsule.

Element.Translation: 輸入訊號並延遲才輸出訊號。
Element.Original: This module will take the input, wait, and then send it after a delay.
how much credits do shops start with

Element.Translation: ＮＰＣ商店每１０分鐘取得的金錢
Element.Original: NPC Shop recharge credit amount / 10 minutes

Element.Translation: 商店每１０分鐘取得的金錢。
Element.Original: how much credits do shops gain about every 10 min

Element.Translation: 啟用客戶端可以往伺服器上傳預製的藍圖。
Element.Original: enables clients being able to upload their pre-build-blueprints to the server

Element.Translation: 初始彈速由發射物體的線性速度所決定。
Element.Original: initial projectile speed depend on relative linear velocity of object fired from

Element.Translation: 塗上黑色警示條紋的黃色標準裝甲。
Element.Original: Yellow Standard Armor that has been emblazoned with black caution stripes.

Element.Translation: 由標準裝甲磚加工合成，緊密的複合材料結構有更高的耐久值及裝甲減傷效果。
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: 儲存多少玩家登入的記錄（名稱、ＩＰ、帳戶、時間）。
Element.Original: How many login history objects (with name, IP, account-name, and time) should be saved by player state

Element.Translation: 白色標準裝甲（White Standard Armor）
死亡後有多久的無敵狀態
紫色水晶裝甲（Purple Crystal Armor）
玩家死亡後有多久的無敵狀態（秒）。
Element.Original: Time the player is invulnerable after death in sec

Element.Translation: 死亡後無死亡懲罰的時間
Element.Original: Player no punishment time after death

Element.Translation: 玩家死亡後有多久的無死亡懲罰狀態（秒）。
Element.Original: Time interval in seconds after death of a player in which the player is not punished

Element.Translation: 在太空死亡會扔下所有方塊。
Element.Original: player will drop all his blocks into space on death
drop credits lost on death into space instead

Element.Translation: 七面體橙色標準裝甲（Orange Standard Armor Hepta）
楔形綠色水晶裝甲（Green Crystal Armor Wedge）
死亡後扣減金錢的比例（在１到０之間取值，１＝損失所有，０＝無損失）。
Element.Original: players credits lost of total on death (must be between 0 and 1): 1 = lose all, 0 = keep all

Element.Translation: 星球體積標準差（正常的高斯分布圖按１／３水平比例分布）（最小值０）。
Element.Original: Planet size standard deviation. Note: normal gaussian distribution graph scaled horizontally by 1/3 (min 0)

Element.Translation: 小行星半徑的最大方塊值（－Ｘ到＋Ｘ）。
Element.Original: Asteroid max radius in blocks (from -x to +x)

Element.Translation: Naggles算法（警告！清楚明白後才變更）。
Element.Original: Naggles algorithm (WARNING: only change when you know what you're doing)

Element.Translation: 小行星礦脈的平均直徑。
Element.Original: Average diameter of resource veins in asteroids

Element.Translation: 會發光引誘並黏住獵物的肉食性植物。
Element.Original: A carnivorous plant that lures it's prey with a sticky bioluminescent orb.

Element.Translation: 黃色標準裝甲（Yellow Standard Armor）
玩家記錄多少座標書籤。
使用ＮＩＯ時，資料檔案的ＭＢ限制（更快速）（使用２的倍數）。
Element.Original: megabyte limit of .data file when to use NIO (faster) (must be power of 2)

Element.Translation: 按住並滑鼠滾輪／數字切換整排的快捷欄
星球體積平均值（正常的高斯分布圖）（最小值５０）。

Element.Translation: 護罩改變多少％，伺服器立即報告。

Element.Translation: ＡＩ命中率（數值越大某距離內準度越高，１０＝１０公尺內９９％命中率）。
Element.Original: how accurate the AI aims (the higher the value the more accurate vs distance. 10 = about 99% accuracy at 10m)

Element.Original: Enables Stealth Drive. While active, protects your structure from being scanned in addition to providing extra stealth mechanics through other chamber effects.\n\rYour stealth strength decides how well your structure information and stealth drive functionality is protected against scans.
